name: Bulbasaur
entry_red: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
entry_blue: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
entry_gold: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.
entry_ruby: BULBASAUR can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
entry_diamond: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
entry_black: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
entry_x: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.
entry_sword: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

name: Ivysaur
entry_red: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
entry_blue: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
entry_gold: Exposure to sun­ light adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
entry_ruby: There is a bud on this POKéMON’s back. To support its weight, IVYSAUR’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
entry_diamond: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
entry_black: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
entry_x: There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower.
entry_sword: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur
entry_red: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
entry_blue: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
entry_gold: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun's rays, it fills its body with power.
entry_ruby: There is a large flower on VENUSAUR’s back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.
entry_diamond: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
entry_black: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
entry_x: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun’s rays, it fills its body with power.
entry_sword: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charmander
entry_red: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
entry_blue: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
entry_gold: The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life force. If it is weak, the flame also burns weakly.
entry_ruby: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when CHARMANDER is enjoying itself. If the POKéMON becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.
entry_diamond: The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.
entry_black: The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.
entry_x: The flame on its tail indicates Charmander’s life force. If it is healthy, the flame burns brightly.
entry_sword: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
entry_red: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.
entry_blue: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.
entry_gold: It is very hot­ headed by nature, so it constantly seeks opponents. It calms down only when it wins.
entry_ruby: CHARMELEON mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
entry_diamond: In the rocky mountains where CHARMELEON live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
entry_black: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
entry_x: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.
entry_sword: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

name: Charizard
entry_red: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.
entry_blue: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.
entry_gold: If CHARIZARD be­ comes furious, the flame at the tip of its tail flares up in a whitish- blue color.
entry_ruby: CHARIZARD flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.
entry_diamond: It is said that CHARIZARD’s fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
entry_black: It is said that Charizard’s fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
entry_x: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.
entry_sword: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

name: Squirtle
entry_red: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.
entry_blue: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.
entry_gold: The shell is soft when it is born. It soon becomes so resilient, prod­ ding fingers will bounce off it.
entry_ruby: SQUIRTLE’s shell is not merely used for protection. The shell’s rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this POKéMON to swim at high speeds.
entry_diamond: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.
entry_black: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.
entry_x: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.
entry_sword: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Wartortle
entry_red: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.
entry_blue: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.
entry_gold: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that WARTORTLE is very old.
entry_ruby: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as WARTORTLE ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this POKéMON’s toughness as a battler.
entry_diamond: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.
entry_black: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.
entry_x: When tapped, this Pokémon will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.
entry_sword: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

name: Blastoise
entry_red: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.
entry_blue: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.
entry_gold: It deliberately makes itself heavy so it can with­ stand the recoil of the water jets it fires.
entry_ruby: BLASTOISE has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.
entry_diamond: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.
entry_black: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.
entry_x: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
entry_sword: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

name: Caterpie
entry_red: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
entry_blue: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
entry_gold: For protection, it releases a horri­ ble stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
entry_ruby: CATERPIE has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this POKéMON releases a terrifically strong odor.
entry_diamond: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
entry_black: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
entry_x: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
entry_sun: When attacked by bird Pokémon, it resists by releasing a terrifically strong odor from its antennae, but it often becomes their prey.
entry_sword: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

name: Metapod
entry_red: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
entry_blue: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
entry_gold: Inside the shell, it is soft and weak as it pre­ pares to evolve. It stays motion­ less in the shell.
entry_ruby: The shell covering this POKéMON’s body is as hard as an iron slab. METAPOD does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the hard shell.
entry_diamond: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
entry_black: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
entry_x: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
entry_sun: Its shell is filled with its soft innards. It doesn’t move much because of the risk it might carelessly spill its innards out.
entry_sword: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

name: Butterfree
entry_red: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
entry_blue: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
entry_gold: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
entry_ruby: BUTTERFREE has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can even search out, extract, and carry honey from flowers that are blooming over six miles from its nest.
entry_diamond: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
entry_black: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
entry_x: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
entry_sun: Close examination of its large eyes reveals that each eye is composed of a myriad of tiny eyes.
entry_sword: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
entry_red: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.
entry_blue: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.
entry_gold: Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.
entry_ruby: WEEDLE has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
entry_diamond: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.
entry_black: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.
entry_x: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.

name: Kakuna
entry_red: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
entry_blue: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
entry_gold: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.
entry_ruby: KAKUNA remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
entry_diamond: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
entry_black: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
entry_x: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.

name: Beedrill
entry_red: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
entry_blue: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
entry_gold: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poi­ son stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.
entry_ruby: BEEDRILL is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest - this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.
entry_diamond: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
entry_black: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
entry_x: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: Pidgey
abilities: Keen Eye, Tangled Feet, Big Pecks
entry_red: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
entry_blue: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
entry_gold: It usually hides in tall grass. Be­ cause it dislikes fighting, it pro­ tects itself by kicking up sand.
entry_ruby: PIDGEY has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
entry_diamond: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
entry_black: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
entry_x: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
abilities: Keen Eye, Tangled Feet, Big Pecks
entry_red: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.
entry_blue: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.
entry_gold: It has outstanding vision. However high it flies, it is able to distin­ guish the move­ ments of its prey.
entry_ruby: PIDGEOTTO claims a large area as its own territory. This POKéMON flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
entry_diamond: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.
entry_black: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.
entry_x: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.

name: Pidgeot
abilities: Keen Eye, Tangled Feet, Big Pecks
entry_red: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.
entry_blue: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.
entry_gold: Its well-developed chest muscles make it strong enough to whip up a gusty windstorm with just a few flaps.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many TRAINERS are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling them to choose PIDGEOT as their POKéMON.
entry_diamond: By flapping its wings with all its might, PIDGEOT can make a gust of wind capable of bending tall trees.
entry_black: By flapping its wings with all its might, Pidgeot can make a gust of wind capable of bending tall trees.
entry_x: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.

name: Rattata
entry_red: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
entry_blue: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
entry_gold: It eats anything. Wherever food is available, it will settle down and produce offspring continuously.
entry_ruby: RATTATA is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives - it will make its nest anywhere.
entry_diamond: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
entry_black: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
entry_x: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.
entry_sun: Its incisors continue growing until its death. If its Trainer doesn’t offer it a file to gnaw on, it will gnaw on door frames, table legs, and so on.

name: Raticate
entry_red: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
entry_blue: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
entry_gold: Gnaws on anything with its tough fangs. It can even topple concrete buildings by gnaw­ ing on them.
entry_ruby: RATICATE’s sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
entry_diamond: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
entry_black: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
entry_x: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
entry_sun: Its hind feet are webbed, so it’s a strong swimmer. It can cross rivers and sometimes even oceans.

name: Spearow
entry_red: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
entry_blue: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
entry_gold: It flaps its short wings to flush out insects from tall grass. It then plucks them with its stubby beak.
entry_ruby: SPEAROW has a very loud cry that can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
entry_diamond: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.
entry_black: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.
entry_x: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
entry_sun: Its short wings make it inept at flying. It moves about hurriedly and pecks at Bug-type Pokémon in the tall grass.

name: Fearow
entry_red: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
entry_blue: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
entry_gold: It shoots itself suddenly high into the sky, then plummets down in one fell swoop to strike its prey.
entry_ruby: FEAROW is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.
entry_diamond: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
entry_black: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
entry_x: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
entry_sun: It’s tough and has excellent stamina. It has no problem flying continuously for a whole day carrying a heavy load.

name: Ekans
entry_red: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.
entry_blue: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.
entry_gold: It can freely de­ tach its jaw to swallow large prey whole. It can be­ come too heavy to move, however.
entry_ruby: EKANS curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.
entry_diamond: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.
entry_black: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.
entry_x: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

name: Arbok
entry_red: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
entry_blue: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
entry_gold: Transfixing prey with the face-like pattern on its belly, it binds and poisons the frightened victim.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once ARBOK wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
entry_diamond: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.
entry_black: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.
entry_x: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.

name: Pikachu
entry_red: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
entry_blue: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
entry_gold: This intelligent POKéMON roasts hard BERRIES with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.
entry_ruby: Whenever PIKACHU comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it’s evidence that this POKéMON mistook the intensity of its charge.
entry_diamond: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.
entry_black: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
entry_x: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
entry_sun: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
entry_sword: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

name: Raichu
entry_red: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
entry_blue: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
entry_gold: When its electric­ ity builds, its muscles are stimu­ lated, and it be­ comes more aggres­ sive than usual.
entry_ruby: If the electrical sacks become excessively charged, RAICHU plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this POKéMON’s nest.
entry_diamond: It turns aggressive if it has too much electricity in its body. It discharges power through its tail.
entry_black: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
entry_x: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
entry_sun: It unleashes electric shocks that can reach 100,000 volts. When agitated, it can knock out even an Indian elephant.
entry_sword: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

name: Sandshrew
entry_red: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
entry_blue: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
entry_gold: If it fell from a great height, this POKéMON could save itself by rolling into a ball and bouncing.
entry_ruby: SANDSHREW’s body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. This POKéMON curls up to protect itself from its enemies.
entry_diamond: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.
entry_black: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.
entry_x: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.
entry_sun: It can roll its body into a ball. It moves through the desert by rolling at high speeds.
entry_sword: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.

name: Sandslash
entry_red: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
entry_blue: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
entry_gold: In an attempt to hide itself, it will run around at top speed to kick up a blinding dust storm.
entry_ruby: SANDSLASH’s body is covered by tough spikes, which are hardened sections of its hide. Once a year, the old spikes fall out, to be replaced with new spikes that grow out from beneath the old ones.
entry_diamond: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.
entry_black: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.
entry_x: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.
entry_sun: Although they are sharp, its claws and spikes often break off. They grow back the next day, so it is not bothered by the temporary loss.
entry_sword: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon’s spikes will feel when touched.

name: Nidoran F
entry_red: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
entry_blue: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
entry_gold: The poison hidden in its small horn is extremely po­ tent. Even a tiny scratch can have fatal results.
entry_ruby: NIDORAN has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied POKéMON. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
entry_diamond: While it does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the poison it secretes from barbs can be fatal.
entry_black: While it does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the poison it secretes from barbs can be fatal.
entry_x: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
entry_sword: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they’ll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.

name: Nidorina
entry_red: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
entry_blue: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
entry_gold: When feeding its young, it first chews and tender­ izes the food, then spits it out for the offspring.
entry_ruby: When NIDORINA are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This POKéMON appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
entry_diamond: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow slower than NIDORINO’s.
entry_black: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow slower than Nidorino’s.
entry_x: The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes.
entry_sword: The horn on its head has atrophied. It’s thought that this happens so Nidorina’s children won’t get poked while their mother is feeding them.

name: Nidoqueen
entry_red: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
entry_blue: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
entry_gold: Its body is cover­ ed with needle- like scales. It never shows signs of shrinking from any attack.
entry_ruby: NIDOQUEEN’s body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This POKéMON is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
entry_diamond: Its entire body is armored with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.
entry_black: Its entire body is armored with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.
entry_x: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
entry_sword: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.

name: Nidoran M
entry_red: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.
entry_blue: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.
entry_gold: It is small, but its horn is filled with poison. It charges then stabs with the horn to inject poison.
entry_ruby: The male NIDORAN has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanks to them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this POKéMON’s notice.
entry_diamond: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
entry_black: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
entry_x: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
entry_sword: The horn on a male Nidoran’s forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokémon, always straining its large ears.

name: Nidorino
entry_red: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
entry_blue: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
entry_gold: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses any­ thing, it attacks immediately.
entry_ruby: NIDORINO has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
entry_diamond: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.
entry_black: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.
entry_x: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.
entry_sword: With a horn that’s harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.

name: Nidoking
entry_red: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.
entry_blue: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.
entry_gold: It swings its big tail around during battle. If its foe flinches, it will charge with its sturdy body.
entry_ruby: NIDOKING’s thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this POKéMON goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
entry_diamond: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.
entry_black: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.
entry_x: It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn, as it contains venom.
entry_sword: When it goes on a rampage, it’s impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it’s lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.

name: Clefairy
abilities: Cute Charm, Magic Guard, Friend Guard
entry_red: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
entry_blue: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
entry_gold: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.
entry_ruby: On every night of a full moon, groups of this POKéMON come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired CLEFAIRY return to their quiet mountain retreats and go to sleep nestled up against each other.
entry_diamond: Thought to live with others on quiet mountains, it is popular for its adorable nature.
entry_black: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
entry_x: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
entry_sun: Its adorable behavior and appearance make it popular with men and women, young and old. Its numbers are few, however.
entry_sword: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

name: Clefable
entry_red: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.
entry_blue: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.
entry_gold: With its acute hearing, it can pick up sounds from far away. It usually hides in quiet places.
entry_ruby: CLEFABLE moves by skipping lightly as if it were flying using its wings. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. It is known to take strolls on lakes on quiet, moonlit nights.
entry_diamond: Rarely seen by people, it is said to be drawn by the full moon to play at deserted lakes.
entry_black: It is very wary and rarely shows itself to people. Its ears can hear a pin drop over half a mile away.
entry_x: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.
entry_sun: They don’t like to reveal themselves in front of people. They live quietly in packs deep in the mountains.
entry_sword: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: Vulpix
entry_red: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
entry_blue: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
entry_gold: As it develops,  its single white tail gains color and splits into six. It is quite warm and cuddly.
entry_ruby: At the time of its birth, VULPIX has one white tail. The tail separates into six if this POKéMON receives plenty of love from its TRAINER. The six tails become magnificently curled.
entry_diamond: It controls balls of fire. As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.
entry_black: It controls balls of fire. As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.
entry_x: When it is born, it has just one snow-white tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
entry_sun: Its beautiful fur and tails have made it very popular. As it grows, its tails split to form more tails.
entry_sword: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

name: Ninetales
entry_red: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.
entry_blue: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.
entry_gold: Some legends claim that each of its nine tails has its own unique type of special mystical power.
entry_ruby: NINETALES casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain total control over its foe’s mind. This POKéMON is said to live for a thousand years.
entry_diamond: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.
entry_black: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.
entry_x: It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.
entry_sun: Legend has it that this mystical Pokémon was formed when nine saints coalesced into one.
entry_sword: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

name: Jigglypuff
entry_red: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
entry_blue: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
entry_gold: If it inflates to SING a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
entry_ruby: JIGGLYPUFF’s vocal chords can freely adjust the wavelength of its voice. This POKéMON uses this ability to sing at precisely the right wavelength to make its foes most drowsy.
entry_diamond: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
entry_black: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
entry_x: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.
entry_sun: It hugely inflates its stomach and sings a mysterious melody. If you hear this melody, you’ll become sleepy right away.
entry_sword: Jigglypuff has top-notch lung capacity, even by comparison to other Pokémon. It won’t stop singing its lullabies until its foes fall asleep.

name: Wigglytuff
entry_red: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
entry_blue: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
entry_gold: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won't want to be separated.
entry_ruby: WIGGLYTUFF has large, saucerlike eyes. The surfaces of its eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this POKéMON’s eyes, it is quickly washed away.
entry_diamond: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.
entry_black: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.
entry_x: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won’t want to be separated.
entry_sun: It sheds its fine fur when the seasons change. The fur is gathered and spun into a luxurious yarn.
entry_sword: The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate itself to an enormous size to intimidate them.

name: Zubat
entry_red: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
entry_blue: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
entry_gold: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its sur­ roundings.
entry_ruby: ZUBAT remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
entry_diamond: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
entry_black: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
entry_x: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
entry_sun: It sleeps in caves during the day. It has no eyes, so to check its surroundings while flying, it emits ultrasonic waves.
entry_sword: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.

name: Golbat
entry_red: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
entry_blue: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
entry_gold: However hard its victim's hide may be, it punctures with sharp fangs and gorges itself with blood.
entry_ruby: GOLBAT loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This POKéMON flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.
entry_diamond: It loves the blood of humans and Pokémon. It flies around at night in search of neck veins.
entry_black: Its sharp fangs puncture the toughest of hides and have small holes for greedily sucking blood.
entry_x: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
entry_sun: Its thick fangs are hollow like straws, making them unexpectedly fragile. These fangs are specialized for sucking blood.
entry_sword: It loves to drink other creatures’ blood. It’s said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it’s gathered.

name: Oddish
entry_red: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.
entry_blue: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.
entry_gold: Awakened by moon­ light, it roams  actively at night. In the day, it stays quietly underground.
entry_ruby: During the daytime, ODDISH buries itself in soil to absorb nutrients from  the ground using its entire body. The more fertile the soil, the glossier its leaves become.
entry_diamond: It often plants its root feet in the ground during the day and sows seeds as it walks about at night.
entry_black: It often plants its root feet in the ground during the day and sows seeds as it walks about at night.
entry_x: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
entry_sword: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

name: Gloom
entry_red: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.
entry_blue: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.
entry_gold: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.
entry_ruby: GLOOM releases a foul fragrance from the pistil of its flower. When faced with danger, the stench worsens. If this POKéMON is feeling calm and secure, it does not release its usual stinky aroma.
entry_diamond: The honey it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious, it can curl noses more than a mile away.
entry_black: The honey it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious, it can curl noses more than a mile away.
entry_x: Smells incredibly foul! However, around one out of a thousand people enjoy sniffing its nose-bending stink.
entry_sword: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

name: Vileplume
entry_red: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
entry_blue: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
entry_gold: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
entry_ruby: VILEPLUME’s toxic pollen triggers atrocious allergy attacks. That’s why it is advisable never to approach any attractive flowers in a jungle, however pretty they may be.
entry_diamond: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.
entry_black: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.
entry_x: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
entry_sword: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

name: Paras
entry_red: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.
entry_blue: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.
entry_gold: It is doused with mushroom spores when it is born. As its body grows, mushrooms sprout from its back.
entry_ruby: PARAS has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow large by drawing nutrients from the BUG POKéMON host. They are highly valued as a medicine for extending life.
entry_diamond: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host PARAS.
entry_black: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host Paras.
entry_x: Growing out of the bug’s back are mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms grow with the bug host.
entry_sun: No matter how much it eats, the mushrooms growing on its back steal away most of the nutrients it consumes.

name: Parasect
entry_red: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
entry_blue: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
entry_gold: It stays mostly in dark, damp places, the preference not of the bug, but of the big mush­ rooms on its back.
entry_ruby: PARASECT is known to infest large trees en masse and drain nutrients from the lower trunk and roots. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.
entry_diamond: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls PARASECT. It scatters poisonous spores.
entry_black: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.
entry_x: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.
entry_sun: The large mushroom on its back controls it. It often fights over territory with Shiinotic.

name: Venonat
abilities: Compound Eyes, Tinted Lens, Run Away
entry_red: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.
entry_blue: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.
entry_gold: Its eyes also function as radar units. It catches and eats small bugs that hide in darkness.
entry_ruby: VENONAT is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large eyes that never fail to spot even miniscule prey.
entry_diamond: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.
entry_black: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.
entry_x: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.

name: Venomoth
abilities: Shield Dust, Tinted Lens, Wonder Skin
entry_red: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.
entry_blue: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.
entry_gold: When it attacks, it flaps its large wings violently to scatter its poi­ sonous powder all around.
entry_ruby: VENOMOTH is nocturnal - it is a POKéMON that only becomes active at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
entry_diamond: It flutters its wings to scatter dustlike scales. The scales leach toxins if they contact skin.
entry_black: It flutters its wings to scatter dustlike scales. The scales leach toxins if they contact skin.
entry_x: The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who touches them, making that person unable to stand.

name: Diglett
abilities: Sand Veil, Arena Trap, Sand Force
entry_red: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
entry_blue: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
entry_gold: Its skin is very thin. If it is exposed to light, its blood heats up, causing it to grow weak.
entry_ruby: DIGLETT are raised in most farms. The reason is simple - wherever this POKéMON burrows, the soil is left perfectly tilled for planting crops. This soil is made ideal for growing delicious vegetables.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.
entry_black: A Pokémon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.
entry_x: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.
entry_sun: It chews on plant roots underground. Farmers whose vegetables are vulnerable find it can be quite a pest.
entry_sword: If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.

name: Dugtrio
abilities: Sand Veil, Arena Trap, Sand Force
entry_red: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
entry_blue: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
entry_gold: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.
entry_ruby: DUGTRIO are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.
entry_diamond: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.
entry_black: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.
entry_x: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.
entry_sun: This set of triplets moves cooperatively. It’s the power of teamwork that enables this Pokémon to dig to a depth of 60 miles.
entry_sword: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: Meowth
entry_red: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry_blue: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry_gold: It is fascinated by round objects. It can't stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
entry_ruby: MEOWTH withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this POKéMON loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
entry_diamond: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_black: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_x: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_sun: It lies around all day, becoming active near dusk. At night, it wanders the city in search of loose change.
entry_sword: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.

name: Persian
entry_red: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
entry_blue: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
entry_gold: Many adore it for its sophisticated air. However, it will lash out and scratch for little reason.
entry_ruby: PERSIAN has six bold whiskers that give it a look of toughness. The whiskers   sense air movements to determine what is in the POKéMON’s surrounding vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
entry_diamond: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
entry_black: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
entry_x: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
entry_sun: It has a violent temperament. It will attack anything that looks it in the eye. Its sharp claws inflict deep wounds.
entry_sword: Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed.

name: Psyduck
entry_red: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.
entry_blue: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.
entry_gold: It has mystical powers but doesn't recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.
entry_ruby: PSYDUCK uses a mysterious power. When it does so, this POKéMON  generates brain waves that are supposedly only seen in sleepers. This discovery spurred controversy among scholars.
entry_diamond: If its usual headache worsens, it starts exhibiting odd powers. It can’t remember doing so, however.
entry_black: Overwhelmed by enigmatic abilities, it suffers a constant headache. It sometimes uses mysterious powers.
entry_x: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
entry_sun: As a result of headaches so fierce they cause it to cry, it sometimes uses psychokinesis without meaning to.
entry_sword: Psyduck is constantly beset by headaches. If the Pokémon lets its strange power erupt, apparently the pain subsides for a while.

name: Golduck
entry_red: Often seen swim­ ming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.
entry_blue: Often seen swim­ ming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.
entry_gold: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its fore­ head somehow be­ gins to glow.
entry_ruby: The webbed flippers on its forelegs and hind legs and the streamlined body of GOLDUCK give it frightening speed. This POKéMON is definitely much faster than even the most athletic swimmer.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that lives in lakes. It swims faster than any human swimming champion.
entry_black: It is seen swimming dynamically and elegantly using its well-developed limbs and flippers.
entry_x: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use telekinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.
entry_sun: It is said that the red part of its forehead grants supernatural powers to those who possess one, so it was over-hunted in the past.
entry_sword: This Pokémon lives in gently flowing rivers. It paddles through the water with its long limbs, putting its graceful swimming skills on display.

name: Mankey
entry_red: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.
entry_blue: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.
entry_gold: It is extremely ill-tempered. Groups of them will attack any handy target for no reason.
entry_ruby: When MANKEY starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it’s a sure sign that it is becoming angry. However, because it goes into a towering rage almost instantly, it is impossible for anyone to flee its wrath.
entry_diamond: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.
entry_black: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.
entry_x: It’s unsafe to approach if it gets violently enraged for no reason and can’t distinguish friends from foes.
entry_sun: It can spontaneously become enraged. Everyone near it clears out as it rampages, and the resulting loneliness makes it angrier still.

name: Primeape
entry_red: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.
entry_blue: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.
entry_gold: If approached while asleep, it may awaken and angrily give chase in a groggy state of semi-sleep.
entry_ruby: When PRIMEAPE becomes furious, its blood circulation is boosted. In turn, its muscles are made even stronger. However, it also becomes much less intelligent at the same time.
entry_diamond: It grows angry if you see its eyes and gets angrier if you run. If you beat it, it gets even madder.
entry_black: It grows angry if you see its eyes and gets angrier if you run. If you beat it, it gets even madder.
entry_x: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.
entry_sun: It has been known to become so angry that it dies as a result. Its face looks peaceful in death, however.

name: Growlithe
entry_red: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
entry_blue: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
entry_gold: It has a brave and trustworthy na­ ture. It fear­ lessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
entry_ruby: GROWLITHE has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this POKéMON won’t forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.
entry_black: A Pokémon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.
entry_x: Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.
entry_sun: It’s both clever and loyal, but if a stranger tries to invade its territory, it barks threateningly.
entry_sword: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

name: Arcanine
entry_red: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
entry_blue: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
entry_gold: This legendary Chinese POKEMON is considered magnif­ icent. Many people are enchanted by its grand mane.
entry_ruby: ARCANINE is known for its high speed. It is said to be capable of running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within this POKéMON’s body is its source of power.
entry_diamond: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.
entry_black: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.
entry_x: A Pokémon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
entry_sun: Overflowing with beauty and majesty, this strong Pokémon appears in ancient Eastern folklore.
entry_sword: The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people.

name: Poliwag
entry_red: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.
entry_blue: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.
entry_gold: Because it is in­ ept at walking on its newly grown legs, it always  swims around in water.
entry_ruby: POLIWAG has a very thin skin. It is possible to see the POKéMON’s spiral innards right through the skin. Despite its thinness, however, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.
entry_diamond: Its skin is so thin, its internal organs are visible. It has trouble walking on its newly grown feet.
entry_black: Its skin is so thin, its internal organs are visible. It has trouble walking on its newly grown feet.
entry_x: Its slick black skin is thin and damp. A part of its internal organs can be seen through the skin as a spiral pattern.
entry_sun: The swirl on its belly is its internal organs showing through. If the swirl is tinged white, that means it’s affected by some disease.
entry_sword: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokémon’s innards showing through the skin.

name: Poliwhirl
entry_red: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.
entry_blue: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.
entry_gold: The swirl on its belly subtly un­ dulates. Staring at it may gradual­ ly cause drowsi­ ness.
entry_ruby: The surface of POLIWHIRL’s body is always wet and slick with an oily fluid. Because of this greasy covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.
entry_diamond: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.
entry_black: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.
entry_x: It can live in or out of water. When out of water, it constantly sweats to keep its body slimy.
entry_sun: Although it can live on land, it prefers to stay in the water, where it has fewer natural enemies.
entry_sword: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl’s has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.

name: Poliwrath
entry_red: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
entry_blue: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
entry_gold: This strong and skilled swimmer is even capable of crossing the Pacific Ocean just by kicking.
entry_ruby: POLIWRATH’s highly developed, brawny muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. It is so tirelessly strong, this POKéMON can swim back and forth across the Pacific Ocean without effort.
entry_diamond: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
entry_black: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
entry_x: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
entry_sun: Poliwrath in the Alola region are strong swimmers that use the breaststroke. Many children learn to swim by imitating Poliwrath.
entry_sword: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.

name: Abra
entry_red: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.
entry_blue: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.
entry_gold: It senses impend­ ing attacks and TELEPORTS away to safety before the actual attacks can strike.
entry_ruby: ABRA sleeps for eighteen hours a day. However, it can sense the presence of foes even while it is sleeping. In such a situation, this POKéMON immediately teleports to safety.
entry_diamond: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. Even when awake, it teleports itself while remaining seated.
entry_black: Using its psychic power is such a strain on its brain that it needs to sleep for 18 hours a day.
entry_x: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.
entry_sun: It sleeps 18 hours a day. Even while sleeping, it will teleport itself to treetops and pick and eat berries there.
entry_sword: This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.

name: Kadabra
entry_red: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.
entry_blue: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.
entry_gold: It possesses strong spiritual power. The more danger it faces, the stronger its psychic power.
entry_ruby: KADABRA emits a peculiar alpha wave if it develops a headache. Only those people with a particularly strong psyche can hope to become a TRAINER of this POKéMON.
entry_diamond: If one is nearby, an eerie shadow appears on TV screens. Seeing the shadow is said to bring bad luck.
entry_black: It stares at its silver spoon to focus its mind. It emits more alpha waves while doing so.
entry_x: When it uses its psychic power, it emits strong alpha waves that can ruin precision devices.
entry_sun: A theory exists that this Pokémon was a young boy who couldn’t control his psychic powers and ended up transformed into this Pokémon.
entry_sword: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.

name: Alakazam
entry_red: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.
entry_blue: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.
entry_gold: Closing both its eyes heightens all its other senses. This enables it to use its abilities to their extremes.
entry_ruby: ALAKAZAM’s brain continually grows, making its head far too heavy to support with its neck. This POKéMON holds its head up using its psychokinetic power instead.
entry_diamond: Its superb memory lets it recall everything it has experienced from birth. Its IQ exceeds 5,000.
entry_black: The spoons clutched in its hands are said to have been created by its psychic powers.
entry_x: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.
entry_sun: It is said to have an IQ of approximately 5,000. Its overflowing psychokinetic powers cause headaches to anyone nearby.
entry_sword: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

name: Machop
entry_red: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.
entry_blue: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.
entry_gold: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.
entry_ruby: MACHOP’s muscles are special - they never get sore no matter how much they are used in exercise. This POKéMON has sufficient power to hurl a hundred adult humans.
entry_diamond: It hefts a GRAVELER repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.
entry_black: Though small in stature, it is powerful enough to easily heft and throw a number of Geodude at once.
entry_x: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.
entry_sun: It loves working out. As it gazes at its muscles, which continue to swell day by day, it becomes more and more dedicated to its training.
entry_sword: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

name: Machoke
entry_red: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
entry_blue: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
entry_gold: It always goes at its full power, but this very tough and durable POKéMON never gets tired.
entry_ruby: MACHOKE’s thoroughly toned muscles possess the hardness of steel. This POKéMON has so much strength, it can easily hold aloft a sumo wrestler on just one finger.
entry_diamond: MACHOKE’s boundless power is very dangerous, so it wears a belt that suppresses its energy.
entry_black: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.
entry_x: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
entry_sun: As a result of its continual workouts, it has developed tremendous power. It uses that power to help people with their work.
entry_sword: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
entry_red: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.
entry_blue: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.
entry_gold: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
entry_ruby: MACHAMP has the power to hurl anything aside. However, trying to do any work requiring care and dexterity causes its arms to get tangled. This POKéMON tends to leap into action before it thinks.
entry_diamond: It punches with its four arms at blinding speed. It can launch 1,000 punches in two seconds.
entry_black: Its four muscled arms slam foes with powerful punches and chops at blinding speed.
entry_x: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.
entry_sun: It unleashes megaton-level punches that send opponents flying clear over the horizon.
entry_sword: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

name: Bellsprout
entry_red: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.
entry_blue: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.
entry_gold: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.
entry_ruby: BELLSPROUT’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this POKéMON spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.
entry_diamond: It prefers hot and humid environments. It is quick at capturing prey with its vines.
entry_black: It prefers hot and humid environments. It is quick at capturing prey with its vines.
entry_x: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.

name: Weepinbell
entry_red: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.
entry_blue: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.
entry_gold: Even though it is filled with ACID, it does not melt because it also oozes a neutral­ izing fluid.
entry_ruby: WEEPINBELL has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the POKéMON hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that appears to be a plant. It captures unwary prey by dousing them with a toxic powder.
entry_black: A Pokémon that appears to be a plant. It captures unwary prey by dousing them with a toxic powder.
entry_x: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.

name: Victreebel
entry_red: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
entry_blue: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
entry_gold: ACID that has dis­ solved many prey becomes sweeter, making it even more effective at attracting prey.
entry_ruby: VICTREEBEL has a long vine that extends from its head. This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near, this POKéMON swallows it whole.
entry_diamond: It pools in its mouth a fluid with a honeylike scent, which is really an acid that dissolves anything.
entry_black: It pools in its mouth a fluid with a honeylike scent, which is really an acid that dissolves anything.
entry_x: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

name: Tentacool
abilities: Clear Body, Liquid Ooze, Rain Dish
entry_red: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.
entry_blue: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.
entry_gold: When the tide goes out, dehydrated TENTACOOL remains can be found washed up on the shore.
entry_ruby: TENTACOOL’s body is largely composed of water. If it is removed from the sea, it dries up like parchment. If this POKéMON happens to become dehydrated, put it back into the sea.
entry_diamond: Its body is virtually composed of water. It shoots strange beams from its crystal-like eyes.
entry_black: Because its body is almost entirely composed of water, it shrivels up if it is washed ashore.
entry_x: Its body is virtually composed of water. It shoots strange beams from its crystal-like eyes.
entry_sun: They can be found lying dehydrated on beaches, but they are often still alive. When soaked in water, they will revive.
entry_sword: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.

name: Tentacruel
abilities: Clear Body, Liquid Ooze, Rain Dish
entry_red: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
entry_blue: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
entry_gold: Its 80 tentacles absorb water and stretch almost endlessly to CON­ STRICT its prey and enemies.
entry_ruby: TENTACRUEL has large red orbs on its head. The orbs glow before lashing the vicinity with a harsh ultrasonic blast. This POKéMON’s outburst creates rough waves around it.
entry_diamond: With 80 tentacles for ensnaring victims, it prevents escape until the prey is weakened by poison.
entry_black: It extends its 80 tentacles to form an encircling poisonous net that is difficult to escape.
entry_x: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
entry_sun: Normally, it has 80 poisonous tentacles. The longer one has been alive, the fewer tentacles it will have.
entry_sword: When the red orbs on Tentacruel’s head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

name: Geodude
entry_red: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
entry_blue: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
entry_gold: Most people may not notice, but a closer look should reveal that there are many GEODUDE around.
entry_ruby: The longer a GEODUDE lives, the more its edges are chipped and worn away, making it more rounded in appearance. However, this POKéMON’s heart will remain hard, craggy, and rough always.
entry_diamond: Many live on mountain trails and remain half buried while keeping an eye on climbers.
entry_black: At rest, it looks just like a rock. Carelessly stepping on it will make it swing its fists angrily.
entry_x: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
entry_sun: Its round body makes it easy to pick up, but it is hard and heavy. It’s dangerous to play with them as if they were snowballs.

name: Graveler
entry_red: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
entry_blue: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
entry_gold: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesn't mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.
entry_ruby: GRAVELER grows by feeding on rocks. Apparently, it prefers to eat rocks that are covered in moss. This POKéMON eats its way through a ton of rocks on a daily basis.
entry_diamond: GRAVELER make their homes on sheer cliff faces by gouging out numerous horizontal holes.
entry_black: It rolls on mountain paths to move. Once it builds momentum, no Pokémon can stop it without difficulty.
entry_x: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesn’t mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.
entry_sun: Mossy rocks are its favorite food. It can devour a ton a day while crunching loudly.

name: Golem
entry_red: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.
entry_blue: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.
entry_gold: It sheds its skin once a year. The discarded shell immediately hard­ ens and crumbles away.
entry_ruby: GOLEM live up on mountains. If there is a large earthquake, these POKéMON will come rolling down off the mountains en masse to the foothills below.
entry_diamond: It sheds its hide once a year. Its boulderlike body is so tough, even dynamite can’t harm it.
entry_black: Even dynamite can’t harm its hard, boulderlike body. It sheds its hide just once a year.
entry_x: It tumbles down mountains, leaving grooves from peak to base. Stay clear of these grooves.
entry_sun: Its body can survive dynamite blasts without a single scratch, but it hates rain and humidity.

name: Ponyta
abilities: Run Away, Flash Fire, Flame Body
entry_red: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.
entry_blue: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.
entry_gold: It is a weak run­ ner immediately after birth. It gradually becomes faster by chasing after its parents.
entry_ruby: PONYTA is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. This POKéMON becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to keep up with its parent.
entry_diamond: About an hour after birth, its fiery mane and tail grow out, giving it an impressive appearance.
entry_black: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.
entry_x: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.
entry_sword: It can’t run properly when it’s newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.

name: Rapidash
abilities: Run Away, Flash Fire, Flame Body
entry_red: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
entry_blue: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
entry_gold: At full gallop, its four hooves barely touch the ground because it moves so incredi­ bly fast.
entry_ruby: RAPIDASH usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this POKéMON turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.
entry_diamond: It gallops at nearly 150 mph. With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.
entry_black: When at an all-out gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.
entry_x: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
entry_sword: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

name: Slowpoke
