entry_red: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
entry_blue: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
entry_gold: It lazes vacantly near water. If something bites its tail, it won't even notice for a whole day.
entry_ruby: SLOWPOKE uses its tail to catch prey by dipping it in water at the side of a river. However, this POKéMON often forgets what it’s doing and often spends entire days just loafing at water’s edge.
entry_diamond: Although slow, it is skilled at fishing with its tail. It does not feel pain if its tail is bitten.
entry_black: Although slow, it is skilled at fishing with its tail. It does not feel pain if its tail is bitten.
entry_x: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.
entry_sun: Its long tail often breaks off. It doesn’t really feel any pain, though, and the tail grows back, so Slowpoke isn’t particularly bothered.
entry_sword: Slow-witted and oblivious, this Pokémon won’t feel any pain if its tail gets eaten. It won’t notice when its tail grows back, either.

name: Slowbro
entry_red: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
entry_blue: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
entry_gold: If the tail-biting SHELLDER is thrown off in a harsh battle, it reverts to being an ordi­ nary SLOWPOKE.
entry_ruby: SLOWBRO’s tail has a SHELLDER firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can’t be used for fishing anymore. This causes SLOWBRO to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.
entry_diamond: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.
entry_black: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the Shellder on its tail bites down.
entry_x: An attached Shellder won’t let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.
entry_sun: It spaces out while gazing at the sea. With Shellder’s poison flowing through its body, it becomes even spacier.
entry_sword: Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.

name: Magnemite
entry_red: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.
entry_blue: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.
entry_gold: It is attracted by electromagnetic waves. It may approach trainers if they are using their POKéGEAR.
entry_ruby: MAGNEMITE attaches itself to power lines to feed on electricity. If your house has a power outage, check your circuit breakers. You may find a large number of this POKéMON clinging to the breaker box.
entry_diamond: The units at its sides generate electromagnetic waves that keep it airborne. It feeds on electricity.
entry_black: The faster the units at its sides rotate, the greater the magnetic force they generate.
entry_x: The units at the sides of its body generate antigravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.
entry_sun: They gather in places where electricity is available. They can be found clinging to the steel towers used to support power lines.
entry_sword: At times, Magnemite runs out of electricity and ends up on the ground. If you give batteries to a grounded Magnemite, it’ll start moving again.

name: Magneton
entry_red: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.
entry_blue: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.
entry_gold: Three MAGNEMITE are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.
entry_ruby: MAGNETON emits a powerful magnetic force that is fatal to mechanical devices. As a result, large cities sound sirens to warn citizens of large-scale outbreaks of this POKéMON.
entry_diamond: It is actually three MAGNEMITE linked by magnetism. A group can set off a magnetic storm.
entry_black: Many mysteriously appear when more sunspots dot the sun. They stop TV sets from displaying properly.
entry_x: A linked cluster formed of several Magnemite. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage.
entry_sun: When three Magnemite link together, their brains also become one. They do not become three times more intelligent.
entry_sword: This Pokémon is three Magnemite that have linked together. Magneton sends out powerful radio waves to study its surroundings.

name: Farfetchd
entry_red: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.
entry_blue: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.
entry_gold: If anyone tries to disturb where the essential plant sticks grow, it uses its own stick to thwart them.
entry_ruby: FARFETCH’D is always seen with a stick from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This POKéMON has been known to fight with others over sticks.
entry_diamond: It can’t live without the stalk it holds. That’s why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.
entry_black: It can’t live without the stalk it holds. That’s why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.
entry_x: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.
entry_sword: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

name: Doduo
abilities: Run Away, Early Bird, Tangled Feet
entry_red: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.
entry_blue: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.
entry_gold: By alternately raising and lower­ ing its two heads, it balances itself to be more stable while running.
entry_ruby: DODUO’s two heads never sleep at the same time. Its two heads take turns sleeping, so one head can always keep watch for enemies while the other one sleeps.
entry_diamond: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.
entry_black: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.
entry_x: A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.

name: Dodrio
abilities: Run Away, Early Bird, Tangled Feet
entry_red: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.
entry_blue: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.
entry_gold: It collects data  and plans three times as wisely, but it may think too much and be­ come immobilized.
entry_ruby: Watch out if DODRIO’s three heads are looking in three separate directions. It’s a sure sign that it is on its guard. Don’t go near this POKéMON if it’s being wary - it may decide to peck you.
entry_diamond: When DODUO evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.
entry_black: When Doduo evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.
entry_x: An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads--even for a second--will get pecked severely.

name: Seel
entry_red: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.
entry_blue: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.
entry_gold: Although it can't walk well on land, it is a graceful swimmer. It espe­ cially loves being in frigid seas.
entry_ruby: SEEL hunts for prey in the frigid sea underneath sheets of ice. When it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.
entry_black: A Pokémon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.
entry_x: A Pokémon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.

name: Dewgong
entry_red: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.
entry_blue: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.
entry_gold: Its streamlined body has little drag in water. The colder the temperature, the friskier it gets.
entry_ruby: DEWGONG loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this POKéMON sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.
entry_diamond: In snow, the pure white coat covering its body obscures it from predators.
entry_black: In snow, the pure white coat covering its body obscures it from predators.
entry_x: Its body is covered with a pure white fur. The colder the weather, the more active it becomes.

name: Grimer
entry_red: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
entry_blue: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
entry_gold: As it moves, it loses bits of its body from which new GRIMER emerge. This worsens the stench around it.
entry_ruby: GRIMER’s sludgy and rubbery body can be forced through any opening, however small it may be. This POKéMON enters sewer pipes to drink filthy wastewater.
entry_diamond: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon’s X-rays. It appears among filth.
entry_black: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon’s X-rays. It appears among filth.
entry_x: Sludge exposed to X-rays from the moon transformed into Grimer. It loves feeding on filthy things.
entry_sun: Its main source of food is the slimy industrial waste of factories. This Pokémon’s numbers have been decreasing in recent years.

name: Muk
entry_red: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
entry_blue: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
entry_gold: They love to gath­ er in smelly areas where sludge ac­ cumulates, making the stench around them worse.
entry_ruby: From MUK’s body seeps a foul fluid that gives off a nose-bendingly horrible stench. Just one drop of this POKéMON’s body fluid can turn a pool stagnant and rancid.
entry_diamond: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.
entry_black: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.
entry_x: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around them worse.
entry_sun: The stench it gives off will make your nose scrunch up. Still, there are Muk fans who think that’s a good thing.

name: Shellder
entry_red: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
entry_blue: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
entry_gold: It swims facing backward by open­ ing and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.
entry_ruby: At night, this POKéMON uses its broad tongue to burrow a hole in the seafloor sand and then sleep in it. While it is sleeping, SHELLDER closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.
entry_diamond: It swims backward by opening and closing its two shells. Its large tongue is always kept hanging out.
entry_black: It swims backward by opening and closing its two shells. Its large tongue is always kept hanging out.
entry_x: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
entry_sun: The hardness of its shell surpasses the hardness of a diamond. In days gone by, people used the shells to make shields.
entry_sword: It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.

name: Cloyster
entry_red: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.
entry_blue: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.
entry_gold: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superi­ or strength.
entry_ruby: CLOYSTER is capable of swimming in the sea. It does so by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. This POKéMON shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.
entry_diamond: It fights by keeping its shell tightly shut for protection and by shooting spikes to repel foes.
entry_black: It fights by keeping its shell tightly shut for protection and by shooting spikes to repel foes.
entry_x: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.
entry_sun: Its hard shell cannot be shattered—not even by a bomb. The contents of the shell remain unknown.
entry_sword: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.

name: Gastly
entry_red: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
entry_blue: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
entry_gold: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.
entry_ruby: GASTLY is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this POKéMON cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
entry_diamond: This Pokémon’s body is 95% made up of gases, which are blown away by strong gusts of wind.
entry_black: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
entry_x: Its body is made of gas. Despite lacking substance, it can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.
entry_sun: Should a strange light be seen flickering in an abandoned building, Gastly is lurking there.
entry_sword: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

name: Haunter
entry_red: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.
entry_blue: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.
entry_gold: In total darkness, where nothing is visible, HAUNTER lurks, silently stalking its next victim.
entry_ruby: HAUNTER is a dangerous POKéMON. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
entry_diamond: It can slip through any obstacle. It lurks inside walls to keep an eye on its foes.
entry_black: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.
entry_x: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.
entry_sun: It strikes at humans from total darkness. Those licked by its cold tongue grow weaker with each passing day until they die.
entry_sword: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.

name: Gengar
entry_red: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
entry_blue: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
entry_gold: It steals heat from its surround­ ings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a GENGAR appeared.
entry_ruby: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
entry_diamond: It hides in shadows. It is said that if GENGAR is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees F.
entry_black: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
entry_x: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.
entry_sun: Should you feel yourself attacked by a sudden chill, it is evidence of an approaching Gengar. There is no escaping it. Give up.
entry_sword: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.

name: Onix
entry_red: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.
entry_blue: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.
entry_gold: It twists and squirms through the ground. The thunderous roar of its tunneling echoes a long way.
entry_ruby: ONIX has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this POKéMON does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.
entry_diamond: When it travels underground, it causes rumbling and tremors. It can move at 50 mph.
entry_black: It burrows through the ground at a speed of 50 mph while feeding on large boulders.
entry_x: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by Diglett.
entry_sword: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: Drowzee
entry_red: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.
entry_blue: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.
entry_gold: If you think that you had a good dream, but you can't remember it, a DROWZEE has probably eaten it.
entry_ruby: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it’s a sure sign that one of these POKéMON is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.
entry_diamond: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.
entry_black: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.
entry_x: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.
entry_sun: A Pokémon that nourishes itself by eating dreams, it is thought to share common ancestry with Munna and Musharna.

name: Hypno
entry_red: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.
entry_blue: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.
entry_gold: When it is very hungry, it puts humans it meets to sleep, then it feasts on their dreams.
entry_ruby: HYPNO holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this POKéMON searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
entry_diamond: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
entry_black: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
entry_x: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.
entry_sun: While it is an extremely dangerous Pokémon, people who are in need of a good, sound sleep call it their savior.

name: Krabby
abilities: Hyper Cutter, Shell Armor, Sheer Force
entry_red: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
entry_blue: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
entry_gold: If it senses dan­ ger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
entry_ruby: KRABBY live on beaches, burrowed inside holes dug into the sand. On sandy beaches with little in the way of food, these POKéMON can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.
entry_diamond: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are broken in battle.
entry_black: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are broken in battle.
entry_x: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
entry_sword: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

name: Kingler
abilities: Hyper Cutter, Shell Armor, Sheer Force
entry_red: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
entry_blue: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
entry_gold: It can hardly lift its massive, overgrown pincer. The pincer's size makes it difficult to aim properly.
entry_ruby: KINGLER has an enormous, oversized claw. It waves this huge claw in the air to communicate with others. However, because the claw is so heavy, the POKéMON quickly tires.
entry_diamond: The larger pincer has 10,000- horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.
entry_black: The larger pincer has 10,000- horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.
entry_x: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
entry_sword: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

name: Voltorb
entry_red: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.
entry_blue: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.
entry_gold: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.
entry_ruby: VOLTORB was first sighted at a company that manufactures POKé BALLS. The link between that sighting and the fact that this POKéMON looks very similar to a POKé BALL remains a mystery.
entry_diamond: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.
entry_black: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.
entry_x: It was discovered when Poké Balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.

name: Electrode
entry_red: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
entry_blue: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
entry_gold: It is dangerous. If it has too much electricity and has nothing to do, it amuses itself by exploding.
entry_ruby: ELECTRODE eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this POKéMON exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.
entry_diamond: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
entry_black: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
entry_x: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of “The Bomb Ball.”

name: Exeggcute
entry_red: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.
entry_blue: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.
entry_gold: The shell is very durable. Even if it cracks, it can survive without spilling the contents.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON consists of six eggs that form a closely knit cluster. The six eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear on the eggs, EXEGGCUTE is close to evolution.
entry_diamond: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.
entry_black: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.
entry_x: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.
entry_sun: Its six eggs use telepathy to communicate among themselves. It is believed to carry plant genes and the genes of other species.
entry_sword: Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

name: Exeggutor
entry_red: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.
entry_blue: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.
entry_gold: Its three heads think independent­ ly. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
entry_ruby: EXEGGUTOR originally came from the tropics. Its heads steadily grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall off, they group together to form EXEGGCUTE.
entry_diamond: It is called “The Walking Jungle.” If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an EXEGGCUTE.
entry_black: It is called “The Walking Jungle.” If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.
entry_x: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
entry_sun: Each of its heads has its own will. They use telepathy to discuss their plans before coming to a joint decision.
entry_sword: Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.

name: Cubone
abilities: Rock Head, Lightning Rod, Battle Armor
entry_red: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.
entry_blue: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.
entry_gold: If it is sad or lonely, the skull it wears shakes, and emits a plain­ tive and mournful sound.
entry_ruby: CUBONE pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull the POKéMON wears are made by the tears it sheds.
entry_diamond: When it thinks of its dead mother, it cries. Its crying makes the skull it wears rattle hollowly.
entry_black: When it thinks of its dead mother, it cries. Its crying makes the skull it wears rattle hollowly.
entry_x: It wears the skull of its dead mother on its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is said to cry loudly.
entry_sun: When it thinks of its deceased mother, it weeps loudly. Mandibuzz that hear its cries will attack it from the air.
entry_sword: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.

name: Marowak
abilities: Rock Head, Lightning Rod, Battle Armor
entry_red: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
entry_blue: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
entry_gold: It has been seen pounding boulders with the bone it carries in order to tap out mes­ sages to others.
entry_ruby: MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This POKéMON’s tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
entry_diamond: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
entry_black: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
entry_x: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
entry_sun: Originally, it was weak and timid. After evolution, its temperament becomes violent, and it begins to wield bones as weapons.
entry_sword: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

name: Hitmonlee
entry_red: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.
entry_blue: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.
entry_gold: This amazing POKé­ MON has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
entry_ruby: HITMONLEE’s legs freely contract and stretch. Using these springlike legs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles to overcome fatigue.
entry_diamond: Its legs can stretch double. First-time foes are startled by its extensible reach.
entry_black: Its legs can stretch double. First-time foes are startled by its extensible reach.
entry_x: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
entry_sword: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

name: Hitmonchan
abilities: Keen Eye, Iron Fist, Inner Focus
entry_red: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.
entry_blue: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.
entry_gold: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
entry_ruby: HITMONCHAN is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had been working towards a world championship. This POKéMON has an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face of adversity.
entry_diamond: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.
entry_black: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.
entry_x: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.
entry_sword: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

name: Lickitung
entry_red: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.
entry_blue: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.
entry_gold: Its tongue has well-developed nerves that run to the very tip, so it can be deft­ ly manipulated.
entry_ruby: Whenever LICKITUNG comes across something new, it will unfailingly give it a lick. It does so because it memorizes things by texture and by taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.
entry_diamond: Instead of hands, it uses its tongue, which is twice its height. Its sticky saliva grips anything.
entry_black: When it extends its over-six-foot- long tongue, its tail quivers. There is a possibility they are connected.
entry_x: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.
entry_sword: If this Pokémon’s sticky saliva gets on you and you don’t clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won’t go away, either.

name: Koffing
entry_red: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.
entry_blue: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.
entry_gold: Its thin, filmy body is filled with gases that cause constant sniffles, coughs and teary eyes.
entry_ruby: If KOFFING becomes agitated, it raises the toxicity of its internal gases and jets them out from all over its body. This POKéMON may also overinflate its round body, then explode.
entry_diamond: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.
entry_black: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.
entry_x: Its thin, balloon-like body is inflated by horribly toxic gases. It reeks when it is nearby.
entry_sword: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.

name: Weezing
entry_red: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.
entry_blue: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.
entry_gold: If one of the twin KOFFING inflates, the other one deflates. It con­ stantly mixes its poisonous gases.
entry_ruby: WEEZING loves the gases given off by rotted kitchen garbage. This POKéMON will find a dirty, unkempt house and make it its home. At night, when the people in the house are asleep, it will go through the trash.
entry_diamond: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
entry_black: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
entry_x: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
entry_sword: It mixes gases between its two bodies. It’s said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.

name: Rhyhorn
entry_red: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.
entry_blue: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.
entry_gold: It is inept at turning because of its four short legs. It can only charge and run in one direction.
entry_ruby: RHYHORN runs in a straight line, smashing everything in its path. It is not bothered even if it rushes headlong into a block of steel. This POKéMON may feel some pain from the collision the next day, however.
entry_diamond: Its body is clad in a thick hide, and its tackles topple buildings. Unfortunately, it is not smart.
entry_black: Its powerful tackles can destroy anything. However, it is too slow witted to help people work.
entry_x: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging Tackles.
entry_sword: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

name: Rhydon
entry_red: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.
entry_blue: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.
entry_gold: Its rugged hide protects it from even the heat of lava. However, the hide also makes it insensitive.
entry_ruby: RHYDON’s horn can crush even uncut diamonds. One sweeping blow of its tail can topple a building. This POKéMON’s hide is extremely tough. Even direct cannon hits don’t leave a scratch.
entry_diamond: Its brain developed after it stood up on its hind legs. Its drill horn bores tunnels through solid rock.
entry_black: Standing on its hind legs freed its forelegs and made it smarter. It is very forgetful, however.
entry_x: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
entry_sword: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

name: Chansey
entry_red: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.
entry_blue: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.
entry_gold: It walks carefully to prevent its egg from breaking. However, it is extremely fast at running away.
entry_ruby: CHANSEY lays nutritionally excellent eggs on an everyday basis. The eggs are so delicious, they are easily and eagerly devoured by even those people who have lost their appetite.
entry_diamond: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its eggs with injured people.
entry_black: A kindly Pokémon that lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.
entry_x: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its eggs with injured people.
entry_sun: The eggs laid by Chansey are rich in nutrients and a favorite food of many Pokémon.
entry_sword: The egg Chansey carries is not only delicious but also packed with nutrition. It’s used as a high-class cooking ingredient.

name: Tangela
entry_red: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to sea­ weed. Its vines shake as it walks.
entry_blue: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to sea­ weed. Its vines shake as it walks.
entry_gold: The vines that cloak its entire body are always jiggling. They effectively un­ nerve its foes.
entry_ruby: TANGELA’s vines snap off easily if they are grabbed. This happens without pain, allowing it to make a quick getaway. The lost vines are replaced by newly grown vines the very next day.
entry_diamond: It is shrouded by blue vines. No one has seen the face hidden behind this growth of vines.
entry_black: The blue vines shrouding its body are covered in a growth of fine hair. It is known to be ticklish.
entry_x: Many writhing vines cover it, so its true identity remains unknown. The blue vines grow its whole life long.
entry_sword: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon’s true appearance remains a mystery.

name: Kangaskhan
entry_red: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.
entry_blue: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.
entry_gold: If it is safe, the young gets out of the belly pouch to play. The adult keeps a close eye on the youngster.
entry_ruby: If you come across a young KANGASKHAN playing by itself, you must never disturb it or attempt to catch it. The baby POKéMON’s parent is sure to be in the area, and it will become violently enraged at you.
entry_diamond: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.
entry_black: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.
entry_x: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.
entry_sun: Kangaskhan’s maternal love is so deep that it will brave death to protect its offspring.
entry_sword: Although it’s carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

name: Horsea
entry_red: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
entry_blue: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
entry_gold: If attacked by a larger enemy, it quickly swims to safety by adeptly controlling its dorsal fin.
entry_ruby: HORSEA eats small insects and moss off of rocks. If the ocean current turns fast, this POKéMON anchors itself by wrapping its tail around rocks or coral to prevent being washed away.
entry_diamond: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.
entry_black: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.
entry_x: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
entry_sword: Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits out pitch-black ink and escapes.

name: Seadra
entry_red: Capable of swim­ ming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.
entry_blue: Capable of swim­ ming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.
entry_gold: An examination of its cells revealed the presence of a gene not found in HORSEA. It became a hot topic.
entry_ruby: SEADRA sleeps after wriggling itself between the branches of coral. Those trying to harvest coral are occasionally stung by this POKéMON’s poison barbs if they fail to notice it.
entry_diamond: Its spines provide protection. Its fins and bones are prized as traditional medicine ingredients.
entry_black: Its spines provide protection. Its fins and bones are prized as traditional medicine ingredients.
entry_x: Its body bristles with sharp spikes. Carelessly trying to touch it could cause fainting from the spikes.
entry_sword: It’s the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.

name: Goldeen
abilities: Swift Swim, Water Veil, Lightning Rod
entry_red: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.
entry_blue: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.
entry_gold: Its dorsal, pecto­ ral and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the water dancer.
entry_ruby: GOLDEEN is a very beautiful POKéMON with fins that billow elegantly in water. However, don’t let your guard down around this POKéMON - it could ram you powerfully with its horn.
entry_diamond: It swims elegantly by flittering its tail fin as if it were a dress. It has the look of a queen.
entry_black: Though it appears very elegant when swimming with fins unfurled, it can jab powerfully with its horn.
entry_x: It swims at a steady 5 knots. If it senses danger, it will strike back with its sharp horn.
entry_sun: When the weather grows warm, they form groups and swim upriver. This sight serves as a poetic reminder that spring has arrived.
entry_sword: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.

name: Seaking
abilities: Swift Swim, Water Veil, Lightning Rod
entry_red: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming power­ fully up rivers and creeks.
entry_blue: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming power­ fully up rivers and creeks.
entry_gold: During spawning season, SEAKING gather from all over, coloring the rivers a brilliant red.
entry_ruby: In the autumn, SEAKING males can be seen performing courtship dances in riverbeds to woo females. During this season, this POKéMON’s body coloration is at its most beautiful.
entry_diamond: It makes its nest by hollowing out boulders in streams with its horn. It defends its eggs with its life.
entry_black: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.
entry_x: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.
entry_sun: When the weather grows cold, its whole body flushes a deep red. This sight serves as a poetic reminder that autumn has arrived.
entry_sword: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

name: Staryu
entry_red: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.
entry_blue: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.
entry_gold: At night, the cen­ ter of its body slowly flickers with the same rhythm as a human heartbeat.
entry_ruby: STARYU’s center section has an organ called the core that shines bright red. If you go to a beach toward the end of summer, the glowing cores of these POKéMON look like the stars in the sky.
entry_diamond: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.
entry_black: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.
entry_x: Even if its body is torn, it can regenerate as long as the glowing central core remains intact.
entry_sun: Large numbers of these Pokémon make their home at the seaside. At night, a strange red glow radiates from the center of their bodies.
entry_sword: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you’ll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.

name: Starmie
entry_red: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
entry_blue: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
entry_gold: The center section of its body is called the core. It glows in a dif­ ferent color each time it is seen.
entry_ruby: STARMIE’s center section - the core - glows brightly in seven colors. Because of its luminous nature, this POKéMON has been given the nickname “the gem of the sea.”
entry_diamond: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.
entry_black: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.
entry_x: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
entry_sun: Its shining core is thought to receive and transmit enigmatic signals. It has been known to cause headaches in those who approach it.
entry_sword: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.

name: Mr Mime
entry_red: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.
entry_blue: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.
entry_gold: A skilled mime from birth, it gains the ability to create invisi­ ble objects as it matures.
entry_ruby: MR. MIME is a master of pantomime. Its gestures and motions convince watchers that something unseeable actually exists. Once it is believed, it will exist as if it were a real thing.
entry_diamond: It is a pantomime expert that can create invisible but solid walls using miming gestures.
entry_black: It shapes an invisible wall in midair by minutely vibrating its fingertips to stop molecules in the air.
entry_x: Emanations from its fingertips solidify the air into invisible walls that repel even harsh attacks.
entry_sword: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

name: Scyther
entry_red: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.
entry_blue: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.
entry_gold: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.
entry_ruby: SCYTHER is blindingly fast. Its blazing speed enhances the effectiveness of the twin scythes on its forearms. This POKéMON’s scythes are so effective, they can slice through thick logs in one wicked stroke.
entry_diamond: It is nearly impossible to parry its attacking scythes. Its movements are like a ninja’s.
entry_black: The sharp scythes on its forearms become increasingly sharp by cutting through hard objects.
entry_x: It tears and shreds prey with its wickedly sharp scythes. It very rarely spreads its wings to fly.
entry_sun: It confuses its prey with its quick, ninja-like movements. Then, in an instant, it cleaves them with its scythes.
entry_sword: As Scyther fights more and more battles, its scythes become sharper and sharper. With a single slice, Scyther can fell a massive tree.

name: Jynx
entry_red: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
entry_blue: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
entry_gold: It rocks its body rhythmically. It appears to alter the rhythm depend­ ing on how it is feeling.
entry_ruby: JYNX walks rhythmically, swaying and shaking its hips as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without giving any thought to what they are doing.
entry_diamond: Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.
entry_black: Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.
entry_x: It wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
entry_sword: In certain parts of Galar, Jynx was once feared and worshiped as the Queen of Ice.

name: Electabuzz
entry_red: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
entry_blue: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
entry_gold: Electricity runs across the surface of its body. In darkness, its en­ tire body glows a whitish-blue.
entry_ruby: When a storm arrives, gangs of this POKéMON compete with each other to scale heights that are likely to be stricken by lightning bolts. Some towns use ELECTABUZZ in place of lightning rods.
entry_diamond: Half of all blackouts occur when this Pokémon appears at power plants and eats electricity.
entry_black: It windmills its arms to slightly boost its punches. Foes have been known to escape in the meantime.
entry_x: Electricity runs across the surface of its body. In darkness, its entire body glows a whitish blue.
entry_sun: Half of all sudden blackouts are caused by Electabuzz gathering at electric power plants and gobbling up electricity.
entry_sword: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

name: Magmar
entry_red: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.
entry_blue: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.
entry_gold: It dislikes cold places, so it blows scorching flames to make the environment suit­ able for itself.
entry_ruby: In battle, MAGMAR blows out intensely hot flames from all over its body to intimidate its opponent. This POKéMON’s fiery bursts create heat waves that ignite grass and trees in its surroundings.
entry_diamond: Born in the spout of a volcano, its body is covered by flames that shimmer like the sun.
entry_black: When it breathes deeply, heat waves form around its body, making it hard to see clearly.
entry_x: Found near the mouth of a volcano. This fire-breather’s body temperature is nearly 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit.
entry_sun: When it’s tired, it leaps into the mouth of a volcano and soaks its body in magma to ease its weariness. Its body burns at 2,192 degrees F.
entry_sword: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

name: Pinsir
entry_red: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.
entry_blue: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.
entry_gold: With its horns, it digs burrows to sleep in at night. In the morning, damp soil clings to its body.
entry_ruby: PINSIR is astoundingly strong. It can grip a foe weighing twice its weight in its horns and easily lift it. This POKéMON’s movements turn sluggish in cold places.
entry_diamond: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can’t tear, it tosses far.
entry_black: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can’t tear, it tosses far.
entry_x: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can’t tear, it tosses far.
entry_sun: It grips its prey in its pincers and splits them apart. Although it is a powerful Pokémon, it can’t deal with the cold.
entry_sword: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.

name: Tauros
entry_red: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.
entry_blue: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.
entry_gold: They fight each other by locking horns. The herd's protector takes pride in its bat­ tle-scarred horns.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON is not satisfied unless it is rampaging at all times. If there is no opponent for TAUROS to battle, it will charge at thick trees and knock them down to calm itself.
entry_diamond: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.
entry_black: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.
entry_x: After heightening its will to fight by whipping itself with its three tails, it charges at full speed.
entry_sun: Historically, people in areas all over the world have ridden Tauros, but the practice is said to have started in Alola.
entry_sword: When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails, it’s a warning that the Pokémon is about to charge with astounding speed.

name: Magikarp
entry_red: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
entry_blue: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
entry_gold: An underpowered, pathetic POKéMON. It may jump high on rare occasions, but never more than seven feet.
entry_ruby: MAGIKARP is a pathetic excuse for a POKéMON that is only capable of flopping and splashing. This behavior prompted scientists to undertake research into it.
entry_diamond: It is said to be the world’s weakest Pokémon. No one knows why it has managed to survive.
entry_black: A Magikarp living for many years can leap a mountain using Splash. The move remains useless, though.
entry_x: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokémon in the world.
entry_sun: Although weak and helpless, this Pokémon is incredibly fertile. They exist in such multitudes, you’ll soon grow tired of seeing them.
entry_sword: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokémon in the world.

name: Gyarados
entry_red: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
entry_blue: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
entry_gold: They say that during past wars, GYARADOS would appear and leave blazing ruins in its wake.
entry_ruby: When MAGIKARP evolves into GYARADOS, its brain cells undergo a structural transformation. It is said that this transformation is to blame for this POKéMON’s wildly violent nature.
entry_diamond: Once it appears, its rage never settles until it has razed the fields and mountains around it.
entry_black: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.
entry_x: In ancient literature, there is a record of a Gyarados that razed a village when violence flared.
entry_sun: A tale is told of a town that angered Gyarados. Before the sun rose the next day, flames utterly consumed the town, leaving not a trace behind.
entry_sword: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.

name: Lapras
entry_red: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.
entry_blue: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.
entry_gold: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their num­ ber has dwindled.
entry_ruby: People have driven LAPRAS almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, this POKéMON is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.
entry_diamond: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.
entry_black: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.
entry_x: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their number has dwindled.
entry_sun: Its high intelligence enables it to comprehend human speech. When it’s in a good mood, it sings in its beautiful voice.
entry_sword: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.

name: Ditto
entry_red: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.
entry_blue: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.
entry_gold: It can transform into anything. When it sleeps, it changes into a stone to avoid being attacked.
entry_ruby: DITTO rearranges its cell structure to transform itself into other shapes. However, if it tries to transform itself into something by relying on its memory, this POKéMON manages to get details wrong.
entry_diamond: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.
entry_black: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.
entry_x: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.
entry_sun: It can reorganize its cells to make itself into a duplicate of anything it sees. The quality of the duplicate depends on the individual.
entry_sword: It can reconstitute its entire cellular structure to change into what it sees, but it returns to normal when it relaxes.

name: Eevee
entry_red: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.
entry_blue: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.
entry_gold: It has the ability to alter the com­ position of its body to suit its surrounding envi­ ronment.
entry_ruby: EEVEE has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives. Radiation from various STONES causes this POKéMON to evolve.
entry_diamond: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
entry_black: Because its genetic makeup is irregular, it quickly changes its form due to a variety of causes.
entry_x: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
entry_sun: Possessing an unbalanced and unstable genetic makeup, it conceals many possible evolutions.
entry_sword: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.

name: Vaporeon
entry_red: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.
entry_blue: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.
entry_gold: When VAPOREON's fins begin to vi­ brate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.
entry_ruby: VAPOREON underwent a spontaneous mutation and grew fins and gills that allow it to live underwater. This POKéMON has the ability to freely control water.
entry_diamond: It has evolved to be suitable for an aquatic life. It can invisibly melt away into water.
entry_black: Its cell composition is similar to water molecules. As a result, it can melt away into water.
entry_x: It prefers beautiful shores. With cells similar to water molecules, it could melt in water.
entry_sun: Its cells are composed of units much like water molecules. It lives close to water and is often mistaken for a mermaid.
entry_sword: When Vaporeon’s fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.

name: Jolteon
entry_red: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.
entry_blue: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.
entry_gold: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.
entry_ruby: JOLTEON’s cells generate a low level of electricity. This power is amplified by the static electricity of its fur, enabling the POKéMON to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of electrically charged needles.
entry_diamond: It controls 10,000-volt power and can raise all the fur on its body as if it were sharp needles.
entry_black: If agitated, it uses electricity to straighten out its fur and launch it in small bunches.
entry_x: Every hair on its body starts to stand sharply on end if it becomes charged with electricity.
entry_sun: They send out electrical charges of about 10,000 volts. Because they are high-strung, it can be difficult to grow close to them.
entry_sword: If it is angered or startled, the fur all over its body bristles like sharp needles that pierce foes.

name: Flareon
entry_red: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.
entry_blue: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.
entry_gold: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees.
entry_ruby: FLAREON’s fluffy fur has a functional purpose - it releases heat into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot. This POKéMON’s body temperature can rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees F.
entry_diamond: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.
entry_black: Inhaled air is heated in the flame sac in its body to an intense fire over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
entry_x: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.
entry_sun: When it catches prey or finds berries, it breathes fire on them until they’re well done, and then it gobbles them up.
entry_sword: Once it has stored up enough heat, this Pokémon’s body temperature can reach up to 1,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Porygon
entry_red: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.
entry_blue: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.
entry_gold: It is a manmade POKéMON. Since it doesn't breathe, people are eager to try it in any environment.
entry_ruby: PORYGON is capable of reverting itself entirely back to program data and entering cyberspace. This POKéMON is copy-protected so it cannot be duplicated by copying.
entry_diamond: The world’s first artificially created Pokémon. It can travel through electronic space.
entry_black: A man-made Pokémon created using advanced scientific means. It can move freely in cyberspace.
entry_x: A man-made Pokémon that came about as a result of research. It is programmed with only basic motions.
entry_sun: Roughly 20 years ago, it was artificially created, utilizing the latest technology of the time.
entry_sword: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be created via computer programming.

name: Omanyte
abilities: Swift Swim, Shell Armor, Weak Armor
entry_red: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.
entry_blue: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.
entry_gold: Revived from an ancient fossil, this POKéMON uses air stored in its shell to sink and rise in water.
entry_ruby: OMANYTE is one of the ancient and long- since-extinct POKéMON that have been regenerated from fossils by people. If attacked by an enemy, it withdraws itself inside its hard shell.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil using modern science. It swam in ancient seas.
entry_black: A Pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil using modern science. It swam in ancient seas.
entry_x: A prehistoric Pokémon that lived in the primordial sea, it swims by twisting its 10 tentacles about.
entry_sword: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem.

name: Omastar
abilities: Swift Swim, Shell Armor, Weak Armor
entry_red: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.
entry_blue: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.
entry_gold: Apparently, it cracked SHELLDER's shell with its sharp fangs and sucked out the insides.
entry_ruby: OMASTAR uses its tentacles to capture its prey. It is believed to have become extinct because its shell grew too large and heavy, causing its movements to become too slow and ponderous.
entry_diamond: It is thought that this Pokémon became extinct because its spiral shell grew too large.
entry_black: It is thought that this Pokémon became extinct because its spiral shell grew too large.
entry_x: Its tentacles are highly developed as if they are hands and feet. As soon as it ensnares prey, it bites.
entry_sword: Weighed down by a large and heavy shell, Omastar couldn’t move very fast. Some say it went extinct because it was unable to catch food.

name: Kabuto
abilities: Swift Swim, Battle Armor, Weak Armor
entry_red: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.
entry_blue: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.
entry_gold: On rare occasions, some have been found as fossils which they became while hiding on the ocean floor.
entry_ruby: KABUTO is a POKéMON that has been regenerated from a fossil. However, in extremely rare cases, living examples have been discovered. The POKéMON has not changed at all for 300 million years.
entry_diamond: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.
entry_black: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.
entry_x: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.
entry_sword: This species is almost entirely extinct. Kabuto molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder.

name: Kabutops
abilities: Swift Swim, Battle Armor, Weak Armor
entry_red: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.
entry_blue: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.
entry_gold: In the water, it tucks in its limbs to become more compact, then it wiggles its shell to swim fast.
entry_ruby: KABUTOPS swam underwater to hunt for its prey in ancient times. The POKéMON was apparently evolving from being a water-dweller to living on land as evident from the beginnings of change in its gills and legs.
entry_diamond: It is thought that this Pokémon came onto land because its prey adapted to life on land.
entry_black: It is thought that this Pokémon came onto land because its prey adapted to life on land.
entry_x: In the water, it tucks in its limbs to become more compact, then it wiggles its shell to swim fast.
entry_sword: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokémon.

name: Aerodactyl
entry_red: A ferocious, pre­ historic POKéMON that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.
entry_blue: A ferocious, pre­ historic POKéMON that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.
entry_gold: A vicious POKéMON from the distant past, it appears to have flown by spreading its wings and gliding.
entry_ruby: AERODACTYL is a POKéMON from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
entry_black: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
entry_x: It was regenerated from a dinosaur’s genetic matter that was found in amber. It flies with high-pitched cries.
entry_sun: A Pokémon from the age of the dinosaurs. It used its sawlike fangs to shred its prey before eating them.
entry_sword: This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient times. Apparently even modern technology is incapable of producing a perfectly restored specimen.

name: Snorlax
entry_red: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.
entry_blue: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.
entry_gold: What sounds like its cry may ac­ tually be its snores or the rumblings of its hungry belly.
entry_ruby: SNORLAX’s typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile POKéMON that there are children who use its expansive belly as a place to play.
entry_diamond: Its stomach can digest any kind of food, even if it happens to be moldy or rotten.
entry_black: When its belly is full, it becomes too lethargic to even lift a finger, so it is safe to bounce on its belly.
entry_x: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
entry_sun: Its stomach is said to be incomparably strong. Even Muk’s poison is nothing more than a hint of spice on Snorlax’s tongue.
entry_sword: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

name: Articuno
entry_red: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.
entry_blue: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.
entry_gold: The magnificent, seemingly translu­ cent wings of this legendary bird POKéMON are said to be made of ice.
entry_ruby: ARTICUNO is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this POKéMON flies, snow will fall.
entry_diamond: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_black: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_x: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_sword: It’s said that this Pokémon’s beautiful blue wings are made of ice. Articuno flies over snowy mountains, its long tail fluttering along behind it.

name: Zapdos
entry_red: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
entry_blue: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
entry_gold: This legendary bird POKéMON causes savage thunderstorms by flapping its glit­ tering wings.

entry_diamond: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.
entry_black: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.
entry_x: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
entry_sword: This Pokémon has complete control over electricity. There are tales of Zapdos nesting in the dark depths of pitch-black thunderclouds.

name: Moltres
entry_red: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.
entry_blue: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.
entry_gold: This legendary POKéMON scatters embers with every flap of its wings. It is a thrilling sight to behold.
entry_ruby: MOLTRES is a legendary bird POKéMON that has the ability to control fire. If this POKéMON is injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.
entry_diamond: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.
entry_black: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.
entry_x: It is said to be the legendary bird Pokémon of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.
entry_sword: It’s one of the legendary bird Pokémon. When Moltres flaps its flaming wings, they glimmer with a dazzling red glow.

name: Dratini
entry_red: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.
entry_blue: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.
entry_gold: It is born large to start with. It repeatedly sheds its skin as it steadily grows longer.
entry_ruby: DRATINI continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.
entry_diamond: It is called the “Mirage Pokémon” because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.
entry_black: It is called the “Mirage Pokémon” because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.
entry_x: It is called the “Mirage Pokémon” because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.
entry_sun: It grows by molting repeatedly. Boots made from the tanned cast-off skin are a super luxury item.
entry_sword: Dratini dwells near bodies of rapidly flowing water, such as the plunge pools of waterfalls. As it grows, Dratini will shed its skin many times.

name: Dragonair
entry_red: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.
entry_blue: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.
entry_gold: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly.
entry_ruby: DRAGONAIR stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter weather conditions in its vicinity by discharging energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.
entry_diamond: If its body takes on an aura, the weather changes instantly. It is said to live in seas and lakes.
entry_black: If its body takes on an aura, the weather changes instantly. It is said to live in seas and lakes.
entry_x: Its crystalline orbs appear to give this Pokémon the power to freely control the weather.
entry_sun: It has long been thought that its crystalline orbs are imbued with the power to control the weather.
entry_sword: This Pokémon lives in pristine oceans and lakes. It can control the weather, and it uses this power to fly into the sky, riding on the wind.

name: Dragonite
entry_red: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
entry_blue: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
entry_gold: It is said that this POKéMON con­ stantly flies over the immense seas and rescues drown­ ing people.
entry_ruby: DRAGONITE is capable of circling the globe in just sixteen hours. It is a kindhearted POKéMON that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.
entry_diamond: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.
entry_black: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.
entry_x: It can fly in spite of its big and bulky physique. It circles the globe in just 16 hours.
entry_sun: This Pokémon saved a shipwrecked man, taking him to a remote island—a paradise occupied solely by Dragonite.
entry_sword: It’s a kindhearted Pokémon. If it spots a drowning person or Pokémon, Dragonite simply must help them.

name: Mewtwo
entry_red: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.
entry_blue: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.
entry_gold: Because its battle abilities were raised to the ultimate level, it thinks only of de­ feating its foes.
entry_ruby: MEWTWO is a POKéMON that was created by genetic manipulation. However, even though the scientific power of humans created this POKéMON’s body, they failed to endow MEWTWO with a compassionate heart.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon created by recombining MEW’s genes. It’s said to have the most savage heart among Pokémon.
entry_black: A Pokémon created by recombining Mew’s genes. It’s said to have the most savage heart among Pokémon.
entry_x: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.

name: Mew
entry_red: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
entry_blue: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
entry_gold: Apparently, it appears only to those people who are pure of heart and have a strong desire to see it.
entry_ruby: MEW is said to possess the genetic composition of all POKéMON. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.
entry_diamond: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe MEW to be the ancestor of Pokémon.
entry_black: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.
entry_x: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.

name: Chikorita
entry_gold: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up the sun's rays.
entry_ruby: In battle, CHIKORITA waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling POKéMON and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.
entry_diamond: It uses the leaf on its head to determine the temperature and humidity. It loves to sunbathe.
entry_black: It uses the leaf on its head to determine the temperature and humidity. It loves to sunbathe.
entry_x: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up sun rays.

name: Bayleef
entry_gold: The scent of spices comes from around its neck. Somehow, sniffing it makes you want to fight.
entry_ruby: BAYLEEF’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.
entry_diamond: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.
entry_black: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.
entry_x: A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.

name: Meganium
entry_gold: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.
entry_ruby: The fragrance of MEGANIUM’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this POKéMON gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.
entry_diamond: Its breath has the fantastic ability to revive dead plants and flowers.
entry_black: Its breath has the fantastic ability to revive dead plants and flowers.
entry_x: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.

name: Cyndaquil
entry_gold: It is timid, and always curls it­ self up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
entry_ruby: CYNDAQUIL protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the POKéMON is angry. However, if it is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.
entry_diamond: It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.
entry_black: It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.
entry_x: It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.

name: Quilava
entry_gold: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.
entry_ruby: QUILAVA keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This POKéMON applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.
entry_diamond: It intimidates foes with the heat of its flames. The fire burns more strongly when it readies to fight.
entry_black: It intimidates foes with the heat of its flames. The fire burns more strongly when it readies to fight.
entry_x: Before battle, it turns its back on its opponent to demonstrate how ferociously its fire blazes.

name: Typhlosion
entry_gold: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.
