entry_ruby: TYPHLOSION obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This POKéMON creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
entry_diamond: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.
entry_black: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.
entry_x: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.

name: Totodile
entry_gold: Its well-developed jaws are powerful and capable of crushing anything. Even its trainer must be careful.
entry_ruby: Despite the smallness of its body, TOTODILE’s jaws are very powerful. While the POKéMON may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.
entry_diamond: It has the habit of biting anything with its developed jaws. Even its Trainer needs to be careful.
entry_black: It has the habit of biting anything with its developed jaws. Even its Trainer needs to be careful.
entry_x: It is small but rough and tough. It won’t hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves.

name: Croconaw
entry_gold: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.
entry_ruby: Once CROCONAW has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when  they have sunk in.
entry_diamond: Once it bites down, it won’t let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.
entry_black: Once it bites down, it won’t let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.
entry_x: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.

name: Feraligatr
entry_gold: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.
entry_ruby: FERALIGATR intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
entry_diamond: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.
entry_black: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.
entry_x: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.

name: Sentret
entry_gold: A very cautious POKéMON, it raises itself up using its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.
entry_ruby: When SENTRET sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this POKéMON becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.
entry_diamond: It has a very nervous nature. It stands up high on its tail so it can scan wide areas.
entry_black: It has a very nervous nature. It stands up high on its tail so it can scan wide areas.
entry_x: When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.

name: Furret
entry_gold: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other POKéMON to enter.
entry_ruby: FURRET has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this POKéMON is very nimble and fleet.
entry_diamond: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.
entry_black: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.
entry_x: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.

name: Hoothoot
entry_gold: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
entry_ruby: HOOTHOOT has an internal organ that senses and tracks the earth’s rotation. Using this special organ, this POKéMON begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.
entry_diamond: It always stands on one foot. Even when attacked, it does not brace itself using both feet.
entry_black: It marks time precisely. Some countries consider it to be a wise friend, versed in the world’s ways.
entry_x: It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head in time.
entry_sword: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

name: Noctowl
entry_gold: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
entry_ruby: NOCTOWL never fails at catching prey in darkness. This POKéMON owes its success to its superior vision that allows it to see in minimal light, and to its soft,  supple wings that make no sound in flight.
entry_diamond: Its eyes are special. They can pick out objects as long as there is the tiniest amount of light.
entry_black: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.
entry_x: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
entry_sword: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.

name: Ledyba
entry_gold: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.
entry_ruby: LEDYBA secretes an aromatic fluid from where its legs join its body. This fluid is used for communicating with others. This POKéMON conveys its feelings to others by altering the fluid’s scent.
entry_diamond: It is so timid, it can’t move if it isn’t with a swarm of others. It conveys its feelings with scent.
entry_black: It is so timid, it can’t move if it isn’t with a swarm of others. It conveys its feelings with scent.
entry_x: When the weather turns cold, lots of Ledyba gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.
entry_sun: They are timid and grow uneasy when not in a swarm with others of their kind. The pattern on their backs differs slightly from one to another.

name: Ledian
entry_gold: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
entry_ruby: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live LEDIAN in countless numbers. There is a good reason for this - the POKéMON uses the light of the stars as its energy.
entry_diamond: It uses starlight as energy. When more stars appear at night, the patterns on its back grow larger.
entry_black: It uses starlight as energy. When more stars appear at night, the patterns on its back grow larger.
entry_x: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
entry_sun: While it’s believed that starlight provides it with energy, this Pokémon also loves to eat berries. In the daytime, it curls up in the grass to sleep.

name: Spinarak
entry_gold: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
entry_ruby: The web spun by SPINARAK can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that this POKéMON can determine what kind of prey is touching its web just by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web’s strands.
entry_diamond: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong silk. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.
entry_black: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong silk. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.
entry_x: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.
entry_sun: It waits intently until its preferred prey, Cutiefly, gets caught in its web. In fact, it’s quite a patient Pokémon.

name: Ariados
entry_gold: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It is hard to tell which end is which.
entry_ruby: ARIADOS’s feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This POKéMON constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.
entry_diamond: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.
entry_black: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.
entry_x: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It’s hard to tell which end is which.
entry_sun: There are some areas where people use the string Ariados spins for their own weaving. The resulting cloth is popular for its strength.

name: Crobat
entry_gold: It flies so si­ lently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
entry_ruby: If this POKéMON is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on either the forelegs or hind legs, it’s proof that CROBAT has been flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.
entry_diamond: Having four wings enables it to fly faster and more quietly. It turns active when the night comes.
entry_black: The transformation of its legs into wings made it better at flying, but more clumsy at walking.
entry_x: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
entry_sun: Both its legs became wings, and as a result, it can’t move well on the ground. All it can do is crawl around.
entry_sword: Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a sound, Crobat flies swiftly toward its prey and sinks its fangs into the nape of its target’s neck.

name: Chinchou
entry_gold: It shoots positive and negative elec­ tricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.
entry_ruby: CHINCHOU lets loose positive and negative electrical charges from its two antennas to make its prey faint. This POKéMON flashes its electric lights to exchange signals with others.
entry_diamond: It discharges positive and negative electricity from its antenna tips to shock its foes.
entry_black: It discharges positive and negative electricity from its antenna tips to shock its foes.
entry_x: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.
entry_sun: Its two antennae were originally fins. It discharges electricity to stun its prey before attacking.
entry_sword: Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both positive and negative charges flowing through them.

name: Lanturn
entry_gold: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.
entry_ruby: LANTURN is nicknamed “the deep-sea star” for its illuminated antenna. This POKéMON produces light by causing a chemical reaction between bacteria and its bodily fluids inside the antenna.
entry_diamond: LANTURN’s light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed “The Deep-Sea Star.”
entry_black: Lanturn’s light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed “The Deep-Sea Star.”
entry_x: Lanturn’s light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed “The Deep-Sea Star.”
entry_sun: Should you peer into the ocean at night and see a light shining like the stars, that is Lanturn.
entry_sword: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.

name: Pichu
entry_gold: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
entry_ruby: PICHU charges itself with electricity more easily on days with thunderclouds or when the air is very dry. You can hear the crackling of static electricity coming off this POKéMON.
entry_diamond: The electric pouches on its cheeks are still small. They cannot store much electricity yet.
entry_black: The electric sacs in its cheeks are small. If even a little electricity leaks, it becomes shocked.
entry_x: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.
entry_sun: It is not yet skilled at controlling electricity. If you take your eyes off it, it may shock itself.
entry_sword: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.

name: Cleffa
abilities: Cute Charm, Magic Guard, Friend Guard
entry_gold: Because of its unusual, star-like silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
entry_ruby: On nights with many shooting stars, CLEFFA can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance through the night and stop only at the break of day, when these POKéMON quench their thirst with the morning dew.
entry_diamond: Its silhouette is like a star. It is believed to arrive riding on shooting stars.
entry_black: It is often seen when shooting stars fill the night skies. It’s said to arrive riding on a shooting star.
entry_x: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
entry_sun: On late nights illuminated by shooting stars, it gazes intently skyward, as if thinking of its home.
entry_sword: According to local rumors, Cleffa are often seen in places where shooting stars have fallen.

name: Igglybuff
entry_gold: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.
entry_ruby: IGGLYBUFF’s vocal chords are not sufficiently developed. It would hurt its throat if it were to sing too much. This POKéMON gargles with freshwater from a clean stream.
entry_diamond: It has a soft and bouncy body. Once it starts bouncing, it becomes impossible to stop.
entry_black: It has a soft and bouncy body. Once it starts bouncing, it becomes impossible to stop.
entry_x: Instead of walking with its short legs, it moves around by bouncing on its soft, tender body.
entry_sun: It likes to sing but is not yet good at it. With praise and encouragement, it will get better little by little.
entry_sword: Igglybuff loves to sing. Its marshmallow-like body gives off a faint sweet smell.

name: Togepi
entry_gold: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
entry_ruby: As its energy, TOGEPI uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and POKéMON. This POKéMON stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell, then shares them with others.
entry_diamond: Its shell is said to be stuffed with happiness that it shares with kindhearted people.
entry_black: It transforms the kindness and joy of others into happiness, which it stores in its shell.
entry_x: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
entry_sword: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: Togetic
entry_gold: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, car­ ing people and shower them with happiness.
entry_ruby: TOGETIC is said to be a POKéMON that brings good fortune. When the POKéMON spots someone who is pure of heart, it is said to appear and share its happiness with that person.
entry_diamond: It is said to appear in front of kindly people to scatter a glowing down called “joy dust.”
entry_black: To share its happiness, it flies around the world seeking kind- hearted people.
entry_x: It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.
entry_sword: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

name: Natu
entry_gold: Because its wings aren't yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always star­ ing at something.
entry_ruby: NATU cannot fly because its wings are not yet fully grown. If your eyes meet with this POKéMON’s eyes, it will stare back intently at you. But if you move even slightly, it will hop away to safety.
entry_diamond: It picks food from cactus plants, deftly avoiding buds and spines. It seems to skip about to move.
entry_black: It picks food from cactus plants, deftly avoiding buds and spines. It seems to skip about to move.
entry_x: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
entry_sword: It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.

name: Xatu
entry_gold: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
entry_ruby: XATU stands rooted and still in one spot all day long. People believe that this POKéMON does so out of fear of the terrible things it has foreseen in the future.
entry_diamond: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.
entry_black: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.
entry_x: Once it begins to meditate at sunrise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.
entry_sword: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.

name: Mareep
entry_gold: If static elec­ tricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.
entry_ruby: MAREEP’s fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail grows.
entry_diamond: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.
entry_black: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.
entry_x: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.

name: Flaaffy
entry_gold: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won't grow.
entry_ruby: FLAAFFY’s wool quality changes so that it can generate a high amount of static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.
entry_diamond: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.
entry_black: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.
entry_x: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted.

name: Ampharos
entry_gold: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
entry_ruby: AMPHAROS gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used the light of this POKéMON to send signals back and forth with others far away.
entry_diamond: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the tail’s light.
entry_black: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the tail’s light.
entry_x: The tail’s tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

name: Bellossom
entry_gold: BELLOSSOM gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
entry_ruby: When BELLOSSOM gets exposed to plenty of sunlight, the leaves ringing its body begin to spin around. This POKéMON’s dancing is renowned in the southern lands.
entry_diamond: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.
entry_black: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.
entry_x: Bellossom gather at times and seem to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
entry_sword: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

name: Marill
abilities: Thick Fat, Huge Power, Sap Sipper
entry_gold: The tip of its tail, which con­ tains oil that is lighter than wa­ ter, lets it swim without drowning.
entry_ruby: MARILL’s oil-filled tail acts much like a life preserver. If you see just its tail bobbing on the water’s surface, it’s a sure indication that this POKéMON is diving beneath the water to feed on aquatic plants.
entry_diamond: Using its tail as a float, it dives underwater. It likes eating plants that grow on river bottoms.
entry_black: The oil-filled end of its tail floats on water. It keeps Marill from drowning even in a strong current.
entry_x: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry, even when it plays in the water.
entry_sword: This Pokémon uses its round tail as a float. The ball of Marill’s tail is filled with nutrients that have been turned into an oil.

name: Azumarill
abilities: Thick Fat, Huge Power, Sap Sipper
entry_gold: By keeping still and listening in­ tently, it can tell what is in even wild, fast- moving rivers.
entry_ruby: AZUMARILL’s long ears are indispensable sensors. By focusing its hearing, this POKéMON can identify what kinds of prey are around, even in rough and fast-running rivers.
entry_diamond: It lives in rivers and lakes. In water, its coloring and patterns trick the vision of foes.
entry_black: It can spend all day in water, since it can inhale and store a large volume of air.
entry_x: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of living things on riverbeds.
entry_sword: It spends most of its time in the water. On sunny days, Azumarill floats on the surface of the water and sunbathes.

name: Sudowoodo
entry_gold: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composi­ tion appears to be closer to a rock than a plant.
entry_ruby: SUDOWOODO camouflages itself as a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. However, because the forelegs remain green throughout the year, the POKéMON is easily identified as a fake during the winter.
entry_diamond: Despite appearing to be a tree, its body is closer to rocks and stones. It is very weak to water.
entry_black: To avoid being attacked, it does nothing but mimic a tree. It hates water and flees from rain.
entry_x: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.
entry_sun: To avoid attack, it mimics a tree. It will run off if splashed with water, which it hates.
entry_sword: If a tree branch shakes when there is no wind, it’s a Sudowoodo, not a tree. It hides from the rain.

name: Politoed
entry_gold: If POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL hear its echoing cry, they respond by gather­ ing from far and wide.
entry_ruby: The curled hair on POLITOED’s head is proof of its status as a king. It is said that the longer and more curled the hair, the more respect this POKéMON earns from its peers.
entry_diamond: It gathers groups of others as their leader. Its cries make POLIWAG obey.
entry_black: It gathers groups of others as their leader. Its cries make Poliwag obey.
entry_x: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
entry_sun: They gather on moonlit nights to form a large chorus. Their cries sound angry and not at all pleasant, but they are certainly distinctive.
entry_sword: At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on the shores of lakes. They announce their territorial claims by letting out cries that sound like shouting.

name: Hoppip
entry_gold: To keep from being blown away by the wind, they gather in clusters. They do enjoy gentle breezes, though.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, HOPPIP links its leaves with other HOPPIP to prepare against being blown away.
entry_diamond: It drifts on winds. It is said that when HOPPIP gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.
entry_black: It drifts on winds. It is said that when Hoppip gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.
entry_x: Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmly with its feet to keep from being blown away.

name: Skiploom
entry_gold: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluc­ tuates up and down.
entry_ruby: SKIPLOOM’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees F. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason, this POKéMON is sometimes used as a thermometer.
entry_diamond: It blooms when the weather warms. It floats in the sky to soak up as much sunlight as possible.
entry_black: It blooms when the weather warms. It floats in the sky to soak up as much sunlight as possible.
entry_x: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.

name: Jumpluff
entry_gold: Once it catches the wind, it deft­ ly controls its cotton-puff spores to float, even around the world.
entry_ruby: JUMPLUFF rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The POKéMON descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.
entry_diamond: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.
entry_black: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.
entry_x: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.

name: Aipom
entry_gold: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.
entry_ruby: AIPOM’s tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly manipulated. However, because the POKéMON uses its tail so much, its real hands have become rather clumsy.
entry_diamond: It uses its tail to pluck fruits that are out of reach. Its tail is more adept than its real hands.
entry_black: It lives high among the treetops. It can use its tail as freely and cleverly as its hands.
entry_x: It lives atop tall trees. When leaping from branch to branch, it deftly uses its tail for balance.

name: Sunkern
entry_gold: It may drop out of the sky suddenly. If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will violently shake its leaves.
entry_ruby: SUNKERN tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing,  subsisting only on morning dew.
entry_diamond: It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning. A year after a cold summer, their population explodes.
entry_black: It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning. A year after a cold summer, their population explodes.
entry_x: It may plummet from the sky. If attacked by a Spearow, it will violently shake its leaves.

name: Sunflora
entry_gold: It converts sun­ light into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.
entry_ruby: SUNFLORA converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes down for the night.
entry_diamond: It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for its habit of moving in pursuit of it.
entry_black: It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for its habit of moving in pursuit of it.
entry_x: As the hot season approaches, the petals on this Pokémon’s face become more vivid and lively.

name: Yanma
entry_gold: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter win­ dows in the area.
entry_ruby: YANMA is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This POKéMON uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.
entry_diamond: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won’t miss prey--even those behind it.
entry_black: It can hover in one spot by flapping its wings at high speed. It flits about to guard its territory.
entry_x: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won’t miss prey--even those behind it.

name: Wooper
entry_gold: This POKéMON lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
entry_ruby: WOOPER usually lives in water. However, it occasionally comes out onto land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with a gooey, toxic film.
entry_diamond: It lives in cold water, half burying itself in mud at the bottom to sleep.
entry_black: When walking on land, it covers its body with a poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.
entry_x: This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
entry_sword: This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

name: Quagsire
entry_gold: This carefree POKéMON has an easy-going nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.
entry_ruby: QUAGSIRE hunts for food by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because the POKéMON does not move, it does not get very hungry.
entry_diamond: It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the river’s bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.
entry_black: It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.
entry_x: It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the river’s bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.
entry_sword: It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.

name: Espeon
entry_gold: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its ene­ my's actions.
entry_ruby: ESPEON is extremely loyal to any TRAINER it considers to be worthy. It is said that this POKéMON developed its precognitive powers to protect its TRAINER from harm.
entry_diamond: Its fur has the look and feel of velvet. The orb on its forehead glows when it uses psycho-power.
entry_black: Its fur is so sensitive, it can sense minute shifts in the air and predict the weather.
entry_x: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent’s next move.
entry_sun: It can instantaneously sense its opponent’s movements by feeling air currents with its fine fur.
entry_sword: By reading air currents, it can predict things such as the weather or its foe’s next move.

name: Umbreon
entry_gold: When agitated, this POKéMON pro­ tects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.
entry_ruby: UMBREON evolved as a result of exposure to the moon’s waves. It hides silently in darkness and waits for its foes to make a move. The rings on its body glow when it leaps to attack.
entry_diamond: The light of the moon changed EEVEE’s genetic structure. It lurks in darkness for prey.
entry_black: When exposed to the moon’s aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it gains a mysterious power.
entry_x: The light of the moon changed Eevee’s genetic structure. It lurks in darkness for prey.
entry_sun: When this Pokémon becomes angry, its pores secrete a poisonous sweat, which it sprays at its opponent’s eyes.
entry_sword: When this Pokémon becomes angry, its pores secrete a poisonous sweat, which it sprays at its opponent’s eyes.

name: Murkrow
entry_gold: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
entry_ruby: MURKROW was feared and loathed as the alleged bearer of ill fortune. This POKéMON shows strong interest in anything that sparkles or glitters. It will even try to steal rings from women.
entry_diamond: It is believed that seeing this Pokémon at night will bring about ominous occurrences.
entry_black: If spotted, it will lure an unwary person into chasing it, then lose the pursuer on mountain trails.
entry_x: It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location. Murkrow and Meowth loot one another’s stashes.
entry_sun: They awaken at dusk and take wing in the twilight, leading to the expression, “Get home before the Murkrow fly.”

name: Slowking
entry_gold: It has incredible intellect and in­ tuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
entry_ruby: SLOWKING undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this POKéMON apparently forgets everything it has learned if the SHELLDER on its head comes off.
entry_diamond: Being bitten by SHELLDER gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.
entry_black: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.
entry_x: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
entry_sun: A poisonous bite reacted with its system, blessing it with the enhanced intellect of a genius. It has full control of its psychic powers.
entry_sword: Miraculously, this former Slowpoke’s latent intelligence was drawn out when Shellder poison raced through its brain.

name: Misdreavus
entry_gold: It likes playing mischievous tricks such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.
entry_ruby: MISDREAVUS frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. The POKéMON apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fearful feelings of foes and turn them into nutrition.
entry_diamond: It loves to sneak up on people late at night, then startle them with its shrieklike cry.
entry_black: A Pokémon that startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.
entry_x: It gets nourishment from fear that it absorbs into its red orbs. In daytime, it sleeps in darkness.
entry_sun: It will use any means necessary to frighten people and absorb their life energy. It practices constantly to hone its skill in causing fear.

name: Unown
entry_gold: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tab­ lets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various UNOWN. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
entry_diamond: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.
entry_black: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
entry_x: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.

name: Wobbuffet
entry_gold: It hates light and shock. If attack­ ed, it inflates its body to pump up its counter­ strike.
entry_ruby: If two or more WOBBUFFET meet, they will turn competitive and try to outdo each other’s endurance. However, they may try to see which one can endure the longest without food. TRAINERS need to beware of this habit.
entry_diamond: It desperately tries to keep its black tail hidden. It is said to be proof the tail hides a secret.
entry_black: It desperately tries to keep its black tail hidden. It is said to be proof the tail hides a secret.
entry_x: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to build up its counterstrike.
entry_sword: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.

name: Girafarig
abilities: Inner Focus, Early Bird, Sap Sipper
entry_gold: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.
entry_ruby: GIRAFARIG’s rear head also has a brain, but it is small. The rear head attacks in response to smells and sounds. Approaching this POKéMON from behind can cause the rear head to suddenly lash out and bite.
entry_diamond: Its tail also has a small brain. It bites to repel any foe trying to sneak up on it from behind.
entry_black: The head on its tail contains a small brain. It can instinctively fight even while facing backward.
entry_x: While it sleeps, the head on its tail keeps watch. The tail doesn’t need to sleep.

name: Pineco
entry_gold: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.
entry_ruby: PINECO hangs from a tree branch and patiently waits for prey to come along. If the POKéMON is disturbed while eating by someone shaking its tree, it drops down to the ground and explodes with no warning.
entry_diamond: It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.
entry_black: It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.
entry_x: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.

name: Forretress
entry_gold: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.
entry_ruby: FORRETRESS conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell. The shell is opened when the POKéMON is catching prey, but it does so at such a quick pace that the shell’s inside cannot be seen.
entry_diamond: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.
entry_black: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.
entry_x: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.

name: Dunsparce
entry_gold: When spotted, this POKéMON escapes backward by furi­ ously boring into the ground with its tail.
entry_ruby: DUNSPARCE has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backwards. This POKéMON is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.
entry_diamond: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.
entry_black: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.
entry_x: When spotted, this Pokémon escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.
entry_sword: This Pokémon’s tiny wings have some scientists saying that Dunsparce used to fly through the sky in ancient times.

name: Gligar
entry_gold: It flies straight at its target's face then clamps down on the star­ tled victim to inject poison.
entry_ruby: GLIGAR glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This POKéMON hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.
entry_diamond: It sails on the winds with its limbs extended to strike from the sky. It aims for the prey’s face.
entry_black: It glides as if sliding. It startles foes by clamping on to their faces, then jabs with its poison stinger.
entry_x: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

name: Steelix
entry_gold: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.
entry_ruby: STEELIX lives even further underground than ONIX. This POKéMON is known to dig towards the earth’s core. There are records of this POKéMON reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
entry_diamond: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
entry_black: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
entry_x: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
entry_sword: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.

name: Snubbull
entry_gold: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.
entry_ruby: By baring its fangs and making a scary face, SNUBBULL sends smaller POKéMON scurrying away in terror. However, this POKéMON seems a little sad at making its foes flee.
entry_diamond: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.
entry_black: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.
entry_x: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.
entry_sun: Despite its intimidating face, it’s quite cowardly. Its desperate attempts to appear threatening make it popular with people.

name: Granbull
entry_gold: It is actually timid and easily spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails about to fend off its attacker.
entry_ruby: GRANBULL has a particularly well- developed lower jaw. The enormous fangs are heavy, causing the POKéMON to tip its head back for balance. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite indiscriminately.
entry_diamond: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.
entry_black: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.
entry_x: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.
entry_sun: Its well-developed lower jaw and heavy fangs are its weapons. As long as it’s not provoked, it rarely bites.

name: Qwilfish
entry_gold: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
entry_ruby: QWILFISH sucks in water, inflating itself. This POKéMON uses the pressure of the water it swallowed to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming somewhat challenging.
entry_diamond: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.
entry_black: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.
entry_x: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
entry_sword: When faced with a larger opponent, it swallows as much water as it can to match the opponent’s size.

name: Scizor
entry_gold: It swings its eye- patterned pincers up to scare its foes. This makes it look like it has three heads.
entry_ruby: SCIZOR has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This POKéMON flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.
entry_diamond: It has a steel-hard body. It intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.
entry_black: It raises its pincers with eyelike markings for intimidation. It also swings them down dangerously.
entry_x: This Pokémon’s pincers, which contain steel, can crush any hard object it gets ahold of into bits.
entry_sun: It uses its wings to adjust its body temperature. Otherwise, its metal body would become too hot and melt in the heat of battle.
entry_sword: Bulky pincers account for one third of Scizor’s body weight. A single swing of one of these pincers will crush a boulder completely.

name: Shuckle
entry_gold: The BERRIES it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.
entry_ruby: SHUCKLE quietly hides itself under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its hard shell while eating berries it has stored away. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.
entry_diamond: It stores berries in its shell. The berries eventually ferment to become delicious juices.
entry_black: It stores berries in its shell. The berries eventually ferment to become delicious juices.
entry_x: The berries stored in its jar-like shell eventually become a thick, pulpy juice.
entry_sword: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.

name: Heracross
entry_gold: This powerful POKéMON thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies then lifts and throws them.
entry_ruby: HERACROSS charges in a straight line at its foe, slips beneath the foe’s grasp, and then scoops up and hurls the opponent with its mighty horn. This POKéMON even has enough power to topple a massive tree.
entry_diamond: It gathers in forests to search for tree sap, its favorite food. It’s strong enough to hurl foes.
entry_black: It loves sweet honey. To keep all the honey to itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.
entry_x: This powerful Pokémon thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies, then lifts and throws them.
entry_sword: Heracross loves sweet sap and will go looking through forests for it. The Pokémon uses its two antennae to pick up scents as it searches.

name: Sneasel
entry_gold: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it sud­ denly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
entry_ruby: SNEASEL scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. This POKéMON seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.
entry_diamond: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
entry_black: A smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair may work together to steal eggs by having one lure the parents away.
entry_x: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
entry_sun: It has a cunning yet savage disposition. It waits for parents to leave their nests, and then it sneaks in to steal their eggs.
entry_sword: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.

name: Teddiursa
entry_gold: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON likes to lick its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. TEDDIURSA concocts its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by BEEDRILL.
entry_diamond: It lets honey soak into its paws so it can lick them all the time. Every set of paws tastes unique.
entry_black: It lets honey soak into its paws so it can lick them all the time. Every set of paws tastes unique.
entry_x: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they’re soaked with honey.

name: Ursaring
entry_gold: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap trees with its forelegs and eat fallen BERRIES.
entry_ruby: In the forests inhabited by URSARING, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This POKéMON walks through its forest gathering food every day.
entry_diamond: In its territory, it leaves scratches on trees that bear delicious berries or fruits.
entry_black: In its territory, it leaves scratches on trees that bear delicious berries or fruits.
entry_x: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground.

name: Slugma
abilities: Magma Armor, Flame Body, Weak Armor
entry_gold: It never sleeps. It has to keep moving because if it stopped, its magma body would cool and harden.
entry_ruby: Molten magma courses throughout SLUGMA’s circulatory system. If this POKéMON is chilled, the magma cools and hardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducing its size.
entry_diamond: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn’t keep moving, its body will cool and harden.
entry_black: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn’t keep moving, its body will cool and harden.
entry_x: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

name: Magcargo
abilities: Magma Armor, Flame Body, Weak Armor
entry_gold: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.
entry_ruby: MAGCARGO’s shell is actually its skin that hardened as a result of cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile - just touching it causes it to crumble apart. This POKéMON returns to its original size by dipping itself in magma.
entry_diamond: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees F. Flames spout from gaps in its hardened shell.
entry_black: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees F. Flames spout from gaps in its hardened shell.
entry_x: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.

name: Swinub
entry_gold: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
entry_ruby: SWINUB roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This POKéMON occasionally roots out hot springs.
entry_diamond: It loves eating mushrooms that grow under dead grass. It also finds hot springs while foraging.
entry_black: It has a very sensitive nose. It can locate mushrooms, berries, and even hot springs buried under ice.
entry_x: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
entry_sword: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

name: Piloswine
entry_gold: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
entry_ruby: PILOSWINE is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This POKéMON uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.
entry_diamond: Its shaggy coat makes it unable to see. It checks surroundings with its sensitive nose instead.
entry_black: Covered by a shaggy coat, it is strong against the cold. Its tusks of ice thicken when it snows.
entry_x: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
entry_sword: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.

name: Corsola
entry_gold: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.
entry_ruby: CORSOLA’s branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this POKéMON grows it back in just one night.
entry_diamond: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can’t live in polluted waters.
entry_black: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can’t live in polluted waters.
entry_x: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure because of its beauty.
entry_sun: Coral branches grow from its head. They break off quite easily, but they grow back in about three days.
entry_sword: It will regrow any branches that break off its head. People keep particularly beautiful Corsola branches as charms to promote safe childbirth.

name: Remoraid
entry_gold: It has superb ac­ curacy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 300 feet.
entry_ruby: REMORAID sucks in water, then expels it at high velocity using its abdominal muscles to shoot down flying prey. When evolution draws near, this POKéMON travels downstream from rivers.
entry_diamond: It squirts water forcefully from its mouth to shoot down flying prey.
entry_black: It forcefully squirts water. The water jet never misses prey even if the Remoraid is deep in the sea.
entry_x: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
entry_sword: The water they shoot from their mouths can hit moving prey from more than 300 feet away.

name: Octillery
entry_gold: It traps enemies with its suction- cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
entry_ruby: OCTILLERY grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This POKéMON tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, OCTILLERY spews ink to escape.
entry_diamond: It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.
entry_black: It loves to lurk inside holes in rocks. It sometimes sprays ink on prey by sticking out only its mouth.
entry_x: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
entry_sword: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.

name: Delibird
entry_gold: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.
entry_ruby: DELIBIRD carries its food bundled up in its tail. There once was a famous explorer who managed to reach the peak of Mt. Everest thanks to one of these POKéMON sharing its food.
entry_diamond: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.
entry_black: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.
entry_x: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.
entry_sun: Although it naturally prefers colder locales, Delibird in Alola seem able to withstand the heat to a certain extent.
entry_sword: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.

name: Mantine
abilities: Swift Swim, Water Absorb, Water Veil
entry_gold: As it majestically swims, it doesn't care if REMORAID attach to it for scavenging its leftovers.
entry_ruby: On sunny days, schools of MANTINE can be seen elegantly leaping over the sea’s waves. This POKéMON is not bothered by the REMORAID that hitches rides.
entry_diamond: When the waves are calm, one may encounter a swarm of MANTINE swimming as if they are in flight.
entry_black: While elegantly swimming in the sea, it ignores Remoraid that cling to its fins seeking food scraps.
entry_x: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can fly over 300 feet out of the water from the surface of the ocean.
entry_sword: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can jump out above the waves and glide for over 300 feet.

name: Skarmory
entry_gold: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
entry_ruby: SKARMORY is entirely encased in hard, protective armor. This POKéMON flies at close to 190 mph. It slashes foes with its wings that possess swordlike cutting edges.
entry_diamond: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
entry_black: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
entry_x: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
entry_sun: Its feathers, which fall off as it grows, are thin and sharp. In times long past, warriors used them as swords.
entry_sword: The pointed feathers of these Pokémon are sharper than swords. Skarmory and Corviknight fight viciously over territory.

name: Houndour
entry_gold: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.
entry_ruby: HOUNDOUR hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This POKéMON’s remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.
entry_diamond: It conveys its feelings using different cries. It works in a pack to cleverly take down prey.
entry_black: It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a variety of cries for communicating with others.
entry_x: Around dawn, its ominous howl echoes through the area to announce that this is its territory.

name: Houndoom
entry_gold: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.
entry_ruby: In a HOUNDOOM pack, the one with its horns raked sharply towards the back serves a leadership role. These POKéMON choose their leader by fighting amongst themselves.
entry_diamond: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.
entry_black: The flames it breathes when angry contain toxins. If they cause a burn, it will hurt forever.
entry_x: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.

name: Kingdra
entry_gold: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.
entry_ruby: KINGDRA lives at extreme ocean depths that are otherwise uninhabited. It has long been believed that the yawning of this POKéMON creates spiraling ocean currents.
entry_diamond: It lives in caves on the seafloor and creates giant whirlpools every time it moves.
entry_black: It lives in caves on the seafloor and creates giant whirlpools every time it moves.
entry_x: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.
entry_sword: With the arrival of a storm at sea, this Pokémon will show itself on the surface. When a Kingdra and a Dragonite meet, a fierce battle ensues.

name: Phanpy
entry_gold: It swings its long snout around play­ fully, but because it is so strong, that can be dan­ gerous.
entry_ruby: For its nest, PHANPY digs a vertical pit  in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
entry_diamond: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
entry_black: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
entry_x: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.

name: Donphan
entry_gold: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough to knock down a house.
entry_ruby: DONPHAN’s favorite attack is curling its body into a ball, then charging at its foe while rolling at high speed. Once it starts rolling, this POKéMON can’t stop very easily.
entry_diamond: It attacks by curling up, then rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.
entry_black: It attacks by curling up, then rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.
entry_x: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its Tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.

name: Porygon2
entry_gold: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. It can't fly, though.
entry_ruby: PORYGON2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made POKéMON has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
entry_diamond: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
entry_black: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
entry_x: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
entry_sun: For the purposes of planetary development, Porygon was updated with the most cutting-edge technology available.
entry_sword: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.

name: Stantler
entry_gold: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where real­ ity is distorted.
entry_ruby: STANTLER’s magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this POKéMON was hunted close to extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.
entry_diamond: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
entry_black: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
entry_x: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.

name: Smeargle
entry_gold: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
entry_ruby: SMEARGLE marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this POKéMON have been found.
entry_diamond: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
entry_black: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
entry_x: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
entry_sun: The unique creations produced by each Smeargle are painted using the fluid that oozes from its tail. This is how it marks its territory.

name: Tyrogue
entry_gold: It is always bursting with en­ ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
entry_ruby: TYROGUE becomes stressed out if it does not get to train every day. When raising this POKéMON, the TRAINER must establish and uphold various training methods.
entry_diamond: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.
entry_black: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.
entry_x: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
entry_sword: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

name: Hitmontop
entry_gold: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.
entry_ruby: HITMONTOP spins on its head at high speed, all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The POKéMON travels faster spinning than it does walking.
entry_diamond: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by ten.
entry_black: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by ten.
entry_x: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by 10.
entry_sword: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

name: Smoochum
entry_gold: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
entry_ruby: SMOOCHUM actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn’t become dirty.
entry_diamond: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
entry_black: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
entry_x: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
entry_sword: If its face gets even slightly dirty, Smoochum will bathe immediately. But if its body gets dirty, Smoochum doesn’t really seem to care.

name: Elekid
entry_gold: It rotates its arms to generate electricity, but it tires easily, so it charges up only a little bit.
entry_ruby: ELEKID stores electricity in its body. If it touches metal and accidentally discharges all its built-up electricity, this POKéMON begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.
entry_diamond: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.
entry_black: A weak electric current flows between its horns. Sticking a hand there shocks the unwary.
entry_x: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.
entry_sun: When it’s in a house, electrical outlets serve as its baby bottles. It sucks down electricity.
entry_sword: When a storm approaches, this Pokémon gets restless. Once Elekid hears the sound of thunder, it gets full-on rowdy.

name: Magby
entry_gold: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.
entry_ruby: MAGBY’s state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the POKéMON is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
entry_diamond: Its body temperature is around 1,100 degrees F. It is healthy if it is breathing yellow flames.
entry_black: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body’s heat can top 1,100 degrees F.
entry_x: It’s small, but its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. Embers escape its mouth and nose when it breathes.
entry_sun: Many of these Pokémon can be seen in areas with volcanic activity. Feeding can get them so excited, they exhale flames of 1,100 degrees F.
entry_sword: This Pokémon is still small and timid. Whenever Magby gets excited or surprised, flames leak from its mouth and its nose.

name: Miltank
entry_gold: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.
entry_ruby: MILTANK gives over five gallons of milk on a daily basis. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike. People who can’t drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.
entry_diamond: It is said that kids who drink MILTANK’s milk grow up to become hearty, healthy adults.
entry_black: It is said that kids who drink Miltank’s milk grow up to become hearty, healthy adults.
entry_x: If it is around babies, the milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual.
entry_sun: Its milk is high in calories and packed with nutrients. Therefore, if you drink too much of it, you may wind up with a body like Miltank’s.
entry_sword: Miltank produces highly nutritious milk, so it’s been supporting the lives of people and other Pokémon since ancient times.

name: Blissey
entry_gold: Anyone who takes even one bite of BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly caring and pleas­ ant to everyone.
entry_ruby: BLISSEY senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this POKéMON will rush over to the sad person, however far they may be, to share an egg of happiness that brings a smile to any face.
entry_diamond: This kindhearted Pokémon nurses sick Pokémon to health. It senses feelings of sadness.
entry_black: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.
entry_x: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.
entry_sun: Even the most ferocious Pokémon become calm when they eat Blissey’s egg, which is said to be filled with happiness.
entry_sword: Whenever a Blissey finds a weakened Pokémon, it will share its egg and offer its care until the other Pokémon is all better.

name: Raikou
entry_gold: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.
entry_ruby: RAIKOU embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this POKéMON send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.
entry_diamond: It is said to have fallen with lightning. It can fire thunderbolts from the rain clouds on its back.
entry_black: It is said to have fallen with lightning. It can fire thunderbolts from the rain clouds on its back.
entry_x: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.

name: Entei
entry_gold: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Un­ able to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.
entry_ruby: ENTEI embodies the passion of magma. This POKéMON is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
entry_diamond: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.
entry_black: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.
entry_x: A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.

name: Suicune
entry_gold: Said to be the reincarnation of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.
entry_ruby: SUICUNE embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This POKéMON has the power to purify dirty water.
entry_diamond: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.
entry_black: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.
entry_x: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.

name: Larvitar
entry_gold: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.
entry_ruby: LARVITAR is born deep under the ground. To come up to the surface, this POKéMON must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so, LARVITAR cannot see its parent’s face.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it has eaten a large mountain, it goes to sleep so it can grow.
entry_black: A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it has eaten a large mountain, it goes to sleep so it can grow.
entry_x: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it falls asleep so it can grow.
entry_sword: Born deep underground, it comes aboveground and becomes a pupa once it has finished eating the surrounding soil.

name: Pupitar
entry_gold: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its THRASHING can topple a mountain.
entry_ruby: PUPITAR creates a gas inside its body that it compresses and forcefully ejects to propel itself like a jet. The body is very durable - it avoids damage even if it hits solid steel.
entry_diamond: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.
entry_black: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.
entry_x: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.
entry_sword: Even sealed in its shell, it can move freely. Hard and fast, it has outstanding destructive power.

name: Tyranitar
entry_gold: Its body can't be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.
entry_ruby: TYRANITAR is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. This POKéMON wanders about in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.
entry_diamond: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.
entry_black: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.
entry_x: In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to make the ground shake and mountains crumble.
entry_sword: Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.

name: Lugia
entry_gold: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.
entry_ruby: LUGIA’s wings pack devastating power - a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this POKéMON chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.
entry_diamond: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.
entry_black: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.
entry_x: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.

name: Ho Oh
entry_gold: Legends claim this POKéMON flies the world's skies con­ tinuously on its magnificent seven- colored wings.
entry_ruby: HO-OH’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This POKéMON is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.
entry_diamond: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.
entry_black: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.
entry_x: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.

name: Celebi
entry_gold: This POKéMON wan­ ders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as CELEBI appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.
entry_diamond: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.
entry_black: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.
entry_x: This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
entry_sword: This Pokémon has the ability to move through time. Records describing it as a forest deity can be found from many different eras.

name: Treecko
entry_ruby: TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.
entry_diamond: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.
entry_black: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.
entry_x: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.

name: Grovyle
entry_ruby: The leaves growing out of GROVYLE’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This POKéMON is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
entry_diamond: It lives in dense jungles. While  closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
entry_black: It lives in dense jungles. While  closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
entry_x: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.

name: Sceptile
entry_ruby: The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s body are very sharp edged. This POKéMON is very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
entry_diamond: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
entry_black: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
entry_x: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.

name: Torchic
entry_ruby: TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER, following behind with unsteady steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees F, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.
entry_diamond: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees F.
entry_black: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees F.
entry_x: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.

name: Combusken
entry_ruby: COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.
entry_diamond: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
entry_black: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
entry_x: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.

name: Blaziken
entry_ruby: In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.
entry_diamond: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
entry_black: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
entry_x: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.

name: Mudkip
entry_ruby: The fin on MUDKIP’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this POKéMON can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
entry_diamond: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
entry_black: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
entry_x: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.

name: Marshtomp
entry_ruby: The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
entry_diamond: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
entry_black: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
entry_x: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

name: Swampert
entry_ruby: SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This POKéMON also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
entry_diamond: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
entry_black: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
entry_x: Its arms are hard as rock. With one swing, it can break a boulder into pieces.

name: Poochyena
entry_ruby: At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite at anything that moves. This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
entry_black: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
entry_x: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

name: Mightyena
entry_ruby: MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This POKéMON will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
entry_diamond: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
entry_black: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
entry_x: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.

name: Zigzagoon
entry_ruby: ZIGZAGOON restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This POKéMON does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.
entry_diamond: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
entry_black: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
entry_x: It walks in zigzag fashion. It’s good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
entry_sword: It marks its territory by rubbing its bristly fur on trees. This variety of Zigzagoon is friendlier and calmer than the kind native to Galar.

name: Linoone
entry_ruby: LINOONE always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by gently curving roads.
entry_diamond: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
entry_black: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
entry_x: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.
entry_sword: Its fur is strong and supple. Shaving brushes made with shed Linoone hairs are highly prized.

name: Wurmple
entry_ruby: Using the spikes on its rear end,   WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
entry_diamond: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a STARLY, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
entry_black: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.
entry_x: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.

name: Silcoon
entry_ruby: SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There,  this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
entry_diamond: It anchors itself by wrapping twigs with the silk from its body. It motionlessly awaits evolution.
entry_black: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
entry_x: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.

name: Beautifly
entry_ruby: BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY is sure to come looking for pollen.
entry_diamond: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.
