entry_black: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.
entry_x: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.

name: Cascoon
entry_ruby: CASCOON makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This POKéMON prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
entry_diamond: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
entry_black: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
entry_x: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.

name: Dustox
entry_ruby: DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
entry_diamond: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
entry_black: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.
entry_x: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.

name: Lotad
abilities: Swift Swim, Rain Dish, Own Tempo
entry_ruby: LOTAD live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this POKéMON travels on land in search of clean water.
entry_diamond: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can’t swim.
entry_black: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can’t swim.
entry_x: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can’t swim.
entry_sword: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

name: Lombre
abilities: Swift Swim, Rain Dish, Own Tempo
entry_ruby: LOMBRE is nocturnal - it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief-maker. When this POKéMON spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.
entry_diamond: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
entry_black: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
entry_x: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water-grass by day and becomes active at night.
entry_sword: It is nocturnal and becomes active at nightfall. It feeds on aquatic mosses that grow in the riverbed.

name: Ludicolo
abilities: Swift Swim, Rain Dish, Own Tempo
entry_ruby: LUDICOLO begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. This POKéMON is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.
entry_diamond: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can’t help breaking out into a dance.
entry_black: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can’t help breaking out into a dance.
entry_x: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can’t help breaking out into a dance.
entry_sword: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful.

name: Seedot
entry_ruby: SEEDOT attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. The more water it drinks, the glossier this POKéMON’s body becomes.
entry_diamond: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.
entry_black: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.
entry_x: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
entry_sword: If it remains still, it looks just like a real nut. It delights in surprising foraging Pokémon.

name: Nuzleaf
entry_ruby: NUZLEAF live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. This POKéMON dislikes having its long nose pinched.
entry_diamond: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
entry_black: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
entry_x: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
entry_sword: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.

name: Shiftry
entry_ruby: SHIFTRY is a mysterious POKéMON that is said to live atop towering trees  dating back over a thousand years. It creates terrific windstorms with the fans it holds.
entry_diamond: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.
entry_black: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.
entry_x: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.
entry_sword: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.

name: Taillow
entry_ruby: TAILLOW courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This gutsy POKéMON will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.
entry_diamond: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
entry_black: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
entry_x: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.

name: Swellow
entry_ruby: SWELLOW flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This POKéMON dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by SWELLOW’s clawed feet, preventing escape.
entry_diamond: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.
entry_black: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.
entry_x: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.

name: Wingull
entry_ruby: WINGULL has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This POKéMON rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.
entry_diamond: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.
entry_black: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.
entry_x: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
entry_sun: Its hollow bones enhance its lightness. It spreads its wings to the wind and soars away into the sky.
entry_sword: It makes its nest on sheer cliffs. Riding the sea breeze, it glides up into the expansive skies.

name: Pelipper
entry_ruby: PELIPPER is a flying transporter that carries small POKéMON and eggs inside its massive bill. This POKéMON builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.
entry_diamond: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.
entry_black: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
entry_x: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.
entry_sun: Its spacious beak is large enough for a small child to fit right inside.
entry_sword: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.

name: Ralts
entry_ruby: RALTS senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. This POKéMON rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.
entry_diamond: It uses the horns on its head to sense human emotions. It is said to appear in front of cheerful people.
entry_black: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
entry_x: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
entry_sword: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.

name: Kirlia
entry_ruby: It is said that a KIRLIA that is exposed to the positive emotions of its TRAINER grows beautiful. This POKéMON controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.
entry_diamond: It is highly perceptive of its Trainer’s feelings. It dances when it is feeling happy.
entry_black: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
entry_x: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.
entry_sword: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.

name: Gardevoir
entry_ruby: GARDEVOIR has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its TRAINER, this POKéMON is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
entry_diamond: It will try to guard its trusted Trainer with its life. It has the ability to see the future.
entry_black: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
entry_x: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
entry_sword: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.

name: Surskit
entry_ruby: From the tips of its feet, SURSKIT secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.
entry_diamond: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
entry_black: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
entry_x: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
entry_sun: It moves as if skating on the surface of the water. It often fights with Dewpider over food.

name: Masquerain
entry_ruby: MASQUERAIN intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This POKéMON flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even sideways and backwards - as if it were a helicopter.
entry_diamond: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
entry_black: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
entry_x: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
entry_sun: It intimidates enemies with the eye-like patterns on its antennae. Its four wings allow it to fly in any direction.

name: Shroomish
abilities: Effect Spore, Poison Heal, Quick Feet
entry_ruby: SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This POKéMON feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.
entry_diamond: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
entry_black: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
entry_x: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.

name: Breloom
entry_ruby: BRELOOM closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This POKéMON’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame.
entry_diamond: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
entry_black: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
entry_x: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.

name: Slakoth
entry_ruby: SLAKOTH lolls around for over twenty hours every day. Because it moves so little, it does not need much food. This POKéMON’s sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.
entry_diamond: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.
entry_black: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.
entry_x: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.

name: Vigoroth
entry_ruby: VIGOROTH is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This POKéMON’s stress level rises if it can’t be moving constantly.
entry_diamond: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still for even a moment.
entry_black: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still for even a moment.
entry_x: Its heartbeat is fast and its blood so agitated that it can’t sit still for one second.

name: Slaking
entry_ruby: SLAKING spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this POKéMON reluctantly moves to another spot.
entry_diamond: The world’s laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.
entry_black: The world’s laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.
entry_x: The world’s laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there’s no food left within its reach.

name: Nincada
entry_ruby: NINCADA lives underground for many years in complete darkness. This POKéMON absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless as it waits for evolution.
entry_diamond: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.
entry_black: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.
entry_x: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
entry_sword: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.

name: Ninjask
entry_ruby: NINJASK moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this POKéMON was long believed to be invisible.
entry_diamond: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.
entry_black: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.
entry_x: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
entry_sword: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.

name: Shedinja
entry_ruby: SHEDINJA’s hard body doesn’t move - not even a twitch. In fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this POKéMON will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.
entry_diamond: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.
entry_black: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.
entry_x: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.
entry_sword: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.

name: Whismur
entry_ruby: Normally, WHISMUR’s voice is very quiet - it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this POKéMON senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.
entry_diamond: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.
entry_black: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.
entry_x: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
entry_sword: The cry of a Whismur is over 100 decibels. If you’re close to a Whismur when it lets out a cry, you’ll be stuck with an all-day headache.

name: Loudred
entry_ruby: LOUDRED’s bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This POKéMON’s round ears serve as loudspeakers.
entry_diamond: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
entry_black: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
entry_x: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then uses its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.
entry_sword: Loudred’s ears serve as speakers, and they can put out sound waves powerful enough to blow away a house.

name: Exploud
entry_ruby: EXPLOUD triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this POKéMON violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.
entry_diamond: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
entry_black: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
entry_x: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
entry_sword: In the past, people would use the loud voices of these Pokémon as a means of communication between distant cities.

name: Makuhita
entry_ruby: MAKUHITA is tenacious - it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this POKéMON stores more energy in its body for evolving.
entry_diamond: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.
entry_black: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.
entry_x: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.
entry_sun: It was originally brought in from another region, but now Makuhita from Alola are more famous.

name: Hariyama
entry_ruby: HARIYAMA practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this POKéMON’s powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.
entry_diamond: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
entry_black: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
entry_x: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
entry_sun: It is known for its fantastic strength, but as it grows older, it focuses more on training Makuhita.

name: Azurill
abilities: Thick Fat, Huge Power, Sap Sipper
entry_ruby: AZURILL spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these POKéMON managed to hurl itself a record 33 feet.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
entry_black: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
entry_x: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
entry_sword: The ball on Azurill’s tail bounces like a rubber ball, and it’s full of the nutrients the Pokémon needs to grow.

name: Nosepass
entry_ruby: NOSEPASS’s magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. If two of these POKéMON meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.
entry_diamond: Its nose is a magnet. As a result, this Pokémon always keeps its face pointing north.
entry_black: When endangered, it may protect itself by raising its magnetism and drawing iron objects to its body.
entry_x: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
entry_sun: The magnet in Nosepass’s nose provides an unerring compass, making it an excellent partner for Trainers going on a journey.

name: Skitty
entry_ruby: SKITTY has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This POKéMON is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.
entry_diamond: It can’t stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
entry_black: It can’t stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
entry_x: It can’t stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.

name: Delcatty
entry_ruby: DELCATTY prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this POKéMON eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
entry_diamond: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
entry_black: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
entry_x: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.

name: Sableye
entry_ruby: SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these POKéMON are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
entry_diamond: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
entry_black: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
entry_x: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
entry_sun: It’s a fiend for gemstones, so it stalks Carbink. Unfortunately, Gabite almost always grabs them first.
entry_sword: This Pokémon is feared. When its gemstone eyes begin to glow with a sinister shine, it’s believed that Sableye will steal people’s spirits away.

name: Mawile
entry_ruby: MAWHILE’s huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it, MAWHILE chomps it with its gaping jaws.
entry_diamond: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
entry_black: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
entry_x: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
entry_sword: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

name: Aron
entry_ruby: This POKéMON has a body of steel. To make its body, ARON feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.
entry_diamond: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
entry_black: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
entry_x: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
entry_sword: It eats iron ore—and sometimes railroad tracks— to build up the steel armor that protects its body.

name: Lairon
entry_ruby: LAIRON tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This POKéMON makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.
entry_diamond: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.
entry_black: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.
entry_x: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.
entry_sword: Lairon live in mountains brimming with spring water and iron ore, so these Pokémon often came into conflict with humans in the past.

name: Aggron
entry_ruby: AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
entry_diamond: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
entry_black: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
entry_x: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don’t take it lightly.
entry_sword: Aggron has a horn sharp enough to perforate thick iron sheets. It brings down its opponents by ramming into them horn first.

name: Meditite
entry_ruby: MEDITITE undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. However, whenever it meditates, this POKéMON always loses its concentration and focus. As a result, its training never ends.
entry_diamond: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.
entry_black: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
entry_x: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.

name: Medicham
entry_ruby: It is said that through meditation, MEDICHAM heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
entry_diamond: Through yoga training, it has honed its sixth sense. Its movements are elegant.
entry_black: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.
entry_x: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.

name: Electrike
entry_ruby: ELECTRIKE stores electricity in its long body hair. This POKéMON stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.
entry_diamond: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
entry_black: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
entry_x: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
entry_sword: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

name: Manectric
entry_ruby: MANECTRIC is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this POKéMON creates thunderclouds.
entry_diamond: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
entry_black: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
entry_x: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
entry_sword: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.

name: Plusle
entry_ruby: PLUSLE always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this POKéMON shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
entry_diamond: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
entry_black: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
entry_x: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.

name: Minun
entry_ruby: MINUN is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.
entry_diamond: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
entry_black: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
entry_x: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.

name: Volbeat
entry_ruby: With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This POKéMON is attracted by the sweet aroma of ILLUMISE.
entry_diamond: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves ILLUMISE’s sweet aroma.
entry_black: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise’s sweet aroma.
entry_x: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise’s sweet aroma.

name: Illumise
entry_ruby: ILLUMISE attracts a swarm of VOLBEAT using a sweet fragrance. Once the VOLBEAT have gathered, this POKéMON leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.
entry_diamond: With its sweet aroma, it guides VOLBEAT to draw signs with light in the night sky.
entry_black: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.
entry_x: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.

name: Roselia
abilities: Natural Cure, Poison Point, Leaf Guard
entry_ruby: ROSELIA shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this POKéMON brings serenity to living things.
entry_diamond: ROSELIA raised on clean drinking water are known to grow vividly colored flowers.
entry_black: The more healthy the Roselia, the more pleasant its flowers’ aroma. Its scent deeply relaxes people.
entry_x: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
entry_sword: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.

name: Gulpin
entry_ruby: Virtually all of GULPIN’s body is its stomach. As a result, it can swallow something its own size. This POKéMON’s stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.
entry_diamond: Almost all its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.
entry_black: Almost all its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.
entry_x: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.

name: Swalot
entry_ruby: When SWALOT spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this POKéMON gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
entry_diamond: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
entry_black: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
entry_x: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.

name: Carvanha
entry_ruby: CARVANHA’s strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this POKéMON.
entry_diamond: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
entry_black: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
entry_x: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
entry_sun: Each school has its own territory. Any intruders are mercilessly attacked with fangs bared.
entry_sword: It won’t attack while it’s alone—not even if it spots prey. Instead, it waits for other Carvanha to join it, and then the Pokémon attack as a group.

name: Sharpedo
entry_ruby: Nicknamed “the bully of the sea,” SHARPEDO is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these POKéMON can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
entry_diamond: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
entry_black: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
entry_x: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
entry_sun: It pursues its prey at speeds of 75 mph and finishes them off with fangs that can crush iron. It is known as the bully of the sea.
entry_sword: As soon as it catches the scent of prey, Sharpedo will jet seawater from its backside, hurtling toward the target to attack at 75 mph.

name: Wailmer
entry_ruby: WAILMER’s nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful POKéMON loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.
entry_diamond: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.
entry_black: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.
entry_x: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.
entry_sun: It loves to startle people. It fills itself up with seawater and plays by bouncing around like a ball.
entry_sword: It shows off by spraying jets of seawater from the nostrils above its eyes. It eats a solid ton of Wishiwashi every day.

name: Wailord
entry_ruby: WAILORD is the largest of all identified POKéMON up to now. This giant POKéMON swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.
entry_diamond: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.
entry_black: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.
entry_x: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
entry_sun: Wailord pursue their prey in pods. With their large mouths, they can swallow entire schools of Wishiwashi whole.
entry_sword: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.

name: Numel
entry_ruby: NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it doesn’t notice being hit. However, it can’t stand hunger for even a second. This POKéMON’s body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.
entry_diamond: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
entry_black: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
entry_x: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.

name: Camerupt
abilities: Magma Armor, Solid Rock, Anger Point
entry_ruby: CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this POKéMON’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
entry_diamond: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
entry_black: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
entry_x: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years--or whenever it becomes really angry.

name: Torkoal
entry_ruby: TORKOAL digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this POKéMON spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.
entry_diamond: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
entry_black: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
entry_x: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
entry_sun: Coal is the source of Torkoal’s energy. Large amounts of coal can be found in the mountains where they live.
entry_sword: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

name: Spoink
entry_ruby: SPOINK bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this POKéMON cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it stops, its heart will stop.
entry_diamond: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
entry_black: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
entry_x: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.

name: Grumpig
entry_ruby: GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this POKéMON uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.
entry_diamond: It uses black pearls to amplify its psycho-power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
entry_black: It uses black pearls to amplify its psycho-power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
entry_x: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes’ minds.

name: Spinda
entry_ruby: All the SPINDA that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this POKéMON give it the appearance of dancing.
entry_diamond: No two SPINDA have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
entry_black: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
entry_x: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
entry_sun: Its steps are staggering and unsteady, but Spinda thinks it’s walking in a straight line.

name: Trapinch
abilities: Hyper Cutter, Arena Trap, Sheer Force
entry_ruby: TRAPINCH’s nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This POKéMON patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.
entry_diamond: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
entry_black: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
entry_x: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
entry_sun: It can live for a week without eating a thing. It waits patiently at the bottom of its nest for prey to appear.
entry_sword: Its nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit in the desert. Once something has fallen in, there is no escape.

name: Vibrava
entry_ruby: To make prey faint, VIBRAVA generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This POKéMON’s ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
entry_diamond: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
entry_black: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
entry_x: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
entry_sun: Rather than using its underdeveloped wings for flight, it rubs them together, producing ultrasonic waves to attack its enemies.
entry_sword: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.

name: Flygon
entry_ruby: FLYGON is nicknamed “the elemental  spirit of the desert.” Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this POKéMON is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.
entry_diamond: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as “The Desert Spirit.”
entry_black: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as “The Desert Spirit.”
entry_x: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
entry_sun: The flapping of its wings sounds something like singing. Those lured by the sound are enveloped in a sandstorm, becoming Flygon’s prey.
entry_sword: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.

name: Cacnea
entry_ruby: CACNEA lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this POKéMON shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.
entry_diamond: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.
entry_black: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.
entry_x: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.

name: Cacturne
entry_ruby: During the daytime, CACTURNE remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This POKéMON becomes active at night when the temperature drops.
entry_diamond: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.
entry_black: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.
entry_x: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.

name: Swablu
entry_ruby: SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This POKéMON is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.
entry_diamond: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone’s head, it looks like a cotton hat.
entry_black: It can’t relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.
entry_x: For some reason, it likes to land on people’s heads softly and act like it’s a hat.
entry_sword: Its cottony wings are full of air, making them light and fluffy to the touch. Swablu takes diligent care of its wings.

name: Altaria
entry_ruby: ALTARIA dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
entry_diamond: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.
entry_black: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
entry_x: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you’re in a dream.
entry_sword: As it flies in a calm and relaxed manner, Altaria performs a humming song that would enrapture any audience.

name: Zangoose
entry_ruby: Memories of battling its arch-rival SEVIPER are etched into every cell of ZANGOOSE’s body. This POKéMON adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.
entry_diamond: It has feuded with SEVIPER for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
entry_black: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
entry_x: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.

name: Seviper
entry_ruby: SEVIPER shares a generations-long feud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This POKéMON attacks using its sword- edged tail.
entry_diamond: For many generations, it has feuded with ZANGOOSE. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.
entry_black: For many generations, it has feuded with Zangoose. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.
entry_x: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.

name: Lunatone
entry_ruby: LUNATONE was discovered at a location where a meteorite fell. As a result, some people theorize that this POKéMON came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.
entry_diamond: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
entry_black: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
entry_x: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
entry_sword: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It’s active on the night of a full moon.

name: Solrock
entry_ruby: SOLROCK is a new species of POKéMON that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this POKéMON releases intensely bright light.
entry_diamond: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.
entry_black: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.
entry_x: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
entry_sword: When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.

name: Barboach
entry_ruby: BARBOACH’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
entry_diamond: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
entry_black: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
entry_x: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
entry_sun: Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey’s location.
entry_sword: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.

name: Whiscash
entry_ruby: WHISCASH is extremely territorial. Just one of these POKéMON will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
entry_diamond: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a three-mile radius.
entry_black: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
entry_x: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
entry_sun: A glutton that devours anything that moves, it quietly lurks at the bottom of swamps, lying in wait for prey.
entry_sword: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything—if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.

name: Corphish
entry_ruby: CORPHISH were originally foreign POKéMON that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This POKéMON is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
entry_diamond: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
entry_black: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
entry_x: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
entry_sword: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.

name: Crawdaunt
entry_ruby: CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this POKéMON, making them desolate places.
entry_diamond: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
entry_black: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
entry_x: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
entry_sword: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

name: Baltoy
entry_ruby: BALTOY moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this POKéMON living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
entry_diamond: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
entry_black: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
entry_x: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
entry_sword: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.

name: Claydol
entry_ruby: CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This POKéMON moves about while levitating.
entry_diamond: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
entry_black: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
entry_x: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
entry_sword: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.

name: Lileep
entry_ruby: LILEEP became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient POKéMON attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles  shaped like flower petals.
entry_diamond: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
entry_black: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
entry_x: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
entry_sword: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Lileep once lived in warm seas that existed approximately 100,000,000 years ago.

name: Cradily
entry_ruby: CRADILY roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This POKéMON freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
entry_diamond: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
entry_black: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
entry_x: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
entry_sword: It has short legs and can’t walk very fast, but its neck and tentacles can extend to over three times their usual length to nab distant prey.

name: Anorith
entry_ruby: ANORITH was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
entry_black: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
entry_x: It is a kind of Pokémon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
entry_sword: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Anorith lived in the ocean about 100,000,000 years ago, hunting with its pair of claws.

name: Armaldo
entry_ruby: ARMALDO’s tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This POKéMON’s two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
entry_diamond: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.
entry_black: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.
entry_x: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
entry_sword: After evolution, this Pokémon emerged onto land. Its lower body has become stronger, and blows from its tail are devastating.

name: Feebas
entry_ruby: FEEBAS’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this POKéMON is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
entry_diamond: It is famous for its shabby appearance. While populous, they tend to cluster in set locations.
entry_black: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
entry_x: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
entry_sun: A tough Pokémon that is perfectly fine even in dirty water. However, due to its ragged, shabby appearance, it isn’t popular.
entry_sword: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.

name: Milotic
entry_ruby: MILOTIC is said to be the most beautiful of all the POKéMON. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
entry_diamond: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.
entry_black: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.
entry_x: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
entry_sun: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
entry_sword: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.

name: Castform
entry_ruby: CASTFORM’s appearance changes with the weather. This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
entry_diamond: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.
entry_black: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.
entry_x: This Pokémon can change its cells, taking different forms based on the temperature and humidity.
entry_sun: It changes its form depending on the weather. Changes in the temperature or humidity appear to affect its cellular structure.

name: Kecleon
entry_ruby: KECLEON is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception - this POKéMON can’t change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
entry_diamond: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.
entry_black: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.
entry_x: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.

name: Shuppet
entry_ruby: SHUPPET is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this POKéMON will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person’s home.
entry_diamond: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
entry_black: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
entry_x: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice-- or so it’s said. It’s very active at night.

name: Banette
entry_ruby: BANETTE generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.
entry_diamond: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
entry_black: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
entry_x: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.

name: Duskull
entry_ruby: DUSKULL can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this POKéMON chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
entry_diamond: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
entry_black: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.
entry_x: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
entry_sword: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it’s said.

name: Dusclops
entry_ruby: DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This POKéMON will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
entry_diamond: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
entry_black: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
entry_x: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
entry_sword: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.

name: Tropius
entry_ruby: The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s neck are very popular with children. This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
entry_diamond: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.
entry_black: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.
entry_x: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.

name: Chimecho
entry_ruby: CHIMECHO makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this POKéMON becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
entry_diamond: To knock foes flying, it makes the air shudder with its cries. It converses using seven cries.
entry_black: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.
entry_x: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.

name: Absol
entry_ruby: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.
entry_diamond: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
entry_black: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
entry_x: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
entry_sun: Long ago, superstitions were spread about it, saying it brought disaster. This fed a hatred of it, and it was driven deep into the mountains.
entry_sword: Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.

name: Wynaut
entry_ruby: WYNAUT can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be slapping the ground with its tail.
entry_diamond: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
entry_black: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
entry_x: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
entry_sword: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.

name: Snorunt
entry_ruby: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
entry_diamond: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a SNORUNT lives there.
entry_black: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
entry_x: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
entry_sun: Their numbers seem to have rapidly increased in Alola. Custom has it that houses where Snorunt live will be prosperous for generations to come.
entry_sword: It’s said that if they are seen at midnight, they’ll cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice to survive.

name: Glalie
entry_ruby: GLALIE has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This POKéMON has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
entry_diamond: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_black: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
entry_x: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_sun: Legend says a boulder on an icy mountain absorbed the distress and regrets of a stranded mountaineer, giving rise to Glalie.
entry_sword: It has a body of ice that won’t melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.

name: Spheal
entry_ruby: SPHEAL is much faster rolling than  walking to get around. When groups of this POKéMON eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
entry_diamond: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
entry_black: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
entry_x: They can’t swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they’re happy, they clap fins.
entry_sword: This Pokémon’s body is covered in blubber and impressively round. It’s faster for Spheal to roll around than walk.

name: Sealeo
entry_ruby: SEALEO has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL on its nose.
entry_diamond: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
entry_black: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
entry_x: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
entry_sword: Sealeo live on top of drift ice. They go swimming when they’re on the hunt, seeking out their prey by scent.

name: Walrein
entry_ruby: WALREIN’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This POKéMON’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
entry_diamond: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
entry_black: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
entry_x: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
entry_sword: Walrein form herds of 20 to 30 individuals. When a threat appears, the herd’s leader will protect the group with its life.

name: Clamperl
entry_ruby: CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
entry_diamond: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
entry_black: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
entry_x: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it’s held.

name: Huntail
entry_ruby: HUNTAIL’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This POKéMON’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
entry_diamond: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
entry_black: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
entry_x: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.

name: Gorebyss
entry_ruby: GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this POKéMON’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
entry_diamond: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
entry_black: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
entry_x: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.

name: Relicanth
entry_ruby: RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
entry_diamond: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
entry_black: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
entry_x: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
entry_sun: Its form has remained the same for one hundred million years. Its body is filled with fat, so it can withstand the water pressure of the deep sea.
entry_sword: Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bladders allow this Pokémon to survive the intense water pressure of the deep sea.

name: Luvdisc
entry_ruby: LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean’s waves.
entry_diamond: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
entry_black: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
entry_x: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
entry_sun: If a Luvdisc is left on its own, it becomes despondent, leaving itself open to attack. That is when Pelipper snatch them up.

name: Bagon
entry_ruby: BAGON has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this POKéMON hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has  grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.
entry_diamond: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
entry_black: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
entry_x: Its well-developed neck muscles and iron-like head can smash boulders into pieces.
entry_sun: Its belief that it will be able to fly one day is apparently the influence of information carried in its genes.
entry_sword: Bagon jumps off cliffs every day, trying to grow stronger so that someday it will be able to fly.

name: Shelgon
entry_ruby: Inside SHELGON’s armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This POKéMON’s shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.
entry_diamond: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
entry_black: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
entry_x: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
entry_sun: The cells within its shell transform with explosive speed, preparing it for evolution.
entry_sword: This Pokémon has covered its body in a hard shell that has the same composition as bone. Shelgon stores energy for evolution.

name: Salamence
entry_ruby: SALAMENCE came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
entry_diamond: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
entry_black: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
entry_x: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
entry_sun: When angered, it loses all sense of itself and destroys everything around it. The destruction will continue until Salamence has tired itself out.
entry_sword: Salamence is an unusual Pokémon in that it was able to evolve a body with wings just by constantly wishing to be able to fly.

name: Beldum
entry_ruby: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout BELDUM’s body. This POKéMON communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
entry_diamond: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
entry_black: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
entry_x: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground’s natural magnetism, letting it float.
entry_sun: Its cells are all magnets. It uses magnetism to communicate with others of its kind.
entry_sword: From its rear, Beldum emits a magnetic force that rapidly pulls opponents in. They get skewered on Beldum’s sharp claws.

name: Metang
entry_ruby: When two BELDUM fuse together, METANG is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically, this POKéMON generates strong psychokinetic power.
entry_diamond: It is formed by two BELDUM joining together. Its steel body won’t be scratched if it collides with a jet.
entry_black: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won’t be scratched if it collides with a jet.
entry_x: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won’t be scratched if it collides with a jet.
entry_sun: When two Beldum link together, their psychic power is doubled. Their intelligence, however, remains unchanged.
entry_sword: Two Beldum have become stuck together via their own magnetic forces. With two brains, the resulting Metang has doubled psychic powers.

name: Metagross
entry_ruby: METAGROSS has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This POKéMON can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.
entry_diamond: METANG combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
entry_black: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
entry_x: With four linked brains, it’s more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.
entry_sun: It firmly pins its prey using its four claws and large body. Then the teeth in the mouth on its stomach chew the prey to bits.
entry_sword: Because the magnetic powers of these Pokémon get stronger in freezing temperatures, Metagross living on snowy mountains are full of energy.

name: Regirock
entry_ruby: REGIROCK was sealed away by people long ago. If this POKéMON’s body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
entry_diamond: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
entry_black: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
entry_x: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
entry_sword: Every bit of Regirock’s body is made of stone. As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks rocks to itself to repair what’s been lost.

name: Regice
entry_ruby: REGICE’s body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can’t be melted, even by fire. This POKéMON controls frigid air of minus 328 degrees F.
entry_diamond: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
entry_black: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
entry_x: It is said to have slept in a glacier for thousands of years. Its body can’t be melted, even by magma.
entry_sword: With cold air that can reach temperatures as low as −328 degrees Fahrenheit, Regice instantly freezes any creature that approaches it.

name: Registeel
entry_ruby: REGISTEEL has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this POKéMON eats.
entry_diamond: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
entry_black: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
entry_x: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
entry_sword: Registeel’s body is made of a strange material that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but also more durable than any metal.

name: Latias
entry_ruby: LATIAS is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this POKéMON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
entry_diamond: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
entry_black: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
entry_x: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.

name: Latios
entry_ruby: LATIOS has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This POKéMON is intelligent and understands human speech.
entry_diamond: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
entry_black: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
entry_x: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

name: Kyogre
entry_ruby: KYOGRE has the power to create massive rain clouds that cover the entire sky and bring about torrential downpours. This POKéMON saved people who were suffering from droughts.
entry_diamond: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
entry_black: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
entry_x: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.

name: Groudon
entry_ruby: GROUDON has long been described in  mythology as the POKéMON that raised lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.
entry_diamond: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought KYOGRE long ago.
entry_black: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.
entry_x: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.

name: Rayquaza
entry_ruby: RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth’s ozone layer,  never descending to the ground. This POKéMON appears to feed on water and particles in the atmosphere.
entry_diamond: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
entry_black: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
entry_x: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

name: Jirachi
entry_ruby: A legend states that JIRACHI will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKéMON senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
entry_diamond: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
entry_black: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
entry_x: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.
entry_sword: Once every 1,000 years, the singing of a pure voice will rouse this Pokémon from its near- perpetual slumber. It wakes for only seven days.

name: Deoxys Normal
entry_ruby: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in DEOXYS. The crystalline organ on this POKéMON’s chest appears to be its brain.
entry_diamond: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
entry_black: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
entry_x: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.

name: Turtwig
entry_diamond: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.
entry_black: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy Turtwig, the shell should feel moist.
entry_x: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.

name: Grotle
entry_diamond: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
entry_black: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
entry_x: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

name: Torterra
entry_diamond: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.
entry_black: Some Pokémon are born on a Torterra’s back and spend their entire life there.
entry_x: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.

name: Chimchar
entry_diamond: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.
entry_black: It is very agile. Before going to sleep, it extinguishes the flame on its tail to prevent fires.
entry_x: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can’t extinguish the fire.

name: Monferno
entry_diamond: To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.
entry_black: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
entry_x: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

name: Infernape
entry_diamond: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.
entry_black: It uses unique fighting moves with fire on its hands and feet. It will take on any opponent.
entry_x: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.

name: Piplup
entry_diamond: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.
entry_black: A poor walker, it often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care.
entry_x: It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to bond with since it won’t listen to its Trainer.

name: Prinplup
entry_diamond: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
entry_black: Because every Prinplup considers itself to be the most important, they can never form a group.
entry_x: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

name: Empoleon
entry_diamond: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.
entry_black: If anyone were to hurt its pride, it would slash them with wings that can cleave through an ice floe.
entry_x: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

name: Starly
entry_diamond: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
entry_black: Because they are weak individually, they form groups. However, they bicker if the group grows too big.
entry_x: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.

name: Staravia
entry_diamond: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokémon. It stays within a huge flock.
