entry_scarlet: A single kick from a Quaquaval can send a truck rolling. This Pokémon uses its powerful legs to perform striking dances from far-off lands.

name: Lechonk
entry_scarlet: It searches for food all day. It possesses a keen sense of smell but doesn’t use it for anything other than foraging.

name: Oinkologne Male
entry_scarlet: Oinkologne is proud of its fine, glossy skin. It emits a concentrated scent from the tip of its tail.

name: Tarountula
entry_scarlet: The ball of threads wrapped around its body is elastic enough to deflect the scythes of Scyther, this Pokémon’s natural enemy.

name: Spidops
entry_scarlet: It clings to branches and ceilings using its threads and moves without a sound. It takes out its prey before the prey even notices it.

name: Nymble
entry_scarlet: It has its third set of legs folded up. When it’s in a tough spot, this Pokémon jumps over 30 feet using the strength of its legs.

name: Lokix
entry_scarlet: When it decides to fight all out, it stands on its previously folded legs to enter Showdown Mode. It neutralizes its enemies in short order.

name: Pawmi
entry_scarlet: It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks. These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.

name: Pawmo
abilities: Volt Absorb, Natural Cure, Iron Fist
entry_scarlet: When its group is attacked, Pawmo is the first to leap into battle, defeating enemies with a fighting technique that utilizes electric shocks.

name: Pawmot
abilities: Volt Absorb, Natural Cure, Iron Fist
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.

name: Tandemaus
entry_scarlet: Exhibiting great teamwork, they use their incisors to cut pieces out of any material that might be useful for a nest, then make off with them.

name: Maushold Family Of Four
entry_scarlet: The two little ones just appeared one day. The group might be a family of related Pokémon, but nobody knows for sure.

name: Fidough
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon is smooth and moist to the touch. Yeast in Fidough’s breath induces fermentation in the Pokémon’s vicinity.

name: Dachsbun
entry_scarlet: The pleasant aroma that emanates from this Pokémon’s body helps wheat grow, so Dachsbun has been treasured by farming villages.

name: Smoliv
entry_scarlet: It protects itself from enemies by emitting oil from the fruit on its head. This oil is bitter and astringent enough to make someone flinch.

name: Dolliv
entry_scarlet: Dolliv shares its tasty, fresh-scented oil with others. This species has coexisted with humans since times long gone.

name: Arboliva
entry_scarlet: This calm Pokémon is very compassionate. It will share its delicious, nutrient-rich oil with weakened Pokémon.

name: Squawkabilly Green Plumage
entry_scarlet: These Pokémon prefer to live in cities. They form flocks based on the color of their feathers, and they fight over territory.

name: Nacli
entry_scarlet: It was born in a layer of rock salt deep under the earth. This species was particularly treasured in the old days, as they would share precious salt.

name: Naclstack
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon dry cures its prey by spraying salt over them. The curing process steals away the water in the prey’s body.

name: Garganacl
entry_scarlet: Garganacl will rub its fingertips together and sprinkle injured Pokémon with salt. Even severe wounds will promptly heal afterward.

name: Charcadet
entry_scarlet: Burnt charcoal came to life and became a Pokémon. Possessing a fiery fighting spirit, Charcadet will battle even tough opponents.

name: Armarouge
entry_scarlet: Armarouge evolved through the use of a set of armor that belonged to a distinguished warrior. This Pokémon is incredibly loyal.

name: Ceruledge
entry_scarlet: The fiery blades on its arms burn fiercely with the lingering resentment of a sword wielder who fell before accomplishing their goal.

name: Tadbulb
entry_scarlet: Tadbulb shakes its tail to generate electricity. If it senses danger, it will make its head blink on and off to alert its allies.

name: Bellibolt
entry_scarlet: When this Pokémon expands and contracts its wobbly body, the belly-button dynamo in its stomach produces a huge amount of electricity.

name: Wattrel
entry_scarlet: When its wings catch the wind, the bones within produce electricity. This Pokémon dives into the ocean, catching prey by electrocuting them.

name: Kilowattrel
entry_scarlet: Kilowattrel inflates its throat sac to amplify its electricity. By riding the wind, this Pokémon can fly over 430 miles in a day.

name: Maschiff
entry_scarlet: It always scowls in an attempt to make opponents take it seriously, but even crying children will burst into laughter when they see Maschiff’s face.

name: Mabosstiff
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon can store energy in its large dewlap. Mabosstiff unleashes this energy all at once to blow away enemies.

name: Shroodle
entry_scarlet: Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.

name: Grafaiai
entry_scarlet: The color of the poisonous saliva depends on what the Pokémon eats. Grafaiai covers its fingers in its saliva and draws patterns on trees in forests.

name: Bramblin
entry_scarlet: A soul unable to move on to the afterlife was blown around by the wind until it got tangled up with dried grass and became a Pokémon.

name: Brambleghast
entry_scarlet: It will open the branches of its head to envelop its prey. Once it absorbs all the life energy it needs, it expels the prey and discards it.

name: Toedscool
entry_scarlet: Toedscool lives in muggy forests. The flaps that fall from its body are chewy and very delicious.

name: Toedscruel
entry_scarlet: These Pokémon gather into groups and form colonies deep within forests. They absolutely hate it when strangers approach.

name: Klawf
entry_scarlet: Klawf hangs upside-down from cliffs, waiting for prey. But Klawf can’t remain in this position for long because its blood rushes to its head.

name: Capsakid
entry_scarlet: The more sunlight this Pokémon bathes in, the more spicy chemicals are produced by its body, and thus the spicier its moves become.

name: Scovillain
entry_scarlet: The red head converts spicy chemicals into fire energy and blasts the surrounding area with a super spicy stream of flame.

name: Rellor
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon creates a mud ball by mixing sand and dirt with psychic energy. It treasures its mud ball more than its own life.

name: Rabsca
entry_scarlet: The body that supports the ball barely moves. Therefore, it is thought that the true body of this Pokémon is actually inside the ball.

name: Flittle
entry_scarlet: Flittle’s toes levitate about half an inch above the ground because of the psychic power emitted from the frills on the Pokémon’s belly.

name: Espathra
entry_scarlet: It immobilizes opponents by bathing them in psychic power from its large eyes. Despite its appearance, it has a vicious temperament.

name: Tinkatink
entry_scarlet: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.

name: Tinkatuff
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and Bisharp, gathering metal from them in order to create a large and sturdy hammer.

name: Tinkaton
entry_scarlet: This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.

name: Wiglett
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a Veluza just over 65 feet away and will hide itself in the sand.

name: Wugtrio
entry_scarlet: It has a vicious temperament, contrary to what its appearance may suggest. It wraps its long bodies around prey, then drags the prey into its den.

name: Bombirdier
abilities: Big Pecks, Keen Eye, Rocky Payload
entry_scarlet: It gathers things up in an apron made from shed feathers added to the Pokémon’s chest feathers, then drops those things from high places for fun.

name: Finizen
entry_scarlet: It likes playing with others of its kind using the water ring on its tail. It uses ultrasonic waves to sense the emotions of other living creatures.

name: Palafin Zero
abilities: Zero To Hero, Zero To Hero
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon changes its appearance if it hears its allies calling for help. Palafin will never show anybody its moment of transformation.

name: Varoom
entry_scarlet: It is said that this Pokémon was born when an unknown poison Pokémon entered and inspirited an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.

name: Revavroom
entry_scarlet: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders—now numbering eight—to generate energy.

name: Cyclizar
entry_scarlet: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.

name: Orthworm
entry_scarlet: When attacked, this Pokémon will wield the tendrils on its body like fists and pelt the opponent with a storm of punches.

name: Glimmet
entry_scarlet: It absorbs nutrients from cave walls. The petals it wears are made of crystallized poison.

name: Glimmora
entry_scarlet: When this Pokémon detects danger, it will open up its crystalline petals and fire beams from its conical body.

name: Greavard
entry_scarlet: It is said that a dog Pokémon that died in the wild without ever interacting with a human was reborn as this Pokémon.

name: Houndstone
entry_scarlet: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokémon, this one is most loyal to its master.

name: Flamigo
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.

name: Cetoddle
abilities: Thick Fat, Snow Cloak, Sheer Force
entry_scarlet: This species left the ocean and began living on land a very long time ago. It seems to be closely related to Wailmer.

name: Cetitan
abilities: Thick Fat, Slush Rush, Sheer Force
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.

name: Veluza
entry_scarlet: When Veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. The spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavor.

name: Dondozo
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

name: Tatsugiri Curly
entry_scarlet: This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies on the outside.

name: Annihilape
entry_scarlet: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.

name: Clodsire
entry_scarlet: When attacked, this Pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.

name: Farigiraf
abilities: Cud Chew, Armor Tail, Sap Sipper
entry_scarlet: Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this Pokémon is 10 times stronger than Girafarig’s.

name: Dudunsparce Two Segment
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon uses its hard tail to make its nest by boring holes into bedrock deep underground. The nest can reach lengths of over six miles.

name: Kingambit
entry_scarlet: Only a Bisharp that stands above all others in its vast army can evolve into Kingambit.

name: Great Tusk
entry_scarlet: Sightings of this Pokémon have occurred in recent years. The name Great Tusk was taken from a creature listed in a certain book.

name: Scream Tail
entry_scarlet: There has been only one reported sighting of this Pokémon. It resembles a mysterious creature depicted in an old expedition journal.

name: Brute Bonnet
entry_scarlet: It is possible that the creature listed as Brute Bonnet in a certain book could actually be this Pokémon.

name: Flutter Mane
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon has characteristics similar to those of Flutter Mane, a creature mentioned in a certain book.

name: Slither Wing
entry_scarlet: This mysterious Pokémon has some similarities to a creature that an old book introduced as Slither Wing.

name: Sandy Shocks
entry_scarlet: No records exist of this Pokémon being caught. Data is lacking, but the Pokémon’s traits match up with a creature shown in an expedition journal.

name: Iron Treads
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon closely resembles a scientific weapon that a paranormal magazine claimed was sent to this planet by aliens.

name: Iron Bundle
entry_scarlet: Its shape is similar to a robot featured in a paranormal magazine article. The robot was said to have been created by an ancient civilization.

name: Iron Hands
entry_scarlet: It is very similar to a cyborg covered exclusively by a paranormal magazine. The cyborg was said to be the modified form of a certain athlete.

name: Iron Jugulis
entry_scarlet: It resembles a certain Pokémon introduced in a paranormal magazine, described as the offspring of a Hydreigon that fell in love with a robot.

name: Iron Moth
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon resembles an unknown object described in a paranormal magazine as a UFO sent to observe humanity.

name: Iron Thorns
entry_scarlet: It has some similarities to a Pokémon introduced in a dubious magazine as a Tyranitar from one billion years into the future.

name: Frigibax
entry_scarlet: Frigibax absorbs heat through its dorsal fin and converts the heat into ice energy. The higher the temperature, the more energy Frigibax stores.

name: Arctibax
entry_scarlet: Arctibax freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.

name: Baxcalibur
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon blasts cryogenic air out from its mouth. This air can instantly freeze even liquid-hot lava.

name: Gimmighoul
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon was born inside a treasure chest about 1,500 years ago. It sucks the life-force out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.

name: Gholdengo
entry_scarlet: Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 coins. This Pokémon gets along well with others and is quick to make friends with anybody.

name: Wo Chien
entry_scarlet: The grudge of a person punished for writing the king’s evil deeds upon wooden tablets has clad itself in dead leaves to become a Pokémon.

name: Chien Pao
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon can control 100 tons of fallen snow. It plays around innocently by leaping in and out of avalanches it has caused.

name: Ting Lu
entry_scarlet: The fear poured into an ancient ritual vessel has clad itself in rocks and dirt to become a Pokémon.

name: Chi Yu
entry_scarlet: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.

name: Roaring Moon
entry_scarlet: It is possible that this is the creature listed as Roaring Moon in an expedition journal that still holds many mysteries.

name: Iron Valiant
entry_scarlet: It has some similarities to a mad scientist’s invention covered in a paranormal magazine.

name: Koraidon
entry_scarlet: This seems to be the Winged King mentioned in an old expedition journal. It was said to have split the land with its bare fists.

name: Miraidon
entry_scarlet: Much remains unknown about this creature. It resembles Cyclizar, but it is far more ruthless and powerful.

name: Walking Wake
entry_scarlet: This ferocious creature is shrouded in mystery. It's named after an aquatic monster mentioned in an old expedition journal.

name: Iron Leaves
entry_scarlet: Many of its physical characteristics match those of a Virizion from the future that was covered in a paranormal magazine.

name: Dipplin
entry_scarlet: Dipplin is two creatures in one Pokémon. Its evolution was triggered by a special apple grown only in one place.

name: Poltchageist
entry_scarlet: Supposedly, the regrets of a tea ceremony master who died before perfecting his craft lingered in some matcha and became a Pokémon.

name: Sinistcha
entry_scarlet: It pretends to be tea, trying to fool people into drinking it so it can drain their life-force. Its ruse is generally unsuccessful.

name: Okidogi
entry_scarlet: After all its muscles were stimulated by the toxic chain around its neck, Okidogi transformed and gained a powerful physique.

name: Munkidori
entry_scarlet: The chain is made from toxins that enhance capabilities. It stimulated Munkidori's brain and caused the Pokémon's psychic powers to bloom.

name: Fezandipiti
entry_scarlet: Fezandipiti owes its beautiful looks and lovely voice to the toxic stimulants emanating from the chain wrapped around its body.

name: Ogerpon
entry_scarlet: This Pokémon's type changes based on which mask it's wearing. It confounds its enemies with nimble movements and kicks.

name: Archaludon
entry_scarlet: It gathers static electricity from its surroundings. The beams it launches when down on all fours are tremendously powerful.

name: Hydrapple
entry_scarlet: Seven syrpents live inside an apple made of syrup. The syrpent in the center is the commander.

name: Gouging Fire
entry_scarlet: There are scant few reports of this creature being sighted. One short video shows it rampaging and spouting pillars of flame.

name: Raging Bolt
entry_scarlet: It's said to incinerate everything around it with lightning launched from its fur. Very little is known about this creature.

name: Iron Boulder
entry_scarlet: It resembles a Pokémon described in a dubious magazine as a Terrakion that had been modified by an evil organization.

name: Iron Crown
entry_scarlet: It resembles a mysterious object introduced in a paranormal magazine as a cutting-edge weapon shaped like a Cobalion.

name: Terapagos
entry_scarlet: Terapagos protects itself using its power to transform energy into hard crystals. This Pokémon is the source of the Terastal phenomenon.

name: Pecharunt
entry_scarlet: It feeds others toxic mochi that draw out desires and capabilities. Those who eat the mochi fall under Pecharunt’s control, chained to its will.

entry_black: Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.
entry_x: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
entry_sword: The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokémon can deliver punches capable of obliterating a dump truck.

name: Meloetta Pirouette
entry_black: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
entry_x: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.

entry_x: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

entry_black: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.
entry_x: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.

entry_x: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”

entry_black: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
entry_x: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

name: Meowstic Female

entry_sword: Revealing the eyelike patterns on the insides of its ears will unleash its psychic powers. It normally keeps the patterns hidden, however.

name: Aegislash Blade

entry_sword: In this defensive stance, Aegislash uses its steel body and a force field of spectral power to reduce the damage of any attack.

entry_blue: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

entry_blue: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

name: Gengar Mega

entry_blue: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
entry_gold: It steals heat from its surround­ ings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a GENGAR appeared.
entry_ruby: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
entry_diamond: It hides in shadows. It is said that if GENGAR is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees F.
entry_black: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
entry_x: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.
entry_sun: Should you feel yourself attacked by a sudden chill, it is evidence of an approaching Gengar. There is no escaping it. Give up.
entry_sword: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.

name: Kangaskhan Mega
entry_red: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.
entry_blue: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

entry_ruby: If you come across a young KANGASKHAN playing by itself, you must never disturb it or attempt to catch it. The baby POKéMON’s parent is sure to be in the area, and it will become violently enraged at you.
entry_diamond: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.
entry_black: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.

entry_sword: Although it’s carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

entry_blue: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

entry_sword: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.

name: Gyarados Mega
entry_red: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
entry_blue: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
entry_gold: They say that during past wars, GYARADOS would appear and leave blazing ruins in its wake.
entry_ruby: When MAGIKARP evolves into GYARADOS, its brain cells undergo a structural transformation. It is said that this transformation is to blame for this POKéMON’s wildly violent nature.
entry_diamond: Once it appears, its rage never settles until it has razed the fields and mountains around it.
entry_black: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.
entry_x: In ancient literature, there is a record of a Gyarados that razed a village when violence flared.
entry_sun: A tale is told of a town that angered Gyarados. Before the sun rose the next day, flames utterly consumed the town, leaving not a trace behind.
entry_sword: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.

entry_ruby: AERODACTYL is a POKéMON from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
entry_black: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

entry_sword: This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient times. Apparently even modern technology is incapable of producing a perfectly restored specimen.

name: Scizor Mega

entry_ruby: SCIZOR has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This POKéMON flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.

entry_black: It raises its pincers with eyelike markings for intimidation. It also swings them down dangerously.

name: Heracross Mega

entry_sword: Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.

name: Blaziken Mega
entry_ruby: In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.
entry_diamond: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
entry_black: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
entry_x: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.

name: Gardevoir Mega
entry_ruby: GARDEVOIR has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its TRAINER, this POKéMON is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
entry_diamond: It will try to guard its trusted Trainer with its life. It has the ability to see the future.
entry_black: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
entry_x: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
entry_sword: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.

name: Mawile Mega
entry_ruby: MAWHILE’s huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it, MAWHILE chomps it with its gaping jaws.
entry_diamond: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
entry_black: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
entry_x: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
entry_sword: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

name: Aggron Mega
entry_ruby: AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
entry_diamond: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
entry_black: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
entry_x: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don’t take it lightly.
entry_sword: Aggron has a horn sharp enough to perforate thick iron sheets. It brings down its opponents by ramming into them horn first.

name: Medicham Mega
entry_ruby: It is said that through meditation, MEDICHAM heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
entry_diamond: Through yoga training, it has honed its sixth sense. Its movements are elegant.
entry_black: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.
entry_x: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.

name: Manectric Mega
entry_ruby: MANECTRIC is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this POKéMON creates thunderclouds.
entry_diamond: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
entry_black: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
entry_x: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
entry_sword: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.

name: Banette Mega
entry_ruby: BANETTE generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.
entry_diamond: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
entry_black: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
entry_x: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.

name: Absol Mega
entry_ruby: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.
entry_diamond: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
entry_black: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
entry_x: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
entry_sun: Long ago, superstitions were spread about it, saying it brought disaster. This fed a hatred of it, and it was driven deep into the mountains.
entry_sword: Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.

name: Garchomp Mega
entry_diamond: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
entry_black: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
entry_x: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
entry_sun: It can fly at speeds rivaling jet planes. It dives into flocks of bird Pokémon and gulps the entire flock down whole.
entry_sword: Garchomp makes its home in volcanic mountains. It flies through the sky as fast as a jet airplane, hunting down as much prey as it can.

name: Lucario Mega
entry_diamond: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.
entry_black: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.
entry_x: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
entry_sun: Not only does it perceive auras, but it has also gained the power to control them. It employs them in battle.
entry_sword: It controls waves known as auras, which are powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks. It uses these waves to take down its prey.

name: Abomasnow Mega
entry_diamond: It whips up blizzards in mountains that are always buried in snow. It is the abominable snowman.
entry_black: They appear when the snow flowers bloom. When the petals fall, they retreat to places unknown again.
entry_x: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as “The Ice Monster.”
entry_sword: If it sees any packs of Darumaka going after Snover, it chases them off, swinging its sizable arms like hammers.

name: Floette Eternal
entry_x: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.

name: Latias Mega
entry_ruby: LATIAS is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this POKéMON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
entry_diamond: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
entry_black: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
entry_x: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.

name: Latios Mega
entry_ruby: LATIOS has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This POKéMON is intelligent and understands human speech.
entry_diamond: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
entry_black: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
entry_x: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

name: Swampert Mega
entry_ruby: SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This POKéMON also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
entry_diamond: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
entry_black: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
entry_x: Its arms are hard as rock. With one swing, it can break a boulder into pieces.

name: Sceptile Mega
entry_ruby: The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s body are very sharp edged. This POKéMON is very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
entry_diamond: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
entry_black: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
entry_x: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.

name: Sableye Mega
entry_ruby: SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these POKéMON are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
entry_diamond: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
entry_black: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
entry_x: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
entry_sun: It’s a fiend for gemstones, so it stalks Carbink. Unfortunately, Gabite almost always grabs them first.
entry_sword: This Pokémon is feared. When its gemstone eyes begin to glow with a sinister shine, it’s believed that Sableye will steal people’s spirits away.

name: Altaria Mega
entry_ruby: ALTARIA dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
entry_diamond: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.
entry_black: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
entry_x: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you’re in a dream.
entry_sword: As it flies in a calm and relaxed manner, Altaria performs a humming song that would enrapture any audience.

name: Gallade Mega
entry_diamond: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
entry_black: When trying to protect someone, it extends its elbows as if they were swords and fights savagely.
entry_x: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.
entry_sword: True to its honorable-warrior image, it uses the blades on its elbows only in defense of something or someone.

name: Audino Mega
entry_black: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
entry_x: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
entry_sword: Audino’s sense of hearing is superb. Not even a pebble rolling along over a mile away will escape Audino’s ears.

name: Sharpedo Mega
entry_ruby: Nicknamed “the bully of the sea,” SHARPEDO is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these POKéMON can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
entry_diamond: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
entry_black: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
entry_x: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
entry_sun: It pursues its prey at speeds of 75 mph and finishes them off with fangs that can crush iron. It is known as the bully of the sea.
entry_sword: As soon as it catches the scent of prey, Sharpedo will jet seawater from its backside, hurtling toward the target to attack at 75 mph.

name: Slowbro Mega
entry_red: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
entry_blue: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
entry_gold: If the tail-biting SHELLDER is thrown off in a harsh battle, it reverts to being an ordi­ nary SLOWPOKE.
entry_ruby: SLOWBRO’s tail has a SHELLDER firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can’t be used for fishing anymore. This causes SLOWBRO to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.
entry_diamond: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.
entry_black: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the Shellder on its tail bites down.
entry_x: An attached Shellder won’t let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.
entry_sun: It spaces out while gazing at the sea. With Shellder’s poison flowing through its body, it becomes even spacier.
entry_sword: Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.

name: Steelix Mega
entry_gold: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.
entry_ruby: STEELIX lives even further underground than ONIX. This POKéMON is known to dig towards the earth’s core. There are records of this POKéMON reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
entry_diamond: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
entry_black: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
entry_x: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
entry_sword: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.

name: Pidgeot Mega
entry_red: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.
entry_blue: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.
entry_gold: Its well-developed chest muscles make it strong enough to whip up a gusty windstorm with just a few flaps.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many TRAINERS are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling them to choose PIDGEOT as their POKéMON.
entry_diamond: By flapping its wings with all its might, PIDGEOT can make a gust of wind capable of bending tall trees.
entry_black: By flapping its wings with all its might, Pidgeot can make a gust of wind capable of bending tall trees.
entry_x: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.

name: Glalie Mega
entry_ruby: GLALIE has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This POKéMON has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
entry_diamond: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_black: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
entry_x: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_sun: Legend says a boulder on an icy mountain absorbed the distress and regrets of a stranded mountaineer, giving rise to Glalie.
entry_sword: It has a body of ice that won’t melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.

name: Diancie Mega
entry_x: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.

name: Metagross Mega
entry_ruby: METAGROSS has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This POKéMON can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.
entry_diamond: METANG combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
entry_black: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
entry_x: With four linked brains, it’s more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.
entry_sun: It firmly pins its prey using its four claws and large body. Then the teeth in the mouth on its stomach chew the prey to bits.
entry_sword: Because the magnetic powers of these Pokémon get stronger in freezing temperatures, Metagross living on snowy mountains are full of energy.

name: Kyogre Primal
entry_ruby: KYOGRE has the power to create massive rain clouds that cover the entire sky and bring about torrential downpours. This POKéMON saved people who were suffering from droughts.
entry_diamond: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
entry_black: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
entry_x: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.

name: Groudon Primal
entry_ruby: GROUDON has long been described in  mythology as the POKéMON that raised lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.
entry_diamond: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought KYOGRE long ago.
entry_black: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.
entry_x: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.

name: Rayquaza Mega
entry_ruby: RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth’s ozone layer,  never descending to the ground. This POKéMON appears to feed on water and particles in the atmosphere.
entry_diamond: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
entry_black: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
entry_x: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

name: Pikachu Rock Star
entry_red: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
entry_blue: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
entry_gold: This intelligent POKéMON roasts hard BERRIES with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.
entry_ruby: Whenever PIKACHU comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it’s evidence that this POKéMON mistook the intensity of its charge.
entry_diamond: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.
entry_black: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
entry_x: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
entry_sun: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
entry_sword: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

name: Hoopa Unbound
entry_x: This troublemaker sends anything and everything to faraway places using its loop, which can warp space.

name: Camerupt Mega
entry_ruby: CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this POKéMON’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
entry_diamond: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
entry_black: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
entry_x: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years--or whenever it becomes really angry.

name: Lopunny Mega
entry_diamond: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.
entry_black: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
entry_x: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
entry_sword: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.

name: Salamence Mega
entry_ruby: SALAMENCE came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
entry_diamond: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
entry_black: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
entry_x: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
entry_sun: When angered, it loses all sense of itself and destroys everything around it. The destruction will continue until Salamence has tired itself out.
entry_sword: Salamence is an unusual Pokémon in that it was able to evolve a body with wings just by constantly wishing to be able to fly.

name: Beedrill Mega
entry_red: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
entry_blue: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
entry_gold: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poi­ son stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.
entry_ruby: BEEDRILL is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest - this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.
entry_diamond: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
entry_black: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
entry_x: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: Rattata Alola
entry_red: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
entry_blue: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
entry_gold: It eats anything. Wherever food is available, it will settle down and produce offspring continuously.
entry_ruby: RATTATA is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives - it will make its nest anywhere.
entry_diamond: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
entry_black: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
entry_x: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.
entry_sun: Its incisors continue growing until its death. If its Trainer doesn’t offer it a file to gnaw on, it will gnaw on door frames, table legs, and so on.

name: Raticate Alola
entry_red: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
entry_blue: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
entry_gold: Gnaws on anything with its tough fangs. It can even topple concrete buildings by gnaw­ ing on them.
entry_ruby: RATICATE’s sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
entry_diamond: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
entry_black: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
entry_x: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
entry_sun: Its hind feet are webbed, so it’s a strong swimmer. It can cross rivers and sometimes even oceans.

entry_black: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
entry_x: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
entry_sun: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
entry_sword: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

name: Raichu Alola
entry_red: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
entry_blue: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
entry_gold: When its electric­ ity builds, its muscles are stimu­ lated, and it be­ comes more aggres­ sive than usual.
entry_ruby: If the electrical sacks become excessively charged, RAICHU plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this POKéMON’s nest.
entry_diamond: It turns aggressive if it has too much electricity in its body. It discharges power through its tail.
entry_black: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
entry_x: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
entry_sun: It unleashes electric shocks that can reach 100,000 volts. When agitated, it can knock out even an Indian elephant.
entry_sword: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

name: Sandshrew Alola
entry_red: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
entry_blue: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
entry_gold: If it fell from a great height, this POKéMON could save itself by rolling into a ball and bouncing.
entry_ruby: SANDSHREW’s body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. This POKéMON curls up to protect itself from its enemies.
entry_diamond: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.
entry_black: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.
entry_x: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.
entry_sun: It can roll its body into a ball. It moves through the desert by rolling at high speeds.
entry_sword: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.

name: Sandslash Alola
entry_red: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
entry_blue: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
entry_gold: In an attempt to hide itself, it will run around at top speed to kick up a blinding dust storm.
entry_ruby: SANDSLASH’s body is covered by tough spikes, which are hardened sections of its hide. Once a year, the old spikes fall out, to be replaced with new spikes that grow out from beneath the old ones.
entry_diamond: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.
entry_black: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.
entry_x: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.
entry_sun: Although they are sharp, its claws and spikes often break off. They grow back the next day, so it is not bothered by the temporary loss.
entry_sword: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon’s spikes will feel when touched.

name: Vulpix Alola
entry_red: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
entry_blue: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
entry_gold: As it develops,  its single white tail gains color and splits into six. It is quite warm and cuddly.
entry_ruby: At the time of its birth, VULPIX has one white tail. The tail separates into six if this POKéMON receives plenty of love from its TRAINER. The six tails become magnificently curled.
entry_diamond: It controls balls of fire. As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.
entry_black: It controls balls of fire. As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.
entry_x: When it is born, it has just one snow-white tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
entry_sun: Its beautiful fur and tails have made it very popular. As it grows, its tails split to form more tails.
entry_sword: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

name: Ninetales Alola
entry_red: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.
entry_blue: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.
entry_gold: Some legends claim that each of its nine tails has its own unique type of special mystical power.
entry_ruby: NINETALES casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain total control over its foe’s mind. This POKéMON is said to live for a thousand years.
entry_diamond: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.
entry_black: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.
entry_x: It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.
entry_sun: Legend has it that this mystical Pokémon was formed when nine saints coalesced into one.
entry_sword: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

name: Diglett Alola
abilities: Sand Veil, Tangling Hair, Sand Force
entry_red: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
entry_blue: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
entry_gold: Its skin is very thin. If it is exposed to light, its blood heats up, causing it to grow weak.
entry_ruby: DIGLETT are raised in most farms. The reason is simple - wherever this POKéMON burrows, the soil is left perfectly tilled for planting crops. This soil is made ideal for growing delicious vegetables.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.
entry_black: A Pokémon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.
entry_x: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.
entry_sun: It chews on plant roots underground. Farmers whose vegetables are vulnerable find it can be quite a pest.
entry_sword: If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.

name: Dugtrio Alola
abilities: Sand Veil, Tangling Hair, Sand Force
entry_red: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
entry_blue: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
entry_gold: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.
entry_ruby: DUGTRIO are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.
entry_diamond: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.
entry_black: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.
entry_x: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.
entry_sun: This set of triplets moves cooperatively. It’s the power of teamwork that enables this Pokémon to dig to a depth of 60 miles.
entry_sword: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: Meowth Alola
entry_red: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry_blue: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry_gold: It is fascinated by round objects. It can't stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
entry_ruby: MEOWTH withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this POKéMON loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
entry_diamond: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_black: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_x: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_sun: It lies around all day, becoming active near dusk. At night, it wanders the city in search of loose change.
entry_sword: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.

name: Persian Alola
entry_red: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
entry_blue: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
entry_gold: Many adore it for its sophisticated air. However, it will lash out and scratch for little reason.
entry_ruby: PERSIAN has six bold whiskers that give it a look of toughness. The whiskers   sense air movements to determine what is in the POKéMON’s surrounding vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
entry_diamond: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
entry_black: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
entry_x: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
entry_sun: It has a violent temperament. It will attack anything that looks it in the eye. Its sharp claws inflict deep wounds.
entry_sword: Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed.

name: Geodude Alola
entry_red: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
entry_blue: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
entry_gold: Most people may not notice, but a closer look should reveal that there are many GEODUDE around.
entry_ruby: The longer a GEODUDE lives, the more its edges are chipped and worn away, making it more rounded in appearance. However, this POKéMON’s heart will remain hard, craggy, and rough always.
entry_diamond: Many live on mountain trails and remain half buried while keeping an eye on climbers.
entry_black: At rest, it looks just like a rock. Carelessly stepping on it will make it swing its fists angrily.
entry_x: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
entry_sun: Its round body makes it easy to pick up, but it is hard and heavy. It’s dangerous to play with them as if they were snowballs.

name: Graveler Alola
entry_red: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
entry_blue: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
entry_gold: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesn't mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.
entry_ruby: GRAVELER grows by feeding on rocks. Apparently, it prefers to eat rocks that are covered in moss. This POKéMON eats its way through a ton of rocks on a daily basis.
entry_diamond: GRAVELER make their homes on sheer cliff faces by gouging out numerous horizontal holes.
entry_black: It rolls on mountain paths to move. Once it builds momentum, no Pokémon can stop it without difficulty.
entry_x: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesn’t mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.
entry_sun: Mossy rocks are its favorite food. It can devour a ton a day while crunching loudly.

name: Golem Alola
entry_red: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.
entry_blue: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.
entry_gold: It sheds its skin once a year. The discarded shell immediately hard­ ens and crumbles away.
entry_ruby: GOLEM live up on mountains. If there is a large earthquake, these POKéMON will come rolling down off the mountains en masse to the foothills below.
entry_diamond: It sheds its hide once a year. Its boulderlike body is so tough, even dynamite can’t harm it.
entry_black: Even dynamite can’t harm its hard, boulderlike body. It sheds its hide just once a year.
entry_x: It tumbles down mountains, leaving grooves from peak to base. Stay clear of these grooves.
entry_sun: Its body can survive dynamite blasts without a single scratch, but it hates rain and humidity.

name: Grimer Alola
abilities: Poison Touch, Gluttony, Power Of Alchemy
entry_red: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
entry_blue: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
entry_gold: As it moves, it loses bits of its body from which new GRIMER emerge. This worsens the stench around it.
entry_ruby: GRIMER’s sludgy and rubbery body can be forced through any opening, however small it may be. This POKéMON enters sewer pipes to drink filthy wastewater.
entry_diamond: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon’s X-rays. It appears among filth.
entry_black: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon’s X-rays. It appears among filth.
entry_x: Sludge exposed to X-rays from the moon transformed into Grimer. It loves feeding on filthy things.
entry_sun: Its main source of food is the slimy industrial waste of factories. This Pokémon’s numbers have been decreasing in recent years.

name: Muk Alola
abilities: Poison Touch, Gluttony, Power Of Alchemy
entry_red: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
entry_blue: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
entry_gold: They love to gath­ er in smelly areas where sludge ac­ cumulates, making the stench around them worse.
entry_ruby: From MUK’s body seeps a foul fluid that gives off a nose-bendingly horrible stench. Just one drop of this POKéMON’s body fluid can turn a pool stagnant and rancid.
entry_diamond: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.
entry_black: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.
entry_x: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around them worse.
entry_sun: The stench it gives off will make your nose scrunch up. Still, there are Muk fans who think that’s a good thing.

name: Exeggutor Alola
entry_red: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.
entry_blue: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.
entry_gold: Its three heads think independent­ ly. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
entry_ruby: EXEGGUTOR originally came from the tropics. Its heads steadily grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall off, they group together to form EXEGGCUTE.
entry_diamond: It is called “The Walking Jungle.” If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an EXEGGCUTE.
entry_black: It is called “The Walking Jungle.” If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.
entry_x: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
entry_sun: Each of its heads has its own will. They use telepathy to discuss their plans before coming to a joint decision.
entry_sword: Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.

name: Marowak Alola
abilities: Cursed Body, Lightning Rod, Rock Head
entry_red: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
entry_blue: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
entry_gold: It has been seen pounding boulders with the bone it carries in order to tap out mes­ sages to others.
entry_ruby: MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This POKéMON’s tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
entry_diamond: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
entry_black: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
entry_x: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
entry_sun: Originally, it was weak and timid. After evolution, its temperament becomes violent, and it begins to wield bones as weapons.
entry_sword: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

name: Greninja Battle Bond
entry_x: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

name: Greninja Ash

name: Vikavolt Totem

abilities: Cursed Body, Lightning Rod, Rock Head

entry_blue: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
entry_gold: It has been seen pounding boulders with the bone it carries in order to tap out mes­ sages to others.
entry_ruby: MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This POKéMON’s tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
entry_diamond: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
entry_black: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
entry_x: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
entry_sun: Originally, it was weak and timid. After evolution, its temperament becomes violent, and it begins to wield bones as weapons.
entry_sword: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

name: Ribombee Totem
abilities: Honey Gather, Shield Dust, Sweet Veil
entry_sun: It rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle.
entry_sword: It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar. The puffs’ effects depend on the type of ingredients and how much of each one is used.

name: Rockruff Own Tempo
entry_sun: It’s considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.
entry_sword: This Pokémon can bond very strongly with its Trainer, but it also has a habit of biting. Raising a Rockruff for a long time can be challenging.

name: Lycanroc Dusk
entry_sun: Its quick movements confuse its enemies. Well equipped with claws and fangs, it also uses the sharp rocks in its mane as weapons.
entry_sword: This Lycanroc is calm and cautious. The rocks jutting from its mane are razor sharp.

name: Araquanid Totem
entry_sun: It delivers headbutts with the water bubble on its head. Small Pokémon get sucked into the bubble, where they drown.
entry_sword: It launches water bubbles with its legs, drowning prey within the bubbles. This Pokémon can then take its time to savor its meal.

name: Togedemaru Totem
entry_sun: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.
entry_sword: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.

name: Necrozma Dusk
entry_sun: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.
entry_sword: It survives by absorbing light. After a long time spent slumbering underground, impurities accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.

name: Necrozma Dawn
entry_sun: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.
entry_sword: It survives by absorbing light. After a long time spent slumbering underground, impurities accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.

name: Necrozma Ultra
entry_sun: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.
entry_sword: It survives by absorbing light. After a long time spent slumbering underground, impurities accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.

name: Pikachu Starter
entry_red: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
entry_blue: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
entry_gold: This intelligent POKéMON roasts hard BERRIES with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.
entry_ruby: Whenever PIKACHU comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it’s evidence that this POKéMON mistook the intensity of its charge.
entry_diamond: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.
entry_black: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
entry_x: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
entry_sun: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
entry_sword: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

name: Eevee Starter
entry_red: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.
entry_blue: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.
entry_gold: It has the ability to alter the com­ position of its body to suit its surrounding envi­ ronment.
entry_ruby: EEVEE has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives. Radiation from various STONES causes this POKéMON to evolve.
entry_diamond: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
entry_black: Because its genetic makeup is irregular, it quickly changes its form due to a variety of causes.
entry_x: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
entry_sun: Possessing an unbalanced and unstable genetic makeup, it conceals many possible evolutions.
entry_sword: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.

name: Pikachu World Cap
entry_red: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
entry_blue: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
entry_gold: This intelligent POKéMON roasts hard BERRIES with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.
entry_ruby: Whenever PIKACHU comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it’s evidence that this POKéMON mistook the intensity of its charge.
