entry_black: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
entry_x: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
entry_sun: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
entry_sword: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

name: Meowth Galar
entry_red: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry_blue: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry_gold: It is fascinated by round objects. It can't stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
entry_ruby: MEOWTH withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this POKéMON loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
entry_diamond: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_black: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_x: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_sun: It lies around all day, becoming active near dusk. At night, it wanders the city in search of loose change.
entry_sword: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.

name: Ponyta Galar
entry_red: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.
entry_blue: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.
entry_gold: It is a weak run­ ner immediately after birth. It gradually becomes faster by chasing after its parents.
entry_ruby: PONYTA is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. This POKéMON becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to keep up with its parent.
entry_diamond: About an hour after birth, its fiery mane and tail grow out, giving it an impressive appearance.
entry_black: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.
entry_x: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.
entry_sword: It can’t run properly when it’s newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.

name: Rapidash Galar
entry_red: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
entry_blue: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
entry_gold: At full gallop, its four hooves barely touch the ground because it moves so incredi­ bly fast.
entry_ruby: RAPIDASH usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this POKéMON turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.
entry_diamond: It gallops at nearly 150 mph. With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.
entry_black: When at an all-out gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.
entry_x: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
entry_sword: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

name: Slowpoke Galar
entry_red: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
entry_blue: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
entry_gold: It lazes vacantly near water. If something bites its tail, it won't even notice for a whole day.
entry_ruby: SLOWPOKE uses its tail to catch prey by dipping it in water at the side of a river. However, this POKéMON often forgets what it’s doing and often spends entire days just loafing at water’s edge.
entry_diamond: Although slow, it is skilled at fishing with its tail. It does not feel pain if its tail is bitten.
entry_black: Although slow, it is skilled at fishing with its tail. It does not feel pain if its tail is bitten.
entry_x: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.
entry_sun: Its long tail often breaks off. It doesn’t really feel any pain, though, and the tail grows back, so Slowpoke isn’t particularly bothered.
entry_sword: Slow-witted and oblivious, this Pokémon won’t feel any pain if its tail gets eaten. It won’t notice when its tail grows back, either.

name: Slowbro Galar
entry_red: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
entry_blue: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
entry_gold: If the tail-biting SHELLDER is thrown off in a harsh battle, it reverts to being an ordi­ nary SLOWPOKE.
entry_ruby: SLOWBRO’s tail has a SHELLDER firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can’t be used for fishing anymore. This causes SLOWBRO to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.
entry_diamond: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.
entry_black: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the Shellder on its tail bites down.
entry_x: An attached Shellder won’t let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.
entry_sun: It spaces out while gazing at the sea. With Shellder’s poison flowing through its body, it becomes even spacier.
entry_sword: Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.

name: Farfetchd Galar
entry_red: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.
entry_blue: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.
entry_gold: If anyone tries to disturb where the essential plant sticks grow, it uses its own stick to thwart them.
entry_ruby: FARFETCH’D is always seen with a stick from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This POKéMON has been known to fight with others over sticks.
entry_diamond: It can’t live without the stalk it holds. That’s why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.
entry_black: It can’t live without the stalk it holds. That’s why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.
entry_x: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.
entry_sword: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

name: Weezing Galar
entry_red: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.
entry_blue: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.
entry_gold: If one of the twin KOFFING inflates, the other one deflates. It con­ stantly mixes its poisonous gases.
entry_ruby: WEEZING loves the gases given off by rotted kitchen garbage. This POKéMON will find a dirty, unkempt house and make it its home. At night, when the people in the house are asleep, it will go through the trash.
entry_diamond: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
entry_black: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
entry_x: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
entry_sword: It mixes gases between its two bodies. It’s said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.

name: Mr Mime Galar
abilities: Vital Spirit, Screen Cleaner, Ice Body
entry_red: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.
entry_blue: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.
entry_gold: A skilled mime from birth, it gains the ability to create invisi­ ble objects as it matures.
entry_ruby: MR. MIME is a master of pantomime. Its gestures and motions convince watchers that something unseeable actually exists. Once it is believed, it will exist as if it were a real thing.
entry_diamond: It is a pantomime expert that can create invisible but solid walls using miming gestures.
entry_black: It shapes an invisible wall in midair by minutely vibrating its fingertips to stop molecules in the air.
entry_x: Emanations from its fingertips solidify the air into invisible walls that repel even harsh attacks.
entry_sword: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

name: Articuno Galar
entry_red: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.
entry_blue: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.
entry_gold: The magnificent, seemingly translu­ cent wings of this legendary bird POKéMON are said to be made of ice.
entry_ruby: ARTICUNO is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this POKéMON flies, snow will fall.
entry_diamond: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_black: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_x: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
entry_sword: It’s said that this Pokémon’s beautiful blue wings are made of ice. Articuno flies over snowy mountains, its long tail fluttering along behind it.

name: Zapdos Galar
entry_red: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
entry_blue: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
entry_gold: This legendary bird POKéMON causes savage thunderstorms by flapping its glit­ tering wings.
entry_ruby: ZAPDOS is a legendary bird POKéMON that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. The POKéMON gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.
entry_diamond: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.
entry_black: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.
entry_x: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
entry_sword: This Pokémon has complete control over electricity. There are tales of Zapdos nesting in the dark depths of pitch-black thunderclouds.

name: Moltres Galar
entry_red: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.
entry_blue: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.
entry_gold: This legendary POKéMON scatters embers with every flap of its wings. It is a thrilling sight to behold.
entry_ruby: MOLTRES is a legendary bird POKéMON that has the ability to control fire. If this POKéMON is injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.
entry_diamond: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.
entry_black: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.
entry_x: It is said to be the legendary bird Pokémon of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.
entry_sword: It’s one of the legendary bird Pokémon. When Moltres flaps its flaming wings, they glimmer with a dazzling red glow.

name: Slowking Galar
entry_gold: It has incredible intellect and in­ tuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
entry_ruby: SLOWKING undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this POKéMON apparently forgets everything it has learned if the SHELLDER on its head comes off.
entry_diamond: Being bitten by SHELLDER gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.
entry_black: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.
entry_x: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
entry_sun: A poisonous bite reacted with its system, blessing it with the enhanced intellect of a genius. It has full control of its psychic powers.
entry_sword: Miraculously, this former Slowpoke’s latent intelligence was drawn out when Shellder poison raced through its brain.

name: Corsola Galar
entry_gold: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.
entry_ruby: CORSOLA’s branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this POKéMON grows it back in just one night.
entry_diamond: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can’t live in polluted waters.
entry_black: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can’t live in polluted waters.
entry_x: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure because of its beauty.
entry_sun: Coral branches grow from its head. They break off quite easily, but they grow back in about three days.
entry_sword: It will regrow any branches that break off its head. People keep particularly beautiful Corsola branches as charms to promote safe childbirth.

name: Zigzagoon Galar
entry_ruby: ZIGZAGOON restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This POKéMON does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.
entry_diamond: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
entry_black: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
entry_x: It walks in zigzag fashion. It’s good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
entry_sword: It marks its territory by rubbing its bristly fur on trees. This variety of Zigzagoon is friendlier and calmer than the kind native to Galar.

name: Linoone Galar
entry_ruby: LINOONE always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by gently curving roads.
entry_diamond: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
entry_black: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
entry_x: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.
entry_sword: Its fur is strong and supple. Shaving brushes made with shed Linoone hairs are highly prized.

name: Darumaka Galar
entry_black: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.
entry_x: Darumaka’s droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
entry_sword: It derives its power from fire burning inside its body. If the fire dwindles, this Pokémon will immediately fall asleep.

name: Darmanitan Galar Standard
entry_black: Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.
entry_x: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
entry_sword: The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokémon can deliver punches capable of obliterating a dump truck.

name: Darmanitan Galar Zen
entry_black: Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.
entry_x: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
entry_sword: The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokémon can deliver punches capable of obliterating a dump truck.

name: Yamask Galar
entry_black: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
entry_x: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
entry_sword: It wanders through ruins by night, carrying a mask that’s said to have been the face it had when it was still human.

name: Stunfisk Galar
entry_black: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
entry_x: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
entry_sword: Thanks to bacteria that lived in the mud flats with it, this Pokémon developed the organs it uses to generate electricity.

name: Zygarde 10
entry_x: When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
entry_sun: This is Zygarde’s form when it has gathered 50% of its cells. It wipes out all those who oppose it, showing not a shred of mercy.

name: Cramorant Gulping
entry_sword: It’s so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it’s battling midfight.

name: Cramorant Gorging
entry_sword: It’s so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it’s battling midfight.

name: Toxtricity Low Key
entry_sword: When this Pokémon sounds as if it’s strumming a guitar, it’s actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.

name: Eiscue Noice
entry_sword: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

name: Indeedee Female
entry_sword: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.

name: Morpeko Hangry
entry_sword: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.

name: Zacian Crowned
entry_sword: Known as a legendary hero, this Pokémon absorbs metal particles, transforming them into a weapon it uses to battle.

name: Zamazenta Crowned
entry_sword: In times past, it worked together with a king of the people to save the Galar region. It absorbs metal that it then uses in battle.

name: Eternatus Eternamax
entry_sword: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.

name: Urshifu Rapid Strike
entry_sword: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist.

name: Zarude Dada
entry_sword: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It’s incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.

name: Calyrex Ice
entry_sword: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.

name: Calyrex Shadow
entry_sword: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.

name: Venusaur Gmax
entry_red: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
entry_blue: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
entry_gold: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun's rays, it fills its body with power.
entry_ruby: There is a large flower on VENUSAUR’s back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.
entry_diamond: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
entry_black: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
entry_x: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun’s rays, it fills its body with power.
entry_sword: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charizard Gmax
entry_red: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.
entry_blue: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

entry_diamond: It is said that CHARIZARD’s fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
entry_black: It is said that Charizard’s fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
entry_x: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.
entry_sword: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

name: Blastoise Gmax

entry_blue: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

entry_black: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.

entry_sword: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

name: Butterfree Gmax
entry_red: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
entry_blue: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

entry_sword: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

entry_red: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry_blue: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry_gold: It is fascinated by round objects. It can't stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
entry_ruby: MEOWTH withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this POKéMON loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
entry_diamond: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_black: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_x: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry_sun: It lies around all day, becoming active near dusk. At night, it wanders the city in search of loose change.
entry_sword: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.

name: Machamp Gmax
entry_red: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.
entry_blue: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.
entry_gold: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
entry_ruby: MACHAMP has the power to hurl anything aside. However, trying to do any work requiring care and dexterity causes its arms to get tangled. This POKéMON tends to leap into action before it thinks.
entry_diamond: It punches with its four arms at blinding speed. It can launch 1,000 punches in two seconds.
entry_black: Its four muscled arms slam foes with powerful punches and chops at blinding speed.
entry_x: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.
entry_sun: It unleashes megaton-level punches that send opponents flying clear over the horizon.
entry_sword: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

name: Gengar Gmax
entry_red: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
entry_blue: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
entry_gold: It steals heat from its surround­ ings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a GENGAR appeared.
entry_ruby: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
entry_diamond: It hides in shadows. It is said that if GENGAR is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees F.
entry_black: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
entry_x: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.
entry_sun: Should you feel yourself attacked by a sudden chill, it is evidence of an approaching Gengar. There is no escaping it. Give up.
entry_sword: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.

name: Kingler Gmax
abilities: Hyper Cutter, Shell Armor, Sheer Force
entry_red: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
entry_blue: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
entry_gold: It can hardly lift its massive, overgrown pincer. The pincer's size makes it difficult to aim properly.
entry_ruby: KINGLER has an enormous, oversized claw. It waves this huge claw in the air to communicate with others. However, because the claw is so heavy, the POKéMON quickly tires.
entry_diamond: The larger pincer has 10,000- horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.
entry_black: The larger pincer has 10,000- horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.
entry_x: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
entry_sword: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

name: Lapras Gmax
entry_red: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.
entry_blue: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.
entry_gold: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their num­ ber has dwindled.
entry_ruby: People have driven LAPRAS almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, this POKéMON is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.
entry_diamond: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.
entry_black: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.
entry_x: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their number has dwindled.
entry_sun: Its high intelligence enables it to comprehend human speech. When it’s in a good mood, it sings in its beautiful voice.
entry_sword: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.

name: Eevee Gmax
entry_red: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.
entry_blue: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.
entry_gold: It has the ability to alter the com­ position of its body to suit its surrounding envi­ ronment.
entry_ruby: EEVEE has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives. Radiation from various STONES causes this POKéMON to evolve.
entry_diamond: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
entry_black: Because its genetic makeup is irregular, it quickly changes its form due to a variety of causes.
entry_x: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
entry_sun: Possessing an unbalanced and unstable genetic makeup, it conceals many possible evolutions.
entry_sword: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.

name: Snorlax Gmax
entry_red: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.
entry_blue: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.
entry_gold: What sounds like its cry may ac­ tually be its snores or the rumblings of its hungry belly.
entry_ruby: SNORLAX’s typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile POKéMON that there are children who use its expansive belly as a place to play.
entry_diamond: Its stomach can digest any kind of food, even if it happens to be moldy or rotten.
entry_black: When its belly is full, it becomes too lethargic to even lift a finger, so it is safe to bounce on its belly.
entry_x: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
entry_sun: Its stomach is said to be incomparably strong. Even Muk’s poison is nothing more than a hint of spice on Snorlax’s tongue.
entry_sword: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

name: Garbodor Gmax
entry_black: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
entry_x: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
entry_sun: Beware the poisonous liquid it shoots from its right arm. If even a little of it gets on you, you’ll experience the effects of the unidentified toxin.
entry_sword: This Pokémon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.

name: Melmetal Gmax
entry_sword: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.

name: Rillaboom Gmax
entry_sword: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

name: Cinderace Gmax
entry_sword: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.

name: Inteleon Gmax
entry_sword: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.

name: Corviknight Gmax
entry_sword: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

name: Orbeetle Gmax
entry_sword: It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.

name: Drednaw Gmax
abilities: Strong Jaw, Shell Armor, Swift Swim
entry_sword: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.

name: Coalossal Gmax
abilities: Steam Engine, Flame Body, Flash Fire
entry_sword: It’s usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Flapple Gmax
entry_sword: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.

name: Appletun Gmax
entry_sword: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.

name: Sandaconda Gmax
abilities: Sand Spit, Shed Skin, Sand Veil
entry_sword: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.

name: Toxtricity Amped Gmax
entry_sword: When this Pokémon sounds as if it’s strumming a guitar, it’s actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.

name: Centiskorch Gmax
abilities: Flash Fire, White Smoke, Flame Body
entry_sword: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

name: Hatterene Gmax
entry_sword: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.

name: Grimmsnarl Gmax
entry_sword: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.

name: Alcremie Gmax
entry_sword: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it’s decorated with cream.

name: Copperajah Gmax
entry_sword: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.

name: Duraludon Gmax
entry_sword: Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.

name: Urshifu Single Strike Gmax
entry_sword: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist.

name: Urshifu Rapid Strike Gmax
entry_sword: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist.

name: Toxtricity Low Key Gmax
entry_sword: When this Pokémon sounds as if it’s strumming a guitar, it’s actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.

name: Growlithe Hisui
entry_red: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
entry_blue: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
entry_gold: It has a brave and trustworthy na­ ture. It fear­ lessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
entry_ruby: GROWLITHE has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this POKéMON won’t forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.
entry_diamond: A Pokémon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.
entry_black: A Pokémon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.
entry_x: Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.
entry_sun: It’s both clever and loyal, but if a stranger tries to invade its territory, it barks threateningly.
entry_sword: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

name: Arcanine Hisui
entry_red: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
entry_blue: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
entry_gold: This legendary Chinese POKEMON is considered magnif­ icent. Many people are enchanted by its grand mane.
entry_ruby: ARCANINE is known for its high speed. It is said to be capable of running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within this POKéMON’s body is its source of power.
entry_diamond: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.
entry_black: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.
entry_x: A Pokémon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
entry_sun: Overflowing with beauty and majesty, this strong Pokémon appears in ancient Eastern folklore.
entry_sword: The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people.

name: Voltorb Hisui
entry_red: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.
entry_blue: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.
entry_gold: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.
entry_ruby: VOLTORB was first sighted at a company that manufactures POKé BALLS. The link between that sighting and the fact that this POKéMON looks very similar to a POKé BALL remains a mystery.
entry_diamond: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.
entry_black: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.
entry_x: It was discovered when Poké Balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.

name: Electrode Hisui
entry_red: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
entry_blue: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
entry_gold: It is dangerous. If it has too much electricity and has nothing to do, it amuses itself by exploding.
entry_ruby: ELECTRODE eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this POKéMON exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.
entry_diamond: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
entry_black: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
entry_x: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of “The Bomb Ball.”

name: Typhlosion Hisui
entry_gold: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.
entry_ruby: TYPHLOSION obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This POKéMON creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
entry_diamond: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.
entry_black: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.
entry_x: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.

name: Qwilfish Hisui
entry_gold: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
entry_ruby: QWILFISH sucks in water, inflating itself. This POKéMON uses the pressure of the water it swallowed to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming somewhat challenging.
entry_diamond: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.
entry_black: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.
entry_x: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
entry_sword: When faced with a larger opponent, it swallows as much water as it can to match the opponent’s size.

name: Sneasel Hisui
entry_gold: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it sud­ denly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
entry_ruby: SNEASEL scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. This POKéMON seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.
entry_diamond: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
entry_black: A smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair may work together to steal eggs by having one lure the parents away.
entry_x: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
entry_sun: It has a cunning yet savage disposition. It waits for parents to leave their nests, and then it sneaks in to steal their eggs.
entry_sword: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.

name: Samurott Hisui
entry_black: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.
entry_x: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.

name: Lilligant Hisui
entry_black: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
entry_x: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
entry_sun: No matter how much time and money is spent raising it, its flowers are the most beautiful when they bloom in the wild.
entry_sword: It’s believed that even first-rate gardeners have a hard time getting the flower on a Lilligant’s head to bloom.

name: Zorua Hisui
entry_black: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.
entry_x: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
entry_sword: Zorua is a timid Pokémon. This disposition seems to be what led to the development of Zorua’s ability to take on the forms of other creatures.

name: Zoroark Hisui
entry_black: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
entry_x: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
entry_sword: This Pokémon cares deeply about others of its kind, and it will conjure terrifying illusions to keep its den and pack safe.

name: Braviary Hisui
abilities: Keen Eye, Sheer Force, Tinted Lens
entry_black: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
entry_x: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.
entry_sun: With its brave disposition, it fears nothing—not even death. Ancient Alolan people respected it, referring to it as “the hero of the sky.”
entry_sword: Known for its bravery and pride, this majestic Pokémon is often seen as a motif for various kinds of emblems.

name: Sliggoo Hisui
entry_x: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.
entry_sun: It has trouble drawing a line between friends and food. It will calmly try to melt and eat even those it gets along well with.
entry_sword: Although this Pokémon isn’t very strong, its body is coated in a caustic slime that can melt through anything, so predators steer clear of it.

name: Goodra Hisui
entry_x: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
entry_sun: An amazingly friendly Pokémon, but if left to itself, loneliness overcomes it, and it oozes gooey tears.
entry_sword: Sometimes it misunderstands instructions and appears dazed or bewildered. Many Trainers don’t mind, finding this behavior to be adorable.

name: Avalugg Hisui
entry_x: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.
entry_sword: At high latitudes, this Pokémon can be found with clusters of Bergmite on its back as it swims among the icebergs.

name: Decidueye Hisui
entry_sun: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.
entry_sword: As if wielding a bow, it launches the arrow quills hidden among the feathers of its wings. Decidueye’s shots never miss.

name: Dialga Origin
entry_diamond: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.
entry_black: A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh. It is said that time flows when Dialga’s heart beats.
entry_x: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.

name: Palkia Origin
entry_diamond: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.
entry_black: A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh. It is said that space becomes more stable with Palkia’s every breath.
entry_x: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

name: Basculin White Striped
entry_black: Red and blue Basculin get along so poorly, they’ll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.
entry_x: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
entry_sword: Anglers love the fight this Pokémon puts up on the hook. And there are always more to catch— many people release them into lakes illicitly.

name: Tauros Paldea Combat Breed
entry_red: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.
entry_blue: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.
entry_gold: They fight each other by locking horns. The herd's protector takes pride in its bat­ tle-scarred horns.
entry_ruby: This POKéMON is not satisfied unless it is rampaging at all times. If there is no opponent for TAUROS to battle, it will charge at thick trees and knock them down to calm itself.
entry_diamond: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.
entry_black: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.
entry_x: After heightening its will to fight by whipping itself with its three tails, it charges at full speed.
entry_sun: Historically, people in areas all over the world have ridden Tauros, but the practice is said to have started in Alola.
entry_sword: When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails, it’s a warning that the Pokémon is about to charge with astounding speed.
